 + Back in the first week and you'll also get my Nine Level Empty Wizard Tower Template, Eight Empty College of Magic Templates, and Four Poor Village Map Templates as a free bonus - perfect for adding your new tokens to.  And just for viewing this campaign here is a free sample of my traditional "Meanders: Synchable Terrain" battlemaps so you can see the level of detail and artistic style for yourself. : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gPVYaBFrG4Mx44...

To date I've created maybe ten thousand individual tokens in my career - but many of these lacked the skill I have now -and have been an aside while I was focusing mainly on maps. I intend to take a reasonable amount of time to work on producing these and am confident of doing so, as stated, and delivered on time. I have completed dozens of these massive types of digital project and have numerous measures in place to ensure the completed tokens are immediately stored in several places so they cannot suffer due to a hardware crash. I have made a move away from providing tokens on sheets, to individual drop-shadowed PNGS sized and ready to go within the two most popular VTT formats with both of which I am very familiar. There are no third parties involved and I have four years of Kickstarter experience and 100% fulfilment across more than a dozen projects - but this is my first time using Indiegogo, so bear with me while I get to grips.
No-one in their right mind offers this amount of tokens let alone tries to create them in one set - but I'm different and I'm known as 'The Maphatter' - and this is nothing compared to the 20 other projects I have successfully crowdfunded all including huge, vast amounts of digital content, including a recent project that saw 46,000 dungeon tiles created, or my Meanders series which now features over 1000 interchangeable battle-maps. - all delivered to promise and before time. I am what they call a sure-bet, I'm not going anywhere and this is not my beginning - but it is my beginning here: more funds means I can supplement myself while I work (fast and furious), hyper-focus on this one and not have to launch new projects in the meantime to pay my bills/rent - and possibly, make enough funding to include 10,000 sci-fi tokens as well. This is happening - I'm presently completing new maps for another project but as my backers know, I work like a storm and you don't have to wait long to get results once I get to it so this is your chance to get on board and get a wickedly comprehensive token set for your digital games this year - and you may never have to buy another one, again.
There are minimal risks and challenges beyond navigating Indiegogo for the first time - I've done this many times for many projects, I back-up everything so it can't be lost on multiple places, I know the formats required for the end-user, I make delivery as simple as visiting a link to download your goodies, I always deliver to promise early or on time, and I never ghost - I approach crowdfunding as a business transaction and pride myself on being a consummate professional before, during and after. My record (on record) reflects that.
Thanks for viewing, please feel free to ask any questions
First Regards,
Kris

story:
Welcome to Dark Fable Miniature's Sons of Anubis Campaign.  These dog-headed warriors are descended from Anubis, the canine guide and guardian of the Egyptian underworld.  The Sons of Anubis are ferocious warriors sworn to protect the royal necropolis where the tombs of long dead pharaohs and queens can be found.  On rare occasions the Sons of Anubis have been summoned by powerful lords or heroes to wreak vengeance on those who would offend the gods.  Heavily armed and protected by sturdy shields and armour the Sons of Anubis make a formidable force on the battlefield.

The Sons of Anubis campaign is the latest expansion of Dark Fable's pseudo-historical Egyptian range.  The concept and design of the miniatures are a mix of history, archaeology, fantasy fiction and Hollywood films.  The core group of miniatures consists of 7 sets: 5 sets of fearsome Anubis warriors sculpted by Kev Adams.  A set of Scorpion warriors sculpted by Tim Prow.  As well as a two-stage female genie made by Brother Vinni.  There is also a stretch goal reward figure - The Scorpion Lord - who is FREE to all Level 5 contributors and higher when the campaign goal of £2000 is reached.  If that were not enough we have made a large selection of our previously released miniatures available as ADD-ONs.

These high-quality 28mm miniatures are made from a lead-free pewter alloy and have an incredible amount of detail and personality. Whether you are a collector or gamer you are certain to enjoy these figures!

 

The Sons of Anubis features seven new sets of miniatures!  Each set comes with plastic slotta bases and shields where appropriate.

1. Anubis Warriors I (Spears)

2. Anubis Warriors II (Axes and Mace)

3. Anubis Warriors III (Swords in Scale Armour)

4. Anubis Warriors IV (Swords in Linen Armour)

5. Anubis Warriors V Command (Officer, Musician, Standard)

6. Scorpion Warriors

7. Female Genie (Two-stage Character)

 

The Scorpion Lord Stretch Goal Reward

Contributors of Level 5 and above will receive a FREE Scorpion Lord miniature as a stretch goal reward when the campaign goal of £2000 is reached.  After the Scorpion Lord has been unlocked he may also be purchased as an Add-on by adding £5 to your perk amount.

 

There are a variety of perks to suit every budget, which range in price from £12 to £240 (As well as two Early Bird Specials!).  Each perk allows you to choose from the 7 new sets of miniatures on offer and any of the £8 add-on sets which were released during our previous Indiegogo campaigns.  The miniatures are unpainted and most come with plastic slotta bases.

What scale are these miniatures and what are they made of?

Most of our miniatures are 28-30mm tall, measuring from the base of the foot to the eye.  Because we use a number of different sculptors there may be a degree of variation between sets of figures.  The miniatures are made from a lead-free pewter alloy and are expertly spin cast by Griffin Moulds here in England.

How much is postage?

Postage will be added to your perk during checkout and is based on your location.  Please contact me regarding rates.

When can I expect to get my miniatures?

I am hoping to be able to start mailing out orders by January 2018 if not earlier.  The first two master moulds have already been made as well as several production moulds which should allow me to get the miniatures cast relatively quickly.  If there are any delays I will be sure to let you all know exactly what is going on and how long it might take.

How do I let you know which sets I have chosen for my perk?

You can either send me a message through the Indiegogo site or an email with your selections to mikeburns64@aol.com.  You can do this right away if you know which sets you want, or you can wait until the end of the campaign.

I want to increase my perk level, how do I do this?

Indiegogo does not have an application which enables you to do this yourself.  If you wish to increase your perk level make an additional contribution for the amount which is the difference between the two perks.  For example if you contributed £62 for the level 7 perk and decided you wanted to get the level 8 perk which is £85 you would contribute an additional £23.  You will then need to send me a message about your perk upgrade.

If you have any questions about any aspect of the campaign please send me a message and I will do my best to answer you.

 

PREVIOUSLY RELEASED SETS AVAILABLE AS ADD-ONS:

Level 5 contributors and higher have the option to add-on sets of miniatures to their original pledge at £8 a set (* Unless priced otherwise).  Just add the cost of the add-ons you want to your perk amount.  The details of which add-ons you want will be collected at the end of the project when you send in your perk selections.  You may also choose £8 add-on sets as perk selections if you wish.

1. Queen of Egypt and Attendants  £8

2. Court Ladies I  £8

3. Egyptian Noblewoman and Maids  £8

4. Royal Guards I (Spears)  £8

5. Royal Guards II (Axes)  £8

6. Royal Guards III (Khopesh Swords)  £8

7. Court Personalities I (Vizier, Priest of Bes, Food Taster)  £8

8. Court Personalities II (Dagger Girl, Libyan Princess, Egyptian Noblewoman)  £8

9. Court Personalities III (Bodyguard, Physician, Scribe)  £8

10. Court Personalities IV (Officer, Scribe, Overseer)  £8

12. Egyptian Assassins  £8

13. Eunuch Guards I  £8

15. Eunuch Guards III  £8

16. Eunuch Guards IV  £8

27. Nubian Guards II (Hyena and Guards)  £8

28. Attendants (Nubian Fanbearer, Porter, Maid)  £8

29. Sedja Beast  £8

30. Ammut the Devourer  £12

31. Egyptian Female Guards I (Spears)  £8

32. Egyptian Female Guards II (Bows)  £8

33. Egyptian Female Guards III (Melee Weapons)  £8

34. Egyptian Female Guards IV (Officer and Axes)  £8

35. Egyptian Female Guards V (Axes)  £8

38. Tomb Robbers II  £8

39. 39. Mummy Kidnapping  £8

40. Skeletal Lion  £6

41. Skeletal Guards I  £8

42. Skeletal Guards II  £8

43. Egyptian Vampires  £8

44. Queen Nefertiti and Attendants  £8

45. Egyptian Concubines  £8

46. Egyptianised Dejah Thoris  £4

47. Senet Game and Players  £8

48. Pharaoh's Champion  £4

49. Lamia  £2

50. Evil Concubines (Orc, Drow, Cyclopean)  £8

51. Stheno Consort of Set (Egyptian Gorgon)  £6

52. Ugallu Temple Guardians  £5

53. Giant Baboon Spiders  £8

54. Amphisbaena  £12

55. Fearless Heroes  £8

56. Prophet of Set (Version I)  £4

57. Prophet of Set (Version II)  £4

58. Cultists of Set I  £8

59. Cultists of Set II  £8

60. Cultists of Set III  £8

61. Cultists of Set IV  £8

62. Temple of Set Guards I  £8

63. Temple of Set Guards II  £8

64. Column of Woe  £8

65. Prophet of Set (Version III)  £4

66. Criosphinx and Heiracosphinx  £8

67. Lions  £6

68. Mehen Game and Players  £8

69. Royal Gong  £6

70. Queen Cleopatra VII and Maids  £8

71. Court Ladies II  £8

72. Palace Braziers and Fire Plugs  £5

 

Risks & Challenges

Dark Fable Miniatures has previously conducted six Indiegogo campaigns - all of which were successfully funded and fulfilled.  This campaign is Fixed Funding so if we do not reach our campaign goal (Gods Forbid!) your contribution will be returned to you.

The risks for this campaign are minimal as all of the miniatures have already been sculpted.  We are presently in the process of having the green sculpts made into castings - Production moulds will then be made for each set.  We are therefore confident that we can start sending out orders by the middle of January, if not earlier.  If there are any unforeseen delays or problems I will let you know immediately and what we are doing about it.

story:
Welcome to Dice Throne! A game of intriguing dice, tactical card play, powerful heroes, & unique abilities!

Final Live-Stream: 1v1 Manny vs Nate, Barbarian vs Shadow Thief, The Final Showdown!

"Dice Throne = King of Tokyo + Anime * Magic the Gathering. Quick Fun!" -Ed Barafu

Dice Throne is a fast-paced 2 - 6 player combat game (1v1, 2v2, 3v3, 2v2v2, or free-for-all).

Select from a variety of heroes that play & feel completely distinct from one another. Attack opponents and activate abilities by rolling your hero's unique set of 5 dice. Accumulate Combat Points and spend them on cards that have a large range of effects, such as granting permanent hero upgrades, applying status effects, and manipulating dice directly (yours, your teammate's, or even your opponent's).

  • Unique heroes & abilities that upgrade as the game progresses
  • 5 dice & 32 cards customized for each hero
  • Dice are king, but can also be tamed
  • Fast paced & easy to learn
  • Rich tactics & strategy

The results are in! We were selected to be a part of the PAX South Indie Showcase! The show was incredible for us. Tales of the Aggronaut even said, "Dice Throne was definitely my tabletop game of the show… but in truth I think probably it was my game of the show as a whole. I highly suggest if you have the opportunity to check this out at any conventions between now and the projected November release date that you grab hold of it with both hands."

 

 

 

 

“Dice Throne was definitely my tabletop game of [PAX South]… but in truth I think probably it was my game of the show as a whole.”  -Tales of the Aggronaut
 
“It’s really easy to teach and play… the characters are fun and evocative… Absolutely worth checking out!”  -Ed Barafu
 
“It’s very quick to play… really satisfying game… super fun experience!”  -Man vs Meeple
 
“It’s a fast, fun, and gorgeous looking game that I would recommend checking out on kickstarter for sure!”  -Druid City Games


(Note: All reviewers used older prototype versions. We have been improving rapidly!)

 

 

 

  • Join our subreddit
  • Like us on Facebook
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Become a fan on BGG.com
  • Subscribe to our newsletter via MailChimp

Dice Throne will be shipped from within the US & EU. Additionally, we'll cover a portion of your shipping costs because we love you. However, in order to keep costs down and reduce the potential for errors, we allow a maximum of 1 delivery location per backer.


Nate Chatellier: Designed and developed numerous apps & video games for Disney, Pixar, Nickelodeon, Nick Jr, Mattel, & even the casino floor. Currently working as a game designer & engineer for Niantic during the day, while moon lighting with Dice Throne during the night.

Manny Trembley: Author, illustrator, and rabid storyteller. He has worked in the video game/app world for Cyan Worlds, Disney, and Nickelodeon. He has also successfully launched and fulfilled 7 graphic novel Kickstarter campaigns. He is now turning his experience in gaming and comic publishing to developing the coolest dice rolling game ever (in his opinion).

story:
All cards and materials have been ordered! We will be receiving the first shipment in Mid-Late March and begin fulfilling Indiegogo pre-orders, While this page will remain active for sales, we can no longer guarantee all items for pre-order, as the campaign has officially ended. We will keep an ongoing list above of what is sold out. More stock will be available on our website in Mid-Late April.

 


The 2017 includes 500 different cards including 50 Rare Foil Player Cards.
 

400 Player Cards
Choose from several different roster sizes and salary caps to build a realistic big league team with a full bullpen, rotation, and bench.
Check out the complete 2017 Player List here.
 

70 Strategy Cards
Choosing which strategy cards to include in your deck is only half the battle–the best managers know the right time to play their hands.
 

30 Stadium Cards
Pick 1 of 30 big league parks to be your home field. Each stadium includes a unique effect with an added bonus for home-town players.

 


Here's what we're offering throughout the various perks! Collect the full set through packs or get everything at once with a full set. Starter Sets come with set card lineups that are viewable here. Upgrade your preorder package to include a Clutch T-Shirt and Indiegogo-Exclusive LE100 card set featuring Jose Fernandez, Kyle Schwarber, a Special Goatbusters strategy card, and David Ortiz and Ken Griffey Career Year cards.











Check out the full Rulebook here or the Quick-Start Guide here.
Each At-Bat includes 4 basic elements: the Pitch, which determines the Advantage & the Swing, which determines the Result


1. Pitch
The defense rolls the Pitch and adds the Pitcher’s Command. In this instance, Syndergaard's Command is 5.
 

2. Advantage
If the total number is higher than the Batter's On-base: advantage Pitcher. If the total number is tied/lower than the Batter's On-base: advantage Batter. In this instance, Harper's On-Base is 14+1 (his R+1 statistic is activated vs. Syndergaard who is right-handed).).

3. Swing
The offense rolls the Swing—the at-bat result will be determined on the chart of whoever gained the advantage.
 

4. Result
The Batter will move to a base, back to the lineup, or circle the bases. Strategy / Stadium cards and advanced rules can affect the result.

We will keep an ongoing list above of what is sold out. More stock will be available on our website in Mid-Late April.
 



The 2017 includes 500 different cards including 50 Rare Foil Player Cards. 
400 Player CardsChoose from several different roster sizes and salary caps to build a realistic big league team with a full bullpen, rotation, and bench.Check out the complete 2017 Player List here. 
70 Strategy CardsChoosing which strategy cards to include in your deck is only half the battle–the best managers know the right time to play their hands. 
30 Stadium CardsPick 1 of 30 big league parks to be your home field. Each stadium includes a unique effect with an added bonus for home-town players.

 





Here's what we're offering throughout the various perks! Collect the full set through packs or get everything at once with a full set. Starter Sets come with set card lineups that are viewable here. Upgrade your preorder package to include a Clutch T-Shirt and Indiegogo-Exclusive LE100 card set featuring Jose Fernandez, Kyle Schwarber, a Special Goatbusters strategy card, and David Ortiz and Ken Griffey Career Year cards.

Check out the full Rulebook here or the Quick-Start Guide here.Each At-Bat includes 4 basic elements: the Pitch, which determines the Advantage & the Swing, which determines the Result
1. PitchThe defense rolls the Pitch and adds the Pitcher’s Command. In this instance, Syndergaard's Command is 5. 
2. AdvantageIf the total number is higher than the Batter's On-base: advantage Pitcher. If the total number is tied/lower than the Batter's On-base: advantage Batter. In this instance, Harper's On-Base is 14+1 (his R+1 statistic is activated vs. Syndergaard who is right-handed).).
3. SwingThe offense rolls the Swing—the at-bat result will be determined on the chart of whoever gained the advantage. 
4. ResultThe Batter will move to a base, back to the lineup, or circle the bases. Strategy / Stadium cards and advanced rules can affect the result.

story:
Hello everyone.

 

We are a group of blood bowl fanatics that needed to do something for our loved game. We started to design stuff for us at the beginning of this year and people encourage to go further.So here we are, trying to do something bigger. 

 

We think that we can offer our stuff to people around the world. We are a small group of friends dreaming about building up this project. Our vision is to create functional, quality, well designed and affordable products to the many players.

 

By backing us on this you will encourage us to keep doing more stuff fo the game and, why not, for another.

 

This is our magnetic dice box for blood bowl players. It is printed on high quality PLA and is designed to hold a complete set of Blood bowl dices. And for last but not at least, it is customizable so you can choose the color of PLA and what you want to inscribed on it.

Dimensions are 112 mm length by 50 mms diameter and it come with 4 magnets to keep it closed.  

 

What can I say about our dice cup? Everybody loves it. Its design is inspired on the old blood bowl ball and it is perfect to avoid unpleased hits on your miniatures or dices out of the table. It is very reliable stuff and it will increase your WOW effect. Choose a color to fit your team and see how shocked is your table opponent!

Dimensions are 80 mm tall and 70 mm diameter.

 

Do you have a couple of dices that makes you feel unbeatable? Then these helmets will make you feel very happy. They are designed to used with a blood bowl bench. One has "TURN" inscribed and the other has "REROLL". They can be printed in all colors available or you can paint them if you want them to suit the colors of your team.

Dimensions of a helmet: 31x25x23 mm.

 

How many times have moved the score token by accident? This accessory will secure your match score does not have unpleased accidents while you are playing. It comes with a "0 - 0" score inscribed in the bottom of the dices gap and you can track scores up to 6 touchdowns. The design is inspired in the original blood bowl ball and you can choose the color of the PLA or paint it to match the uniform of your team.

Dimensions: 38x70x20 mm.

 

What you get by backing us is a full set of accessories. You will have one dice box, one dice cup, two helmet dice holder tokens and one score tracker with a price reduction.

Also, you will have the chance of customize your dice cup and box for free.

This is the pack that you are buying and here you have the color chart available for this project.

But we like to go for the extra mille and, for this, we have designed I kind of early bird system where earlier bakers are getting more stuff as higher is our success. Here you have a key chart to understand better what you get.

 

So as fast as you back the more you get. Backers can get gifts that increase the value of what you get up to double of you pay.

 

STRETCH GOAL 1. FREE CUSTOMIZATION:

This stretch goal will allow you to get your nick or/and your NAF number inscribed in your dice cup and box. Be aware that this stretch goal is unlocked from 0 euros. Here you have a couple of examples.

 

STRETCH GOAL 2. FULL DICE SET (unlocked at 2000 euros):

This stretch goal give you access to a fantastic dice set of 6 dices (2d6+1d8+3 block dices) to fit in your brand new magnetic dice box. It will be released when we will achieve 2000 euros and note that only first 120 packs of accessories will have a set, don´t loose the opportunity. Here you have a example of our d6 and the work art of our block dice.

 

STRETCH GOAL 3. ABILITIES RING SET (unlocked at 3000 euros):

This stretch goal give you access to a full set of 16 abilities rings. You can choose one ability to inscribe on each and they are available on 25 mm and 32 mm. It is a fantastic opportunity of upgrading your team and make easier to track your players on the pitch. It will be released when we will achieve 3000 euros and note that only first 90 packs of accessories will have a set. Here you have the concept of our rings, we will update with a real picture as soon is unlocked.

 

STRETCH GOAL 4. THROWING PAD (unlocked at 4000 euros):

This stretch goal give you access to a very cool throwing pad. Our stuff is strong enough and difficult to break but maybe you are about of painting your dice cup and it is better to hit something softer than the table. It will be released when we will achieve 4000 euros and note that only first 60 packs of accessories will have a pad. Here you have a picture.

 

STRETCH GOAL 4. 40% IN OUR WEB SHOP (unlocked at 5000 euros):

This stretch goal give you access to an awesome discount in your first time at our web shop. We are happy to save money in transport so we will pack everything together. It will be released when we will achieve 5000 euros and note that only first 30 packs of accessories will have a pad. Here you have a picture of products from our catalog:

Halfling Pack.

Orc Pack .

 

It is difficult to determinate an accurate reference chart for delivery cost because it depends on the size of your stuff. We will try to come back to you with a calculation as soon as the campaign ends up. Here you have some estimations to some of the most popular Blood Bowl destinations. 

Due to some questions from our backers we made a decision. Prices are hard to check so they are linked to the weight. We cannot calculate the weight until the campaign ends up and we know how many things you get for free so we did an estimation based on a currier service (air in case of USA). Nevertheless, we are clear with our customers and we are not about to make profit with transport expenses so we will contact to every backer at the end of the campaign in order to offer several options to chose. If the option chosen is cheaper than the reference price we will refund the difference.

 

Please, do not hesitate to contact us to check your destination cost out.

 

We like to think that we are trusted member of the Fantasy Football Community and I value that trust immensely. We where producing this stuff for nearly half year and we think that it is a good moment to offer it global. We are confidence in our capacity of producing this for you so everything is on our hands, we mean, we produce all items involved in this campaign.We think the point we are trying to make is you can trust in us to deliver this project to you, our reputation depends on it.

There is not really much in terms of challenges that haven’t already been overcome. I have the designs completed  and we are using a trusted brand of printers that can produce the quantities we might need.  

We aim to ship this project to Backers around JAnuary  2019.

 

Please consider backing this project and spread the word to as many people as you can. If however you choose not to back this project then please feel free to share this project with people you think would like to get involved. This support would be very much appreciated and could make all the difference.

Thank you for taking the time to read our pitch, and we hope you choose to help our succeed on this passion project of ours. Should you have any questions please do not hesitate to ask; we'll be ready and waiting to answer them.

Cheers!

OLD CASTLE CREACIONES CREW

story:
About The Project :)

Hi there, I'm here hoping to fund the production of a brand new range of characterful miniatures, designed especially for collectors, gamers, and painters :)

the minis are a collection of Trolls, Goblins, Gribbles, and Orcs, each cast in high quality resin, ranging from 50mm, to 30mm scale in size, and each sculpted with a bit of that old school character and charm that first got me into this hobby all those years ago :)

there will be some individual character minis, and a few small units to start with, and hopefully if it all goes well, we can unlock some more minis to add to the list, and hopefully even add a few gifts thrown in, just to say thanks :) 

also, for a small group of lucky people, there will be the chance to work together to design your own unique 30mm scale mini, sculpted and designed by myself, and cast in high quality resin, for use in your own collection, or game, sounds pretty cool, right ?? :D

I've been a professional miniatures designer for many years, and have finally decided to try releasing my own range, and have enlisted the help of other industry veterans, including Hysterical Games, White Dragon Miniatures, and CMA Creative Solutions to help with the 3D printing and physical production. more in depth details about the campaign, production methods, and also a bit about myself and my career, can be seen after all the pretty pictures :)

thanks for taking a look, I would be very grateful for any support you can give, and if you could share the project online too, that would be awesome too :)

 

About Motion In Poetry Games :)

I've been a professional miniatures sculptor working freelance for many years, and helped bring to life such games as Mantics Walking Dead All Out War, Mars Attacks, Dreadball, and Kings Of War, Modiphius Entertainments Achtung Cthulhu, Sodapops Super Dungeon Explore, and Ninja All Stars, plus many other independent publishers :)

after a lifetime of collecting and painting minis for myself, and sculpting minis for other people, I thought I would finally try making my own minis, and I thought maybe if I sculpt the kind of things I love, hopefully you might love them too :)

some examples of my other work can be seen here, (this is just a small selection, I've made hundreds of minis over the years, so I've got a lot more to post yet :) 

https://www.instagram.com/motioninpoetrygames

https://www.facebook.com/motioninpoetrygames

also I can be contacted via email at :

motion_in_poetry@yahoo.co.uk

 

How The Campaign Works :)

simply enough, there will be a selection of pledge levels listed to the side, with various different rewards listed, then you just need to simply choose and select the the rewards you want, and click pledge :) 

pledge levels range from a simple mix and match level, where you can chose any minis you like, and simply pledge the total listed price of the minis, and grouped rewards where you can by various units together, and also of course there's the special pledge level, where you can also have your own unique 30mm Fantasy mini designed, sculpted and cast in resin, as well as receive a copy of all the other minis made available during the campaign :)

you will also be able to add extra copies of any mini, simply by adding the extra amounts listed, to your pledge amount, a full list of your choices will be collected using the survey and pledge manager sent after the campaign is fully funded :)

shipping will be charged after the campaign is funded, and ready to ship, with the rates listed further down below.


Stretch Goals :)

depending how well funding goes, some extra minis may be unlocked as stretch goals, some may be free minis for backers who pledge at a certain level or amount, and some may be introduced as add ons, all stretch goals can also have extra copies purchased too, for the listed prices :)

 

How The Minis Will Be Cast :)

the minis will be 3D printed, and cast in high quality resin by my industry contacts, including Hysterical Games, White Dragon Miniatures, and CMA Creative Soloutions, who are lined up to handle all production elements, and will use their many years of expertise to bring the minis to the tabletop, examples of their 3D prints and casts can be seen here :)

https://www.instagram.com/hysterical_games/

the minis will be 3D printed in high definition using the Solus 3D DLP printer, and the Asiga PICO 2 HD DLP Printer, high resolution images of the print quality can be seen here on their websites :)

http://www.reify-3d.com/gallery/

https://www.asiga.com/industry/case_studies/


My Pledge To You :)

once the campaign is fully funded and the funds are received, I will work to ensure all backers receive their chosen rewards in a timely manner, as promised, and produced with the highest quality and care. some minis may have some slight adjustments to improve details before the final 3D printing and production phase, but I pledge that all minis will be received in the design and quality they are presented,  so you can start using them in the hobby we all love, as fast as possible :)


Delivery Date :)

I have planned a delivery date of around February 2019, although hopefully the minis can be delivered much sooner, but due to the nature of production and delivery, I have added in some room to the schedule, to make sure everything goes smoothly :)

 

Shipping :)

shipping will be via safe and well packaged recorded delivery, and will be charged after the campaign is finished via the pledge manager, at the following rates (Maximum rates listed)

 

  • Maximum Shipping Rates
  • UK + Europe: £8 - £15
  • USA + Canada: £12 - £15
  • Rest Of World: £20 - 25

Unfortunately we are currently unable to ship to Russia, although we will update if this becomes possible.

while every care will be taken to avoid import duties, unfortunately we cannot be held responsible for any that may incur, hope you understand. 


Risks and challenges

this is a very low risk and easily achievable project, with only a few steps to getting the minis to your door. all minis have been, and will be, sculpted by myself, with most having been completed already, and after working for many years as a professional miniatures sculptor, I have the experience required to sculpt and prepare all miniatures for casting to the highest quality. similarly, the production side will also be handled by industry professionals with many years experience casting high quality minis. after that, it's simply just a case of getting the rewards packaged and sent out for delivery to your door, the only variables involve possible minor delays in casting and shipping, but these have already been accounted for in the planning stages :)

story:
Introduzione all'Ambientazione dall'autore Marzio Morganti

Introduzione al Sistema dall'autore Luca De Marini

Colonna Sonora Originale by Sonor Village: Main Theme

PLEASE NOTE: this IndieGoGo InDemand Campaign refers to the Italian version of the game only.

Cos'è questa pagina?

Il Kickstarter di Augusta Universalis GDR è stato un grandissimo successo ma non hai fatto in tempo a partecipare o ti sei accorto dell'esistenza del gioco solo ora? Hai bisogno di aggiungere Add-on rispetto al Reward che ti sei assicurato tramite Kickstarter? Vorresti l'Artbook di Auguni in formato cartaceo oltre che in PDF?

Allora questa è la pagina che fa per te. Questa campagna IndieGoGo InDemand resterà aperta per 30 giorni e ti permetterà di prenotare la tua copia di Auguni. Potrai ritirarla a mano a Lucca Comics & Games presso lo stand Red Glove + Acchiappasogni, senza spese di spedizione, o riceverla comodamente a casa tua: in questo caso controlla il paragrafo sulle Spese di Spedizione. 

Roma non è caduta come la Storia insegna.

Nell’anno 2771 a.U.c. l’Impero controlla non solo l’intero pianeta Terra, ma anche numerosi altri mondi, sia dentro che fuori il nostro sistema solare. 
Incrociatori da guerra viaggiano per milioni di chilometri utilizzando i Limes Orbitalis che curvano artificialmente lo spaziotempo dall’orbita di pianeti lontani.
La nuova filosofia sincretistica del Logos ha estinto le guerre di religione.
Un consiglio di Cesari da tutto il mondo compone il Senato Imperiale, presieduto da un solo Augusto scelto per adozione dal precedente imperatore.
La maggior parte degli abitanti dell’Impero vive un’utopia di giustizia sociale, progresso e pace.

...cosa potrebbe mai andare male...?

Milites, alle armi! Riunitevi sotto il vessillo! Tecnolorica indossata, Systemata attivati... pronti all'impatto delle teste di ponte! Nelle fredde distese siderali si annida qualcosa di sinistro, terrificante, alieno a questo stesso Universo... ma noi difenderemo l'Impero dai suoi temibili nemici, o moriremo nel tentativo! 

Livia Comnena Akiko Augusta scaccia un Trono Oscuro nell'orbita superiore di Persephone, sistema stellare di Sylde

In Augusta Universalis sarete super Pretoriani cibernetici, corazzati con eccezionali armature potenziate, in grado di trasformarsi cambiando Assectum a seconda delle necessità!  

Affronterete combattimenti straordinari e Missiones esplorative su pianeti lontani e sconosciuti. 
Investigherete i misteri di civiltà aliene scomparse da eoni, e affronterete la minaccia dei terrificanti Troni Oscuri, creature da incubo che portano morte e distruzione nel Cosmo. 
Difenderete l'Impero e il vostro Cesare sia dalle minacce politiche che lo dilaniano dall'interno che dai nemici che vorrebbero distruggerlo dall'esterno. 

Pronti a viaggiare al di là delle stelle conosciute... per la maggior gloria dell'Impero?!

Augusta Universalis sarà un Gioco di Ruolo completo, contenente una ricca e suggestiva ambientazione ucronica fantascientifica, e un regolamento rapido e focalizzato sull'interpretazione del Personaggio e sull'immedesimazione del Giocatore. 

Stiamo realizzando un libro di 240 pagine e più, formato A4, copertina rigida, tutto a colori. Per i giocatori... 

  • Cinque diversi Imperi: a quale Guardia e Imperator avrai giurato fedeltà?
  • Cinque diversi Ordini: a quale addestramento sei stato sottoposto per entrare nella tua Legione? 
  • Infiniti modi per personalizzare la tua Tecnolorica, l'incredibile armatura cibernetica dei Pretoriani!

Per il narratore...

  • Procedure di gioco chiare e semplici da comprendere. 
  • Il Sincrogramma, l’utilissimo strumento di aiuto del Demiurgo per la gestione delle Missiones. 
  • Tre avventure complete per iniziare subito a giocare!

Per tutti...!

  • Una nuova ambientazione fantascientifica, un’ucronia suggestiva e approfondita. 
  • Un solo manuale necessario, che include ambientazione e sistema di gioco completo. 
  • Un corpus narrativo di prim'ordine, con tanti racconti appassionanti e suggestivi, per aiutarvi a immergervi nel mondo di Augusta Universalis! 
  • Un regolamento solido, basato su Destino Oscuro 2, lo stesso motore del già noto Le Notti di Nibiru.  

Premiato con tantissime recensioni entusiastiche, Destino Oscuro 2 ha già dimostrato di saper coinvolgere i Giocatori come non mai: perfetto sia per neofiti che per Narratori e Giocatori più esperti, con Augusta Universalis vivrete ore e ore di avventuroso intrattenimento!

Nonostante l'Impero sembri un faro di civiltà, dalla morte dell’Imperatore Eraclio Augusto ogni cosa è andata storta, e la Guerra delle Aquile divide l’unità secolare delle corone imperiali. La ricchissima e potente Bisanzio si è infatti alleata con l’Impero Zarista Sovietico per donare alla propria Basileia, Anastasia Eracliade la Corona suprema. Di contro, la Roma della giovanissima Livia Akiko Augusta, figlia adottata di Eraclio e originaria dell’Impero del Crisantemo, si è unita con Aachen e la tecnoteocrazia del Kaiser Ottone, del Sacro Romano Impero. Il conflitto per il trono Imperiale insanguina i confini fra Europa e Asia con una spregiudicatezza che lascia attoniti tutti gli altri Cesari dell’Impero e i Regni loro federati. 

Il Centurione Caio Valerio affronta un atterrito capitano delle Guardie Coloniali di Marte. Il Centurione Caio Valerio affronta un atterrito capitano delle Guardie Coloniali di Marte.

Su questo sfondo tumultuoso e imprevedibile, si muovono i Pretoriani interpretati dai Giocatori: guardie del corpo elette del Supremo Augusto e dei Cesari che compongono il Senato Imperiale di una Roma che ha conquistato il pianeta Terra e si è espansa nel Sistema Solare e nello Sperone di Orione fino a conquistare lontani e selvaggi esopianeti.  

I loro avversari? Indicibili orrori cosmici, specie aliene ostili e minacciose, nemici dell’Impero e folli sette di adoratori dei Troni Oscuri li attendono in fredde aree remote del Cosmo!

Cinque fazioni iniziali tra cui scegliere e a cui mettersi al servizio: Roma, Bisanzio, il Sacro Romano Impero, l’Unione degli Imperi Zaristi Sovietici e l’Africa Australis degli Shaka!

Cinque Ordini che addestrano i Milites più capaci: i guerrieri dell’Ordo Martis, gli esploratori dell’Ordo Dianae, i diplomatici dell’Ordo Mercurii, i servizi segreti dell’Ordo Plutonis e i filosofi-scienziati dell’Ordo Minervae attendono sempre con trepidazione le nuove reclute!

Armati con la loro Tecnolorica, l’esoscheletro potenziato che li rende un anatema di distruzione, e totalmente personalizzabile grazie ai Systemata, i Pretoriani sono pronti a scatenare la furia delle Legioni contro i nemici di Roma! 

Tanti differenti Ordini di Pretoriani, inoltre, sceglierai tra Tecnoloriche Levis, Medie o Gravis.

Con il sistema di Destino Oscuro 2 (già usato ne Le Notti di Nibiru) approfondirai la psiche biomeccanica del tuo Pretoriano nell’eterna lotta fra macchina e carne, affrontando le Missiones più rischiose contro il Grande Regno dei lucertoloidi Sserath, i feroci insettoidi Kyroptidi e le altre misteriose razze aliene della Galassia, nel tentativo di restare umano... nonostante le fiamme della distruzione della Guerra delle Aquile fra Roma e Bisanzio, che spezza per la prima volta l’unità di intenti dello slancio di grandezza dell’Umanità romana.

Non solo combattimento: l’ambientazione presenta moltissimi spunti per coinvolgere i Personaggi in indagini oscure e misteriose, o spingerli tra le maglie di intrighi politici velenosi e letali. Quando non sono in Assectum da combattimento, i cibernetici Pretoriani appaiono infatti come super-umani dall’aspetto semi-divino. 

Augusta Universalis è stato scritto da Marzio Morganti, studioso di storia antica e medievale e appassionato di storia militare, per trasmettere un senso di verosimiglianza e immedesimazione nell’ambientazione quanto più forte possibile.

Il gioco mescola elementi storici reali con derive ucroniche e risvolti fantascientifici estremamente suggestivi. Vi ritroverete ad affrontare Missiones di molte nature differenti, e avrete sempre nuovi stimoli per andare avanti!

Augusta Universalis si avvale del sistema di Destino Oscuro 2, lo stesso motore de Le Notti di Nibiru!  

Un sistema pensato per aiutare il Narratore (qui chiamato Demiurgo) nel suo compito di gestire e vivere meravigliose avventure assieme altri Giocatori, che potranno immedesimarsi con estrema facilità nei rispettivi Personaggi. 

Il motore di Augusta Universalis è un sistema rapido, che si concentra sulla descrizione delle azioni e delle situazioni sceniche fuori e dentro al combattimento. I Giocatori avranno vantaggi reali a livello meccanico dalle loro descrizioni e saranno incentivati a rendere la partita più gradevole e immersiva per sé stessi e per tutti gli altri. 

Avrai a disposizione una Scheda di una sola facciata per il tuo Personaggio più la Tabula Systemis, un altro foglio in formato A4 sul quale gestirai i Systemata, i componenti della Tecnolorica, totalmente personalizzabili e stampabili su carte formato Poker (che funzionano come piccole schede compilabili). 

Tabula Praetorianis e Tabula Systemis di Thulile, uno dei PG pregenerati che troverai in Agusta Universalis

Tutto funziona con Test basati su tre domande chiave: cosa fai (il Giocatore sceglie l'Abilità), come lo fai (il Demiurgo sceglie una Caratteristica adeguata in base alla descrizione fatta dal Giocatore), perché lo fai (il Giocatore può sfruttare una serie di risorse del Personaggio, sia emotive che di formazione e background, per ottenere Bonus di vario tipo).  

Bastano alcuni dadi a otto facce, le schede dei PG, gomma e matita e tanta fantasia! Durante un combattimento, i Simboli, tipici di Destino Oscuro, ti aiuteranno a trasformare immediatamente in meccanica qualunque effetto scenico ti venga in mente!

Affronta i conflitti interiori del tuo Personaggio, scopri le vere ragioni che lo spingono ad agire! Trasforma la tua Tecnolorica (l'armatura cibernetica dei Pretoriani), cambia Assectum e scatena il potere dei tuoi Systemata (l'equipaggiamento del Personaggio) per entrare nell'azione e vivere mirabolanti avventure!  

Puoi scegliere il tuo livello di Perk in base alla Ricompensa che vuoi ottenere: In caso di ricompense cartacee, controlla le spese di spedizione più in basso o ritira a mano a Lucca Comcis & Games 2018 presso lo stand Red Glove + Acchiappasogni!

Assicurati di portare un documento, avremo una lista dei finanziatori in modo da poter consegnare le Ricompente. Puoi anche mandare un amico a ritirare in stand, ma in quel caso dagli una fotocopia di un tuo documento, per favore.

Ovviamente, puoi finanziare questo IndieGoGo inDemand anche se hai già partecipato alla campagna Kickstarter! Se vuoi aggiungere qualcosa al tuo Reward, questo è un ottimo momento per farlo approfittando del prezzo speciale.

Se il Kickstarter andrà in porto, consegneremo tutti i reward cartacei a Lucca Comics & Games a chiunque possa venire direttamente in fiera.  

Le copie digitali e tutte le spedizioni verranno evase nella settimana successiva a quella di fine della fiera: i problemi logistici e di organizzazione ci impedirebbero di fare diversamente. Riassumendo tutto l'iter, da Kickstarter ad ora: 

  • 3 Settembre: inizio del Kickstarter! La campagna ha avuto uno straordinario successo e tutti gli stretch goal sono stati sbloccati! Chi vi ha partecipato, ha potuto prenotare incredibili esclusive che stiamo già realizzando. 
  • 17 Settembre: Fine del Kickstarter e inizio di questa campagna IndieGoGo per le prenotazioni extra. 
  • 10 Ottobre: invio intervista via email per sapere se verrrete a Lucca Comics & Games a rititirare a mano i Reward o se preferite pagare le spese di spedizione extra e riceverli a casa. In questo caso, dovrete fornire anche l'indirizzo di spedizione. 
  • Dal 31 Ottobre: consegna a mano a tutti coloro verranno in fiera presso lo stand Red Glove + Acchiappasogni. Occorre presentare prova di Reward, ovviamente. 
  • Dal 30 Novembre: consegna immediata di tutte le copie digitali, spedizione e comunicazione numero di tracciamento di tutti i pacchetti cartacei. 

Costi di Spedizione

Se non potete ritirare a mano le vostre copie di Augusta Universalis a Lucca Comics & Games, ve le spediremo a casa. Ecco i costi di spedizione che vi chiederemo di aggiungere al perk, al momento opportuno.

Nota bene: i costi qui elencati sono riferiti all'Italia. Per spedizioni all'estero dovremo verificare un preventivo al momento. 

  • Un singolo manuale: 8€
  • Pacchetti completi: 15€

Segue una breve raccolta di articoli che parlano di Augusta Universalis! 

  • LEGANERD: Recensione della versione beta;
  • GDRPLAYERS: Recensione della versione beta;
  • STORIE DI RUOLO: Intervista agli autori, Luca De Marini e Marzio Morganti;
  • LA TANA DEI GOBLIN: Presentazione e recensione della versione beta;
  • VIDEOGAMES & DINTORNI: Articolo by Marco Valle;
  • TEAM NERD: Prime impressioni su Augusta Universalis;
  • GEEK.PIZZA: Presentazione di Augusta Universalis e prime impressioni;
  • JUST NERD: News e presentazione;
  • GDR MAGAZINE: Presentazione e prime impressioni;
  • GDR ADDICTED: Video presentazione e analisi del gioco:

Introduzione all'Ambientazione dall'autore Marzio MorgantiIntroduzione al Sistema dall'autore Luca De MariniColonna Sonora Originale by Sonor Village: Main ThemePLEASE NOTE: this IndieGoGo InDemand Campaign refers to the Italian version of the game only.Cos'è questa pagina?Il Kickstarter di Augusta Universalis GDR è stato un grandissimo successo ma non hai fatto in tempo a partecipare o ti sei accorto dell'esistenza del gioco solo ora? Hai bisogno di aggiungere Add-on rispetto al Reward che ti sei assicurato tramite Kickstarter? Vorresti l'Artbook di Auguni in formato cartaceo oltre che in PDF?Allora questa è la pagina che fa per te. Questa campagna IndieGoGo InDemand resterà aperta per 30 giorni e ti permetterà di prenotare la tua copia di Auguni. Potrai ritirarla a mano a Lucca Comics & Games presso lo stand Red Glove + Acchiappasogni, senza spese di spedizione, o riceverla comodamente a casa tua: in questo caso controlla il paragrafo sulle Spese di Spedizione. Roma non è caduta come la Storia insegna.Nell’anno 2771 a.U.c. l’Impero controlla non solo l’intero pianeta Terra, ma anche numerosi altri mondi, sia dentro che fuori il nostro sistema solare. Incrociatori da guerra viaggiano per milioni di chilometri utilizzando i Limes Orbitalis che curvano artificialmente lo spaziotempo dall’orbita di pianeti lontani.La nuova filosofia sincretistica del Logos ha estinto le guerre di religione.Un consiglio di Cesari da tutto il mondo compone il Senato Imperiale, presieduto da un solo Augusto scelto per adozione dal precedente imperatore.La maggior parte degli abitanti dell’Impero vive un’utopia di giustizia sociale, progresso e pace....cosa potrebbe mai andare male...?Milites, alle armi! Riunitevi sotto il vessillo! Tecnolorica indossata, Systemata attivati... pronti all'impatto delle teste di ponte! Nelle fredde distese siderali si annida qualcosa di sinistro, terrificante, alieno a questo stesso Universo... ma noi difenderemo l'Impero dai suoi temibili nemici, o moriremo nel tentativo! Livia Comnena Akiko Augusta scaccia un Trono Oscuro nell'orbita superiore di Persephone, sistema stellare di SyldeIn Augusta Universalis sarete super Pretoriani cibernetici, corazzati con eccezionali armature potenziate, in grado di trasformarsi cambiando Assectum a seconda delle necessità!  Affronterete combattimenti straordinari e Missiones esplorative su pianeti lontani e sconosciuti. Investigherete i misteri di civiltà aliene scomparse da eoni, e affronterete la minaccia dei terrificanti Troni Oscuri, creature da incubo che portano morte e distruzione nel Cosmo. Difenderete l'Impero e il vostro Cesare sia dalle minacce politiche che lo dilaniano dall'interno che dai nemici che vorrebbero distruggerlo dall'esterno. Pronti a viaggiare al di là delle stelle conosciute... per la maggior gloria dell'Impero?!Augusta Universalis sarà un Gioco di Ruolo completo, contenente una ricca e suggestiva ambientazione ucronica fantascientifica, e un regolamento rapido e focalizzato sull'interpretazione del Personaggio e sull'immedesimazione del Giocatore. Stiamo realizzando un libro di 240 pagine e più, formato A4, copertina rigida, tutto a colori. Per i giocatori...

story:
THE BASICS

Hammer of Democracy is going to deliver a set of World War 2 miniatures gaming rules, suitable to play anything from small skirmish actions to sweeping battles with lots of miniatures.

It is aimed squarely at providing a fun, quick-moving battle without getting bogged down in excessive detail, though we find the game to be surprisingly realistic at times as well.

The rules will be based on the successful Squad Hammer rules and it’s derivatives Trench Hammer, October Hammer and Winter Hammer, but adapted to the full battle fields of the second world war.

The aim is a one-book solution, giving you all the tools you need to play out countless fun table top encounters, using any miniatures you would like. 

THE ACTUAL PRODUCT

The aim is a PDF rulebook, illustrated modestly and produced to the same standards as other recent Nordic Weasel releases (such as Renegade Scout). 

The intended page count is around 150 pages, much of which will be support material to help set up games and armies. 

That’s it. Nothing fancy, nothing flashy to get hung up on or go wrong later.

You support the campaign and you get a game in return. 

CORE RULES FEATURES

*    Negotiated combat.

We use a concept we call Negotiated Combat to determine the dice rolls.

Essentially, the players will set the target numbers for attacks, based on the factors you feel should be applied to a given situation.

This means that you can be as detailed as you like.

This process takes a little to get used to, but once you are in the groove, it lets you play much faster in a game that feels more realistic and responsive to your input.

Want to factor in that it’s raining? The smoke from a burning Panzer III? That your men didn’t sleep last night? Go for it.

This also makes it phenomenally easy to use any miniatures and vehicles in your collection.

As long as you have a basic idea of how a given weapons system or vehicle functions in real life, you can use it on the table.

We offer a Matrix-game style “argument” system to help you get started but if this sounds a little too wishy-washy, we also offer pre-baked target numbers where you can just look it up on a table.

*    Straight forward command system

Battle is all about friction: No plan ever goes exactly as intended and orders get delayed or mis-understood.

Rather than complex systems of order relay and written commands, we use a simple dice system to determine what you can do each turn.

You are never stuck being unable to move, but you probably won’t ever get to do everything you need to do either.

*    Surprisingly clever damage system

The rules take a broader view of battle effects.

Rather than tracking morale and casualties separately, we take inspiration from the venerable John Hill, creator of Squad Leader, and combine them into a single damage value, assuming that units suffer a loss of confidence as they are subjected to hostile action.

This also means that things like suppressing fire before an assault really works and can be resolved far quicker than in many other games.

As a consequence of this system, withdrawing troops from the front line and rallying them becomes vital, allowing you to be as aggressive or as cautious as suits your play style.

*    Easy to teach

It’s important to us that our games are easy to learn for new players.

Inexperienced players tend to get frustrated if they feel like they are struggling against a system they don’t understand. 

Our core mechanics can be explained in 5 minutes or less, so you can focus on actually solving the tactical challenges on the table, instead of figuring out exactly what to roll for a given situation that just occurred. 

CONTENT WE INTEND TO PROVIDE

*    Two game levels.

The game will be playable at two different levels of action.

The default will be the Platoon level, where each unit represents a single tank, heavy weapon or infantry section.

Players who prefer to think a little bigger will be able to play in Battalion mode, where each unit represents a platoon of vehicles or men. 

*    Scenario compatibility

In Platoon level games, the scale matches that of games like Chain of Command, I Ain’t Been Shot Mum, Crossfire and Advanced Squad Leader.

In Battalion level games, the scale matches that of games like Command Decision and Spearhead.

This allows you to use your pre-built armies, army lists, orders of battle and scenarios, making the transition between rules sets as easy as possible.

*    Random army generators

Tables will be provided to roll up a random army with a few quick dice rolls.

Leaders rarely get to pick their commands: The true test of battle is to win with what you have available, instead of relying on a hand-picked super army.

*    Mission generator

Quickly generate a mission complete with objectives, special circumstances and terrain layout guides.

War is chaos and with the generator, no two battles will be exactly alike. 

*    Lists of equipment and vehicles.

We can’t cover every gadget and truck manufactured in the war, but the rules will provide guidelines for a variety of equipment.

*    Leader types

Different types of commanders to lead your forces. Some may be better at rallying, some may be better at leading the assault and yet some may have unique abilities to help confound your enemies. 

*    The tool box

Like most Nordic Weasel games, we will include a Tool Box full of rules and suggestions, so you can handle everything from blowing up bridges to interrogating prisoners. 

This will help enable you to create scenarios as well as resolving unusual situations as they come up.

*    Campaign rules

No game is truly complete without a way to link your games together.

Rather than a convoluted system that you’ll never get to finish, we’ll offer systems to play a fun, story-driven campaign game and watch your leaders and troops develop a bit along the way.

*    Solo mechanics

We will include at least basic guidelines for solo gamers. 

*    Supporting arms 

Rules will cover all manner of supporting formations, including off-map artillery, air support, partisan activity, command raids and more.

*    Introduction sections

Additional information introducing players new to world war 2 gaming, discussing basics of land warfare, unit types and a broad overview of tactics. 

Ideally will also include painting and basic modeling guides. 

 

POSSIBLE ADDITIONAL CONTENT

*    Pre Battle Sequence

A pre-battle sequence where you can select different fighting styles (such as Extensive Preparations, Frontal Assault, Cunning Deception or Seize Initiative) and dice for unique advantages.

*    Weather rules.

Whether its fighting in the pouring rain or deep snow, we’d like to make weather rules that are interesting and fun to use, rather than being an annoying chore.

*    Army traits

Optional rules to make the armies feel distinct from each other, affecting how they are given orders and what options are available to them on the battle field. 

Think of these as similar to the “national characteristics” many games have. 

 

CHALLENGES AND SOLUTIONS

Any project has challenges that must be overcome.

For rules writing, the main issues tend to be mechanical (do these systems actually work? Are they fun to play?) in nature.

Since we are using an already proven system, we can avoid most of those issues, meaning we can focus on taking what we already know works and adjusting it for the topic in question.

Many game projects run into problems due to unpredictable shipping costs, third parties failing to deliver peripherals or spiraling costs. 

Due to this being a PDF only release, we can avoid almost all of these problems:

There are no expensive components that need to be produced in China and no packages that have to be shipped to backers in Tristan da Cunha.

A final problem that seems to plague some crowd funding projects is that the project simply never gets written. The designer burns out or gets overwhelmed by the project, particularly if they are new or inexperienced.

I would like to point to my track record of writing, completing and releasing dozens of rule sets ranging in size and complexity.
I have run crowd-funding projects before (notably Renegade Scout) and delivered the finished game in a reasonable time frame. 

This does not mean that challenges are impossible. 

For example, I could become ill, suffer a catastrophic computer failure or a family emergency might take up all my time.

While I can alleviate most problems (for example we do have spare computers in the home and I have the ability to work while traveling) any honest creator must admit that there’s a non-zero chance that something terrible could happen, preventing the project from completion.

If so, I am prepared to offer backers with PDF copies of existing Nordic Weasel titles, equal to the amount you backed the campaign for. While that would certainly be a disappointment, at least nobody would be out their money with nothing to show for it.

story:
Menace in Ravenreach

When the group of adventurers arrived in the outpost town of Ravenreach they headed directly to the local tavern. As was usual, it took under the hour until fists started flying, glassware shattering and furniture flying. The fighting ended, just as the last of the locals melted away. 

Their incarceration made the wanderers the ideal candidates for an unusual errand. The Master Minder, the court wizard, requires the capture of a local troll  – alive – for his studies.  Without hesitation they accepted the task and into the wilds they went.

Not exactly start to a Saga of old, but the days are young as they slip into the dark woods.

What to Expect

Menace in Ravenreach by James Thomas- available in Fifth Edition, Pathfinder or Swords & Wizardry versions, is an adventure for mid-level characters. We expect this will be the only only time we offer the premium softcover version for sale.

Within its covers (or the digital PDF file) you will find:

  • New creatures and new magic items.
  • A swift and dangerous journey requested by a powerful NPC.
  • NPCs which are both allies and antagonists.
  • An adventure found while visiting a far away outpost, ruled by the illegitimate son of nobility that has its share of intrigue.
  • The first portion of a two part adventure release, both this title and the sequel are completed. The second part is scheduled for a second indiegogo project in Q1 of 2019.
  • Full-Color Map by Robert Altbauer.

Menace in Ravenreach uses the same formula introduced with our last Indiegogo, we refer to this method including the focused enhancements (stretch goals) that improve the product as total project funding increases with art, extra content written content and digital play enhancing extras (player handouts etc) as...

The Tiny Print Run

Why Indiegogo?

Frog God Games is continuing the use of this indiegogo crowdfunding method for Menace in Ravenreach. This method is almost the inverse of how we design our crowdfunding projects on Kickstarter. We call it the 'Tiny Print Run'.

Thus, Indiegogo projects by Frog God Games will-

  • Be short in duration
  • Be limited to a single title
  • Have options priced between $5-$30
  • Design all stretch goals and project bonus' affect the principle reward only (usually both the PDF and the softcover).
  • Be the only guaranteed method to get the premium print copy (NOTE: the softcover versions  in this printing will not be sold on our website: see FAQ for explanation).
  • Have simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit

Why the Tiny Print Run?

Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.

This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.

Why not use Kickstarter?

We will still be using Kickstarter, frequently, for our large-scale projects. These smaller projects are happening in response to the feedback we have heard from both fans and 'almost' fans alike. We hear the request for less expensive options for our projects and products all the time. A second frequent desire expressed to us, whether at conventions, on social media or in email, is for a larger selection of smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions and not necessitate a full two year campaign.

Additionally, Frog God Games has grown in both sales and brand awareness.  This opportunity will give us the additional resources to invest in the very best books in all of our formats. 

Project Reward 

With the wishes of the fans in mind, this and future Indiegogo projects will fund standalone projects that are both affordable and fun. This project, as well future Tiny Print Run projects, is narrowly focused with all stretch goals adding resources to the principle reward which traditionally would not be feasible for a publisher our size. 

Examples of Enhancements from Higher Funding

During the 15 day primary project period for Menace in Ravenreach  and after the $750 goal is met the focus will be to improve the delivered product. There are no special tiered collectors editions or add-on purchase extras. Thus, as total project funding increases the better the final product will be for everybody.

Examples of the planned extras that increased funding would bring to Menace in Ravenreach-

  • Additional commissions for interior color art specific to the adventure
  • Extra written content commissioned from the author
  • Printed Player Maps
  • Downloadable Options designed for popular virtual table-top software (New creature/NPC tokens etc). 
  • Digital extras (player handouts etc) that are focused on quality table-top play.

Project Delivery

PDF Perks

We will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the Frog God Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.

The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the Frog God Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.

Softcover Perks

Softcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo. 

Overseas Shipping

NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive. We understand this. We cannot do anything about this. Likewise, some countries charge VAT tax or other fees to our customers on receipt. We cannot fraudulently lie about the value of materials we mail out. We are happy to ship you anything regardless of where you live, but we have to stay in business at the same time thus even our lightest books are affected. In the near future we expect to have a print on demand system in place for everyone overseas.

To explain what we mean, please see the shipping calculator for UPS by clicking here- 

https://wwwapps.ups.com/ctc/request?loc=en_US.

story:
This campaign is a continuation of our succesful Kickstarter campaign. We raised enough to produce the game and broke some stretch goals. We decided to run an Indiegogo for all of those who missed the previous crowdfunding, and at the same time, as an oportunity to reach new Stretch Goals for ALL BACKERS, both from Kickstarter and Indigogo.

Welcome to Final Boss, a card game where players compete against each other to defeat the Final Boss.

Finally, it's game night! You and your friends decide to try an old game cartridge you found in the attic. As you blow the dust away you can read "Danger: Final Boss" hand-written in the label, but there is no more info.

"What kind of game is this?" you wonder, as you slide the cartridge in. As soon as you turn on the console power, a lightning strikes your house and a vortex of energy swallows you and your friends into the TV...

 

In Final Boss, players have been swallowed by an evil video game and have to compete against each other to collect Victory Points and defeat the Final Boss.

Every turn, Enemies appear and players will fight them, using their cards to gain an advantage in combat or to sabotage other players. Use your cards wisely and collect as many Victory Points as you can, and you may be able to defeat the Final Boss!

IMPORTANT: Thanks to unlocked Stretch Goals, the game currently have 106 cards!

The base game features 106 cards (74 PowerUps, including Characters, Weapons, Items and Specials; 22 Enemies and 10 Final Bosses) plus more by unlocking Stretch Goals (check the updates to find how many cards does the game have currently). It also includes 12 Power Gem (crystals and tokens), and 15 Victory Coins tokens.

 

 

Hilarious, fast and easy to play

Easy to learn, hard to master. The game mechanics are easy to learn and in a couple of games you will know all the rules to play and have fun with the crazy card effects, however mastering the advanced tactics and combos will require skill and knowledge of all the cards in the game! We've added a few extra optional rules in case you enjoy a real challenge, or if you simply want to make things even crazier :D

 

  • Easy to learn game mechanics, get rollin' in a couple of 20 minutes games!
  • All cards in the game have unique effects, which rewards the skill of the player. Use the right card at the right time!
  • All players can influence the game all the time. NO waiting during another player's turn!
  • Turn the tables in your favor with crazy card combos... or get completely screwed by your friends :)
  • Quick and dynamic 20 minutes games
  • Lots of laughs and fierce competition between friends
  • Crazy cards with parodies of your favourite video games
  • Beautiful looking artwork and retro 80s-90s vibe in every aspect of the game

You can download the rules here

Check this video explaining the basic game mechanics, so that you can get an idea of how the game plays before you decide to pledge anything.

Warning: English with a thick spaniard accent...

 

Stretch Goals:

The more stretch goals we achieve thanks to your help, the more content we will be able to add to the game.

We would love to have a game as big and beautifully looking as possible. We have more content and surprises in mind, please help us reach them!

You can help us with your pledge, and also by spreading the word in social media!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Most relevant pledge levels:

 

Shipping Fees for any country:

Press Start Pledge: 5€

Expansion Pack: 6€

This campaign features 5 exclusive cards available to all backers that pledge for a game:

 

You can also help by buying merchandise at our RedBubble shop where you will find t-shirts, mugs, phone cases and much more. The money raised there will go to unlock Stretch Goals

Take a look at our prototype: 

The final game will look even better as we already have a supplier committed to bring the best quality!

We also did our best to optimize production costs so that the price that our backers pay for the game is as fair as possible.

 

Here's a short video of us playtesting the game:


 This project is available worldwide with friendly customs:

That means that it will be shipped to your doorstep without any troubles with taxes or customs duties. We have an agreement with a logistic center in Hong Kong that will ship the game WORLDWIDE, so no one misses the chance to get it.

About the Creators:

We have spent more than a year and a half making this game. It started while having some beers and discussing that there should be a game that combines all our favourite video games from our childhood (and not so childhood) into one epic crazy game:

There are more than 150 cards designed (we hope to include them in stretch goals or future expansions)

More than a year play-testing the rules and game mechanics

More than 65 cards finished with artwork and ready to print (check some art and process here)

Bios:

 

We are two geeks which grew up surrounded by videogames, we played and replayed for endless hours classics games (and we still do!). Our tortuous careers finally converged into what we love: creating games. If you help us, we promise to make more and more awesome games in the future!

Luis, co-creator and main artist

Luis: Hey! I am the main artist of the game. I grew up playing, among many other games, Sonic 1, 2 and 3 (& Knuckles!). I loved going Hyper Sonic in Angel Island, and I hated Labyrinth Zone. As a kid, I was drawing Sonic ALL THE TIME. A hedgehog that can go Super Saiyan? Yes, please.

 

Later on, I would never forget the spooky vibe of the Forest Temple in Ocarina of Time, and going through the broken bridge to Gerudo's Valley, to finally see what was on the other side. More recently, in the time I find in between illustration and illustration I've been getting all dragon priest masks in Skyrim, and "gitting gud" at Dark Souls. I put a lot of care into making fun and amazing artwork for the cards, I hope you love them!

Rafael, co-creator and designer

Rafael: Hi! I'm the main designer of the game. When I was little I was an avid reader, and loved to play pen and paper role games (still do). I got a Snes when I was a boy and since then I've been hooked to video games. I probably had too much imagination and was daydreaming too often while at the classroom. 

I got my first computer when I was twelve and since then I've been shooting demons on DOOM and splashing headcrabs on Half-Life. I still ragequit when I get a loosing spree at Counter-Strike. My secret vice is 2D fighting games, but I have never gotten good enough at it. Benimaru and Iori are my favourite characters of all time!

I have spent countless hours playtesting and refining the cards and the game, and I think I've come up with the ultimate "friendship destroyer". And yes, I'm a terrible singer...

Special thanks to all other artists and people who contribute to the game:

  • Pablo Broseta
  • Jörn Heidrath
  • Cristina Charneco
  • Aiko van Wingerden
  • Peer Lagerpusch
  • Jordi Toda

And all our playtesters!

Head to our twitter, or facebook to propose new cards, stretch goals or reward levels! We are eager to get your feedback and make our game better!

The money raised will go to:

  • Pay the artists
  • Print the game
  • Ship the game

Some of the money will also go to legal advice and other business related costs.

We are mostly ready for production, only missing a few illustrations for the remaining cards. We will keep you updated with the production progress if we get funded.

Risks and challenges

The main challenge of the game is to get our artists to produce the remaining art for the game timely, so we can send the game on to production as soon as possible. We'll make sure they deliver gorgeous and fun artworks.

The second challenge of the game is that this will be our first game, so we will hire a lawyer and other professionals to ensure every business related issue is done right and everything goes smooth. It's also important to mention that being a parody, our lawyer will review every card to ensure there are no legal issues with copyrights.

The deck will be printed in Asia, so the third challenge is to supervise the production and shipping. If overfunded, one of us will travel to the manufacturing place to supervise everything for the best results. And we'll tweet all the process!
story_txt:
This campaign is a continuation of our succesful Kickstarter campaign. We raised enough to produce the game and broke some stretch goals. We decided to run an Indiegogo for all of those who missed the previous crowdfunding, and at the same time, as an oportunity to reach new Stretch Goals for ALL BACKERS, both from Kickstarter and Indigogo.Welcome to Final Boss, a card game where players compete against each other to defeat the Final Boss.Finally, it's game night! You and your friends decide to try an old game cartridge you found in the attic. As you blow the dust away you can read "Danger: Final Boss" hand-written in the label, but there is no more info."What kind of game is this?" you wonder, as you slide the cartridge in. As soon as you turn on the console power, a lightning strikes your house and a vortex of energy swallows you and your friends into the TV... In Final Boss, players have been swallowed by an evil video game and have to compete against each other to collect Victory Points and defeat the Final Boss.Every turn, Enemies appear and players will fight them, using their cards to gain an advantage in combat or to sabotage other players. Use your cards wisely and collect as many Victory Points as you can, and you may be able to defeat the Final Boss!IMPORTANT: Thanks to unlocked Stretch Goals, the game currently have 106 cards!The base game features 106 cards (74 PowerUps, including Characters, Weapons, Items and Specials; 22 Enemies and 10 Final Bosses) plus more by unlocking Stretch Goals (check the updates to find how many cards does the game have currently). It also includes 12 Power Gem (crystals and tokens), and 15 Victory Coins tokens.  Hilarious, fast and easy to playEasy to learn, hard to master. The game mechanics are easy to learn and in a couple of games you will know all the rules to play and have fun with the crazy card effects, however mastering the advanced tactics and combos will require skill and knowledge of all the cards in the game! We've added a few extra optional rules in case you enjoy a real challenge, or if you simply want to make things even crazier :D 

Easy to learn game mechanics, get rollin' in a couple of 20 minutes games!

All cards in the game have unique effects, which rewards the skill of the player. Use the right card at the right time!
All players can influence the game all the time. NO waiting during another player's turn!
Turn the tables in your favor with crazy card combos... or get completely screwed by your friends :)
Quick and dynamic 20 minutes games

Lots of laughs and fierce competition between friends
Crazy cards with parodies of your favourite video games

Beautiful looking artwork and retro 80s-90s vibe in every aspect of the game
You can download the rules hereCheck this video explaining the basic game mechanics, so that you can get an idea of how the game plays before you decide to pledge anything.Warning: English with a thick spaniard accent...

 
Stretch Goals:The more stretch goals we achieve thanks to your help, the more content we will be able to add to the game.We would love to have a game as big and beautifully looking as possible. We have more content and surprises in mind, please help us reach them!You can help us with your pledge, and also by spreading the word in social media!      Most relevant pledge levels: Shipping Fees for any country:Press Start Pledge: 5€Expansion Pack: 6€This campaign features 5 exclusive cards available to all backers that pledge for a game: You can also help by buying merchandise at our RedBubble shop where you will find t-shirts, mugs, phone cases and much more. The money raised there will go to unlock Stretch GoalsTake a look at our prototype: The final game will look even better as we already have a supplier committed to bring the best quality!We also did our best to optimize production costs so that the price that our backers pay for the game is as fair as possible. Here's a short video of us playtesting the game: This project is available worldwide with friendly customs:That means that it will be shipped to your doorstep without any troubles with taxes or customs duties.
