story:
Remember the time when your friendly local game store used to have those wonderful games small skirmish fantasy battles? You didn't have to spend a lot of money in miniatures. You could simply buy a small box containing a whole band, assemble it and you were ready to play. That's what we want to do! Get back all the fun to the good old days by releasing small bands of 32 mm miniatures suitable for playing skirmish games in a devastated fantastic medieval city!!


Here you have a couple of examples of the miniatures we are offering: 

INDEX

About Us
Why Crowdfunding?
Our miniatures
Perks
Stretch goals
Shipping Information


ABOUT US

Warband-Miniatures is a small project dedicated to create a fantasy miniature range. We want to offer alternative designs of complete bands fully compatible with skirmish games of medieval fantasy. The Sisters of Serens is the first band that we want to produce, but we are planning to release many more in the future!

Our webpage will be ready a couple of months after the campaign, but you can contact us here: 

info@warband-miniatures.com

 Or in our Facebook page, Twitter page, or even Google Plus

The sculptor of the Sisters of Serens is Sergi Torras Figueras. Sergi has sculpted before for Virgil Games, Willy Miniatures and other miniature brands that have been successful in multiple crowdfundings here on Indiegogo. 

We have also managed to involve Escenorama! Escenorama is a spanish company that sells wonderful scenery, items and bases for medieval and modern wargames. They will be offering the resin bases included in the Early Bird pledge and as individual perk. 

For the advertising and promotion of the campaign, we have the support of RN Estudio as crowdfunding manager. Surely you know them from other successful crowdfundings and for their amazing miniatures, gorgeously painted. They will also print in 3D the markers and cast them in resin. 

The miniatures will be printed in 3D resin by 3DA and cast in high quality resin by Miniaturas Alemany.

The markers will be printed in 3D and casted in high quality resin by  RN Estudio


WHY CROWDFUNDING?

The design and production of miniatures is something that requires a lot of effort and an amount of money that we don’t have. We hope that thanks to this crowdfunding, we will find enough skirmish fantasy game enthusiasts to support this project and allow us to make it happen.


OUR MINIATURES

We are offering: 8 great miniatures cast in high quality resin with removable and interchangeable weapons (but the Matriarch),  2 different counters cast in resin additional weapons and objects sprues to personalize your miniatures. The miniatures are 32 mm height, and their hands are little bit oversized to allow better pinning

Please note that the weapons included in the miniatures may differ from those displayed in the images below. Read the text under the images to know the included weapons.

MATRIARCH

Powerful leader of the Sisters of Serens warband. Comes with two weapons double handed hammer and iron whip. Her hands are only compatible with the weapons already included in the miniature and - if unlocked - with the WEAPONS SPRUE 3

AUGUR

Blessed by Seren herself, the Augur is the seer of the Sisters of Serens warband. Comes with two daggers and a removable book of Seren (see OBJECTS SPRUE). Her hands are compatible with the SUPERIORS, SISTERS, NOVICES, WEAPONS SPRUE 1 and - if unlocked - WEAPONS SPRUE 2

SUPERIOR 1

The Sister Superiors are ones in charge of keeping the peace in the monastery. Comes with iron whip, Serens Hammer and removable iron halo (see OBJECTS SPRUE). Her hands are compatible with the AUGUR, SISTERS, NOVICES, WEAPONS SPRUE 1 and - if unlocked - WEAPONS SPRUE 2


SISTER 1A / SISTER 1B

After years of serving Seren, the Sisters became tireless warriors. Sister 1A comes with Serens hammer and maze. Sister 1B comes with sling and flail. Their hands are compatible between them and with the AUGUR, SUPERIORS, NOVICES, WEAPONS SPRUE 1 and WEAPONS SPRUE 2. Their heads are compatible between them, with the NOVICE and - if unlocked - with the HEADS SPRUE.

NOVICE 1A / NOVICE 1B

Once rebellious, they are now in the way of Serens . Novice 1A comes with two weapons - Dagger and Flail. Novice 1B comes with two weapons - flail and hammer. Their hands are compatible between them, with the AUGUR, SUPERIORS, SISTERS, WEAPONS SPRUE 1 and WEAPONS SPRUE 2. Their heads are compatible between them, with the SISTER and - if unlocked - with the HEADS SPRUE.


INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE SUPERIOR

If the Matriarch is the leader, the Sister Superiors are ones next to her. Comes with double handed hammer, free hand and buckler. Her hands are compatible with the AUGUR, SISTERS, NOVICES, WEAPONS SPRUE 1 and with WEAPONS SPRUE 2 - This miniature won't be available once the crowdfunding ends!

HIDDEN MARKER

This astonishing 3D marker represents a Superior hidden to ambush an unknown enemy.

MOON STONE MARKER

This tremendous marker represents a fragment of the moon that fell over the city when the comet hit the satellite.

WEAPON SPRUE 1

This weapon sprue comes with 9 interchangeable weapons compatible with all the present and future HENCHWOMEN and SISTER SUPERIOR MODELS cast in high quality resin.

WEAPON SPRUE 2

This weapon sprue comes with 7 interchangeable weapons compatible with all the present and future HENCHWOMEN and SISTER SUPERIOR MODELS cast in high quality resin.


OBJECT SPRUE

This object sprue comes with 4 different objects adaptable to all the MODELS cast in high quality resin.


PERKS

ALL THE PERKS INCLUDE WORLDWIDE SHIPMENT!!!

You can contribute with any Perk any time during the campaign, when the campaign ends you will be asked to choose which miniature(S) from the available ones of your(S) Perks(S) do you want.

PERK 1 - SPRUE - 4 EUR

The founder will recieve one SPRUE (weapon, objects or heads) of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

PERK 2 - HENCHWOMAN - 7 EUR

The founder will recieve one HENCHWOMAN miniature (SISTER or NOVICE) of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

PERK 3 - 2 MAKERS - 8 EUR

The founder will recieve two MARKERS (HIDDEN or MOON STONE) of his/her choice. Cast in high quality resin.

PERK 4 - HEROINE - 8 EUR

The founder will recieve one HEROINE (MATRIARCH, AUGUR or SUPERIOR) of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

Note please that the SPECIAL CHARACTERS are not included in this perk.

PERK 5 - SPECIAL CHARACTER - 9 EUR

The founder will recieve one SPECIAL CHARACTER (Indiegogo Sister Superior) of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

PERK 6 - 5 MEMBERS (EARLY BIRD) - 35 EUR

The founder will recieve five miniatures from the HENCHWOMAN or HEROINE range of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

Aditionally the founder will recieve 5 gorgeus bases from Escenorama

Note please that the SPECIAL CHARACTERS are not included in this perk.

LIMITED TO 55 UNITS!

PERK 7 - 5 MEMBERS - 35 EUR

The founder will recieve five miniatures from the HENCHWOMAN or HEROINE range of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

Note please that the SPECIAL CHARACTERS are not included in this perk.

PERK 8 - 10 MEMBERS - 70 EUR

The founder will recieve ten miniatures from the HENCHWOMAN or HEROINE range of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

Aditionally the founder will recieve two SPRUES (WEAPONS, OBJECTS or HEADS) of his/her choice from the unlocked ones. Cast in high quality resin.

Note please that the SPECIAL CHARACTERS are not included in this perk.


STRETCH GOALS
As the campaign has ended, the stretch goals are no longer supported.
Once the campaign has reached to the"Founded!" status we will start to unlock more Addons and miniatures. If we reach to:

6.000 EUR
We will unlock the SISTER 1B (HENCHWOMAN) cast in high quality resin.

6.500 EUR
We will unlock the NOVICE 1B (HENCHWOMAN) cast in high quality resin. 

7.000 EUR
We will unlock the HEAD SPRUE (SPRUE) cast in high quality resin.

8.000 EUR
We will unlock the SUPERIOR 2 (HEROINE) cast in high quality resin.

9.000 EUR
We will unlock the SISTER 2A (HENCHWOMAN) AND WEAPON SPRUE 2(SPRUE) with interchangeable weapons compatible with all the present and future HENCHWOMEN and the SISTER SUPERIOR MODEL(S) both cast in high quality resin.

10.000 EUR
We will unlock the SUPERIOR 3 (HEROINE) cast in high quality resin.

11.000 EUR
We will unlock the NOVICE 2A (HENCHWOMAN) cast in high quality resin.

12.000 EUR
We will unlock the GREAT MATRIARCH (SPECIAL CHARACTER) cast inhigh quality resin.

13.000 EUR
We will unlock the OGRE (SPECIAL CHARACTER) cast in high quality resin.

13.500 EUR
We will unlock the WEAPON SPRUE 3 (SPRUE) cast in high quality resin, with new interchangeable weapons compatible with the MATRIARCH MODEL.

14.500 EUR
More stretch goals to come...


SHIPPING INFORMATION

ALL THE PERKS INCLUDE FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPMENT

THE ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE IS APRIL 2016

NEW ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE: NOVEMBER 2015!!

After making again my calculations I have decided to shorten the delivering times to almost the minimum. We will also start working in the first stretch goal now! And when one stretch goal is unlocked we will start working in the next one to reduce the production time. We will also make some tasks in parallel, this is going to add a lot of stress on us but I think It will be worthy. By doing this, according to my calculations the last package should be delivered in mid November.

 ¿Why so long? It's not going to take us so long but we don't want anybody to get nervous. Depending on the unlocked stretch goals, production times may vary. In any case we will start working in the new miniatures (if unlocked) during the campaign and we will not start a new crowdfunding until all the miniatures from this one have been delivered.

We will unlock the NOVICE 2A (HENCHWOMAN) cast in high quality resin.

12.000 EUR
We will unlock the GREAT MATRIARCH (SPECIAL CHARACTER) cast inhigh quality resin.

13.000 EUR
We will unlock the OGRE (SPECIAL CHARACTER) cast in high quality resin.

13.500 EUR
We will unlock the WEAPON SPRUE 3 (SPRUE) cast in high quality resin, with new interchangeable weapons compatible with the MATRIARCH MODEL.

14.500 EUR
More stretch goals to come...



SHIPPING INFORMATION

ALL THE PERKS INCLUDE FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPMENT

THE ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE IS APRIL 2016


NEW ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE: NOVEMBER 2015!!


After making again my calculations I have decided to shorten the delivering times to almost the minimum. We will also start working in the first stretch goal now! And when one stretch goal is unlocked we will start working in the next one to reduce the production time. We will also make some tasks in parallel, this is going to add a lot of stress on us but I think It will be worthy. By doing this, according to my calculations the last package should be delivered in mid November.

 ¿Why so long? It's not going to take us so long but we don't want anybody to get nervous. Depending on the unlocked stretch goals, production times may vary. In any case we will start working in the new miniatures (if unlocked) during the campaign and we will not start a new crowdfunding until all the miniatures from this one have been delivered.

story:
Zombie Doctor is a fun and frantic card-turning game. Amputate, reattach and swap limbs in a desperate bid to stay alive. It's your turn not to turn! 

You're stranded in a hospital during the zombie apocalypse. Will you help or hinder your medical colleagues? Each player chooses a character and tries to keep him or her alive for as long as possible by using special cards. These cards can have a fantastic or gruesome effect on limbs.

The game is designed for 2-4 players (preferably 4), lasts for around 60 minutes and is suitable for ages 15+, due to the comic zombie gore.

It's small enough to fit in your pocket and is suitable to play at parties or if you have a spare hour with friends and family.

The game is easy to learn but the elements of luck and strategy will keep avid board gamers entertained and challenged. 

We are providing FREE SHIPPING on all UK orders as well as low shipping costs for the rest of the World.

 

'The mechanics of the game can easily be picked up in five minutes or less, and are simple and robust enough that they can be extrapolated upon...the game begins with some tit for tat exchanges until grudges have been thoroughly formed, at which point the ill-fated doctors begin to have gruesome things happen to them. It is paced well, and makes for an excellent party game.' - Brendan Cass, d-Infinity

 

 

Hi, my name is Colin Hutton. I am the sole creator of Zombie Doctor. I have over 10 years' experience in graphic and web design, as well as having a children's book successfully funded on Kickstarter two years ago.

The idea of Zombie Doctor had been rattling in my head for over a year before I started work on it. I had the initial idea of using cards as body parts, but no story to go with it. It was only when I was watching the last season of The Walking Dead that it clicked, zombie body parts!

This was a good start, but there needed to be a fun mechanic in place to allow players to remove cards and swap them. My wife was watching all of Grey's Anatomy from start to finish, and she would tell me about some of the disgusting and outrageous surgeries. It dawned on me that a hospital would be a fantastic setting for this game, as it would give a reason for these characters to be chopping off limbs and sticking them back on! Thus Zombie Doctor was born!

I had created a very crude version of the game and did a lot of testing to make sure the balance was just right. I then spent quite a while designing and illustrating the characters. There are a lot of zombie games and comics out there with a very similar visual style. I wanted to stay away from that and opted for a more retro cartoon feel. I think this makes it more appealing for a wider audience.

The game has been playtested many times; with friends, family and strangers. I think it hits the perfect blend of balance, skill, luck and most importantly, fun!

The scheduled delivery date for the game is April 2018, but this should be the absolute latest it will be. The final proofs have been sent off and I expect it to be printed and shipped in March.

As with any project, there are risks. However, I am very confident this process will run smoothly. I have been through this process before with a previously successful Kickstarter campaign, so I have a strong understanding of costs, time frames and potential hidden costs.

story:
Welcome to the universe. Here's what comes next.

The universe is a rough place, and now you're in the thick of it. Whether you're fighting the Bactaran occupation that begins almost as soon as first contact is established, exploring the new frontier of space after humanity throws off its chains, or working towards the unification of all the species of the Orion Arm of the Milky Way galaxy, Afterverse puts the universe in front of you and sets you against it.  

The d6-based game system is versatile and powerful. The usage of hit banks minimizes dice rolls and keeps gameplay flowing smoothly, while letting players control their risk factors. Characters earn XP through the innovative Motivation system, bridging the gap between powergamers and roleplayers. 

Set your campaign at any time across hundreds of years of future history. Every time period has its own events, conflicts, cultures, and technologies. Encounter enemies and allies of all shapes and sizes. Join the revolution, become space pirates, or command military might in space in epic wars across the galaxy.

The Book

The Afterverse book features nearly 300 pages of game rules, settings, and adventures. Over 150 pieces of artwork created over the last five years illustrate the living universe, bringing your games to life. The full-size pages will be printed in full color and hardcover bound. The book contains all the information players and GMs need to run an Afterverse campaign, including character creation, base rules, the setting's history, and more.

If you'd like a sneak peek of what the sourcebook will look like, as well as an overview of the most important rules, check out the Quickstart Rules for Players!

Action Cards

Afterverse's Action Cards help you track your character's hit banks. Each card features beautiful character art, a place to store your hit counters, and a summary of the relevant rules. These cards help player keep track of not only their hit banks, but also the actions their character has available to them.

The D6 Bank Game System

The Afterverse game system is based on pools of 6-sided dice. For most skill tests, you'll add the relevant attribute, such as Agility, to the relevant skill, such as Melee; this determines the size of your dice pool. If the test involves a Specialization and you have that specialization, you'll add two more dice. Situational modifiers may alter this pool further.

After rolling, any dice that come up as a 5 or 6 count as a hit; if you get enough hits, you've succeeded the test. Sometimes, instead, hits will be banked to be spent over time.

The initiative system in combat is based on this bank system. You'll roll your character's Reaction plus Perception, and bank your hits into your Initiative Point (IP) bank. Turn order starts with the highest IP bank and proceeds in order to the lowest; as each character acts, they will spend one or more hits from this bank. If the character has enough hits in the bank, they may perform additional actions by doubling the IP cost of the second action. 

But it may be wise to conserve your IP, because this same IP bank is used for dodging. When you are being attacked, you may spend one or more points to set the threshold which the attacker will need for their attack to succeed. This greatly impacts the strategic decisions of the game. Covering fire is invaluable, as you can force the enemy to spend their IP bank dodging your shots instead of shooting back. 

Finally, space combat is built on this same rule set. The Body Class system allows entities which are an order of magnitude larger than others to operate within the same combat at the same time; smaller entities receive a multiplier on their initiative rolls, while larger entities receive a multiplier on damage dealt, allowing a tiny vessel or even an individual person to act in the same combat as a battleship without skipping a beat. 

Often, when in space combat, several characters will all be performing important and unique roles in the fight. The ship's captain makes decisions and controls the deployment of the ship's countermeasures. The pilot may position the ship in different ways in preparation to attack, defend, or evade. The engineer is in charge of repairing systems as they get damaged, managing the ship's waste heat, and supercharging systems which will be required soon. The ship's tactical officers will control the firing of weapons. The ship's crew, each with their own complimentary set of skills, must work together under the leadership of their captain in order to position their ship for attack, supercharge the coilguns, and finally, deal the critical blow against the enemy, drawing upon the banks from every crew position to maximize the damage against their target.

The Story

My name is Ray Nothnagel. For my entire life, I've been a fan of tabletop games, science fiction, and real-world space travel. I've been working on the Afterverse rule set for the last five years and playtesting it for the last three. I've been designing the Afterverse setting since I was in junior high school - this universe has been kicking around in one form or another for twenty years, and I have the bad spaceship doodles from high school study halls to prove it. The publication of this sourcebook is just one part of the grand scheme for Afterverse. The game system has come a long way since it started as little more than a homebrew variation of Shadowrun. Since that time, it has evolved into a unique game with innovative concepts and lots of refinements. The time spent on the game system has resulted in a robust and fun roleplaying experience where the rules enhance the setting, and don't get in the way of the storytelling.

This is the second fundraising campaign. The first was already a success, and production is well underway on the sourcebook, which will be finished either in October or November. We now hope to allow everyone to order the book, even if you missed the first campaign.

I hope we've piqued your interest. If you have any questions about the game or this campaign, please don't hesitate to ask.

story:
SimuCon 5119 planning and funding continues herewithin. 

Timing: Dates, shall be Leyan the 10th of Koaratos through Restday the 14th in the year 5119, Modern Era. For the vernacularly challenged among us, that’s July 10-14, 2019.

Location: The primary venue, as in the recent past, shall be the humble inn at the Sheraton Westport Chalet in St Louis. 

Coinage: This is a crowdfunding campaign. Allow us to assist you with the lightening of your purses. While this gracious lightening service is being so generously offered, please avail yourselves of the important point that SimuCon is free to attend! No one, no matter how indigent or in need of bathing, shall be turned away. So come on in... join the fest... there’s a seat for you at the table.

Experiences: Yeah, there will be some. There’ll be some old favorites, and some new favorites, and some new, yet-to-be-determined-if-anyone-liked-them-or-not activities. 

Side Quests: Yeah, there will be some of these too. Again with the old favorites, new favorites references. If there's anything you would like to organize and run during SimuCon, let us know. Be ye warned: venturing outside the Inn into the environs and dangers of St Louis is beyond the jurisdictions and protections of SimuCon. You’re on your own out there! ...but if it’s a good idea, go for it!!

Really lookin’ forward to a rockin’ SimuCon y’all!!!

story:
Hello all.
My name is Pawel (PJG), and I would like to tell you in a nutshell why I decided to do it all. After 9 years collecting figurines I felt that something in my collection was missing, so I started filling this gap. This is how the idea of the dark and decay figurines came up - the Rotten Factory climate. Today, thanks to "indiegogo", I decided to share with you my passion and unique artifacts, to give you possibility to fill your collection with something that you have not had so far.

Today Rotten Factory is not just a passion that intertwines with my daily life. For several months now, it is also a thriving company offering design and production of high quality  figurines for gamers, collectors and painters. Thanks to the campaign, I will be able to further develop, create more products and my models will enjoy not only me but also you!

Take a look:
https://rottenfactory.eu/store/index.php
https://www.facebook.com/ROTTEN.FACTORY.MINIATURES

The main goal of the project is to raise funds for the realization of new figures from the new Rotten Factory line. The models, that will arise thanks to your support and will go to your hands, are unique and created specially for this event. They were not previously available for sale, so it can be said that these are fresh, still fragrant with resin models. I will create for you many more of truly exceptional models which, with the development of grants, will appear in the offer. So remember if you give more you will get more. ;)

Buying Miniatures – How it works

If you buy a miniature (let's say signed by „A” mark), You will be asked for your choice after the campaign will end. The more people will take part in it the more different figurines will be available at the end of this project.

An exception is the Rotten warriors pack set („C”), which contain specific 9 miniatures. 

Stretch goals – How it works

Miniatures with the red closed padlock on it will be unblocked after the amount of campaign will reach the amount shown on this graphic.
C’mon! catch 'em all! ;)

What does „ONLY ON INDIEGOGO” mean?

It means that these specific miniatures (ones signified by this phrase), are limited only to this project and won't be sold after it.

 

Perks:

 

 

Stretch goals - What'll come next:

 

 

I know how important is quality, which is backed by proper mold preparation and the use of top quality materials. It is also important to keep the deadlines and I am focused to deliver all shipments as soon as possible to their new owners. Currently, I am the boss of myself and I care about everything from the idea through design, execution to sales. The only fear I have is that the new models delivery time may be slightly longer when the number of users increase (I am counting on it by the way). I would like to ask for understanding, and I undertake to ensure that the entire process of casting and shipping will go smoothly. Of course, I will inform you about the progress of my work on a regular basis.

 

You are interested in the project, but do not have the funds to support it? No problem!

Money is not everything. The knowledge and skills, that I can develop thanks to you, are invaluable. All the time, I am looking for passionate and creative people to work together.

If you have questions, suggestions or ideas you would like to share with me, please write to info@rottenfactory.eu.
 

The shipping cost will depend on the number of models purchased and will be calculated at the end of the campaign.
You will be able to pay for shipping through Rotten Factory webstore.

Shipping cost:

Free shipping for everyone who will support the project for $100 or more

For those who will support the project for less than $100:
Poland - 10 PLN
Europe - 5 - 8 EUR
ROW - 5,50 - 13,50 USD

story:
A Little Background

I'm Kevin Elliott, founder of Collide-O-Scope Edutainment. I originally created Carousel - The Card Game back in 2009 and everyone who played it in its original prototype form loved the game. Life goes on and things happen that take priority over other things. Fast forward through high school, college, a few jobs, and marriage, and Carousel was sitting dusty on the shelf. I have finally dug back into it and I am pleased to present to you the final version of Carousel - smaller, sharper, cleaner, and ready for the world. 

Since 2009, finishing Carousel and creating other games have been ever-present in my mind. Creating games, especially those which can be educational and informative, is my passion, and I'd love to share more of my games with you. That starts with Carousel. While I do have other games available through Print-On-Demand means, Carousel is my first attempt at a larger bulk run of games to put into stores and get into more hands.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm asking for help in funding $4,000. This will help me get (at least) 500 sets of Carousel, marketing supplies, access to venues/festivals, and gives just a little room in case of miscellaneous expenses in this endeavor. I'll get the games printed through TheGameCrafter, which means printed in the U.S.A., and at this point, I will be doing the fulfillment of any Perks. If we can't get to $4000, $500 or more will make enough of a dent to get sets printed in a larger quantity. If we raise more than $4,000, that's amazing and SO appreciated, and we'll get even more sets printed and into players' hands.

The Impact

Successfully funding Carousel - The Card Game would be a game-changer for me, personally and professionally. It would help me to secure a place in the industry of game development as I put copies in stores and get more exposure for my games. My dream, since I was young, has been to make games that have a positive impact, and this campaign could help turn that dream into a reality. 

Other Ways You Can Help

ANY donation amount is appreciated more than you can know.

Even if you aren't able to donate, there's a lot you can do to help out!

Spread the Word - Tell everyone you can about Carousel - The Card Game. Talk it up. Talk about this campaign and the need for support. Talk about the business and other games I have available. Make sure everyone knows what Collide-O-Scope Edutainment is and what I aim to do (create games that make a positive impact and are educational without feeling like school). 

Connect - Find us on Facebook, at cosegames.com, and on thegamecrafter.com. Find me on LinkedIn. E-mail me. Let's get in touch. I'm happy to answer questions and I love meeting new people. Know someone who might want Carousel in their shop? Help us get connected! I've heard it said that each person is only seven connections away  (friend of friend of friend of friend of...) from someone they already know. So this is totally easy-peasy! Tell your friends and pretty soon everyone on planet earth will be playing Carousel! One can dream, right?

Review - Played any of my other games? If you enjoyed them, let people know what you thought! Let me know what you thought, too! It's always helpful to have reviews available for prospective buyers. If you didn't love them, I'm always open to constructive feedback so I can improve my skills and make more of what you love.

Retail - If you own a game store or online shop and you're interested in adding Carousel to your inventory, let's talk!

A Little Background
I'm Kevin Elliott, founder of Collide-O-Scope Edutainment. I originally created Carousel - The Card Game back in 2009 and everyone who played it in its original prototype form loved the game. Life goes on and things happen that take priority over other things. Fast forward through high school, college, a few jobs, and marriage, and Carousel was sitting dusty on the shelf. I have finally dug back into it and I am pleased to present to you the final version of Carousel - smaller, sharper, cleaner, and ready for the world. 
Since 2009, finishing Carousel and creating other games have been ever-present in my mind. Creating games, especially those which can be educational and informative, is my passion, and I'd love to share more of my games with you. That starts with Carousel. While I do have other games available through Print-On-Demand means, Carousel is my first attempt at a larger bulk run of games to put into stores and get into more hands.

What We Need & What You Get
I'm asking for help in funding $4,000. This will help me get (at least) 500 sets of Carousel, marketing supplies, access to venues/festivals, and gives just a little room in case of miscellaneous expenses in this endeavor. I'll get the games printed through TheGameCrafter, which means printed in the U.S.A., and at this point, I will be doing the fulfillment of any Perks. If we can't get to $4000, $500 or more will make enough of a dent to get sets printed in a larger quantity. If we raise more than $4,000, that's amazing and SO appreciated, and we'll get even more sets printed and into players' hands.

The Impact
Successfully funding Carousel - The Card Game would be a game-changer for me, personally and professionally. It would help me to secure a place in the industry of game development as I put copies in stores and get more exposure for my games. My dream, since I was young, has been to make games that have a positive impact, and this campaign could help turn that dream into a reality. 
Other Ways You Can Help
ANY donation amount is appreciated more than you can know.
Even if you aren't able to donate, there's a lot you can do to help out!
Spread the Word - Tell everyone you can about Carousel - The Card Game. Talk it up. Talk about this campaign and the need for support. Talk about the business and other games I have available. Make sure everyone knows what Collide-O-Scope Edutainment is and what I aim to do (create games that make a positive impact and are educational without feeling like school). 
Connect - Find us on Facebook, at cosegames.com, and on thegamecrafter.com. Find me on LinkedIn. E-mail me. Let's get in touch. I'm happy to answer questions and I love meeting new people. Know someone who might want Carousel in their shop? Help us get connected! I've heard it said that each person is only seven connections away  (friend of friend of friend of friend of...) from someone they already know. So this is totally easy-peasy! Tell your friends and pretty soon everyone on planet earth will be playing Carousel! One can dream, right?
Review - Played any of my other games? If you enjoyed them, let people know what you thought! Let me know what you thought, too! It's always helpful to have reviews available for prospective buyers. If you didn't love them, I'm always open to constructive feedback so I can improve my skills and make more of what you love.
Retail - If you own a game store or online shop and you're interested in adding Carousel to your inventory, let's talk!

story:
Thank you for your visit. We have finished the campaign on Indiegogo. Please visit our online store on our website : https://doublehead-kids.de/shop/

 

We are very happy that you found our little project among all the great projects on Indiegogo. My children (13, 10, 4) and I would like to introduce our little family project to you here. Here on Indiegogo we continue our successful kickstarter campaign from May 2020. So you can immediately benefit from 7 achieved stretch goals that have already been reached. 

We would be happy if you now take a closer look at our game and support us. A big thank you Jörg + kids

---->

Danke für euren Besuch. Wir haben die Kampagne auf Indiegogo beendet. Bitte besucht unseren Online-Shop auf unserer Website : https://doublehead-kids.de/shop/

Wir freuen uns sehr, dass Du unser kleines Projekt unter all den großen Projekten auf Indiegogo gefunden haben. Meine Kinder (13, 10, 4) und ich möchten Dir hier unser kleines Familienprojekt vorstellen. Hier auf Indiegogo setzen wir unsere erfolgreiche Kickstarter-Kampagne vom Mai 2020 fort. Du kann also sofort von 7 erreichten Stretch-Zielen (Erweiterungen) profitieren, die bereits erreicht worden sind. 

Wir würden uns freuen, wenn Du jetzt einen genaueren Blick auf unser Spiel werfen und uns unterstützen würdest. Ein großes Dankeschön Jörg + Kids

 

 Alle Informationen zum Spiel ab Mitte der Seite auch in Deutsch - bitte nach unten scrollen. <---
 

Theofilos from Boardgame Stories says: "If you are in a mood for a casual card game, which is easy to learn and play while being quite tactical, this might be the one for you! There are not many games out there that strictly play in teams, and that’s always a fun aspect. This element lets you bluff, be cutthroat and cooperate, at the same time! That’s the case as you try to find your teammate during the first battles of the game, creating some interesting decisions and situations." (Read full report)

 

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS is based on the popular german Doppelkopf trick-taking game. Play Doppelkopf with these beautiful family-friendly cards. Easy to learn – long game fun.

The Doppelkopf-Game finds more and more enthusiastic fans and supporters, who organize themselves in clubs and even in the German Doppelkopf Association (DDV). Doppelkopf even manages to replace the extremely popular game Skat as the favourite card game of the Germans. Doppelkopf probably originated from the game “Schafkopf”, which already had a set of rules since 1895.

GAME PRINCIPLES

Dive into a series of exciting card battles and play togehter in everchanging teams! You must gain valuable Silver Coins by skillfully using your cards. Whoever gains the most, courageously encountering their opponents, wins Golden Coins, the game’s victory points. The first player to earn a predetermined number of Gold Coins wins the game!

THE TWIST

The twist of the game is that at the beginning of a new round players do not know their teammate. Only when the Prince and Princess Cards (“Team”) are laid out bit by bit, the picture becomes clearer and the players recognize in which team they are playing. In Team Prince/Princess (players with Prince and Princess Cards) or in Team Without (players without Prince and Princess Cards). Each round of the game is played differently and in different teams.

FOR OUR JAPANESE FRIENDS:

ダブルヘッド キッズ(Doublehead Kids)は4人単位(エクスペンションゲームは6人が遊べる)で遊ぶカードゲームです。ダブルヘッドはダブルコップ(Doppelkopf)という家庭ゲームをベースにしたものです。ダブルコップというのは1895年からドイツでよく遊べられたゲームであり、様々な形式があります。現在、SKATというゲームを上回わりドイツで一番人気のあるゲームになりました。ダブルヘッド キッズ は6歳以上の子供達を対象とします。（プレーヤーは1〜20の数字を読める必要性があります。）成功ポイント(ゴール）の設定によってゲームは30〜60分の時間がかかります。ゲームプリンスパル：

プレーヤーは決闘カードを置き、2つの交互チームとして遊びます。

各プレーヤーは巧みに各自のカードを利用しシルバーコインを獲得します。一番多くのシルバーコインを獲得したプレーヤーは、反対側のプレーヤーの「フォックスfoxesカード」獲得する、または、勇気を持って各自の「カルヒェンKarlchen」カードを利用しゴールデン成功ポイントを獲得します。

一番目にあらかじめ設定しておいたゴールデン成功ポイントを獲得したのプレーヤーはゲームの成功者になります。

このゲームの特別注目するポイントは、ゲームをスタートした際にプレーヤーは誰が自分のチームメンバーかを知らないことです。

At a kickstarter campaign in May 2020, over 200 bakers have already unlocked 7 stretch goals. You profit from this of course and receive it with your order directly. Help us here on Indigogo to take the next step to further enhance the game. 

Overview game components

First Player / Forehand Tokens - Stretch Goal #5

Stretch Goal #6: 350g Linencards

 Absolutely world class, we did it: all playing cards in the main game and in the new expansion are produced for you in 350g linen quality. The cards are really nice and thick, the linen feels great - they just lie well in the hand. The Doublehead Kids evening will be a celebration. :-)

 

You can choose between three different editions:

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Normal Edition 

  • the card game with 66 beautiful playing cards
  • the new expansion "white Expansion" with 26 beautiful playing cards
  • Download link for digital game instructions (German, English or Japanese)
  • all unlocked stretch goals

 

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Deluxe Edition 

  • the card game with 66 beautiful playing cards
  • the new expansion "white Expansion" with 26 beautiful playing cards
  • printed english or german game manual
  • game box
  • all Deluxe supporters with names immortalized on an additional game card
  • Download link for digital game instructions (German, English or Japanese)
  • all unlocked stretch goals

 

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Super Deluxe Edition 

  • the card game with 66 beautiful playing cards
  • the new expansion "white Expansion" with 26 beautiful playing cards
  • printed english or game manual
  • game box
  • all Deluxe supporters with names immortalized on an additional game card
  • 6 player expansion (32 playing cards and extra printed game instructions) 
  • traditional Doppelkopf game for adults in linen quality 
  • Download link for digital game instructions (German, English or Japanese)
  • all unlocked stretch goals

 

Traditional german Doppelkopf high quality linen card game included in Super Deluxe Edition

A dealer package with 20 DOUBLEHEAD KIDS Normal Editions and a package of 5 Super Deluxe Editions as Group Pledge is also available.

Doppelkopf has been played in Germany in various forms since 1895 (!) and has meanwhile replaced SKAT as the most popular card game in Germany.

Like many 100,000 other Germans, I meet with friends once a month to bang Doppelkopf. At the beginning of 2018 my children (12,9 and 4) asked the question "We want to play that too...". We noticed a little frustrated that it is not so easy to explain the rules and cards to children and almost teenagers with a normal Doppelkopf hand.

So we came up with the idea "Hey, why don't create a special deck of cards made for families and beginners to learn the game better without losing all the fun of playing Doppelkopf". After 7 prototypes and numerous test games, the time came at the end of 2019 and we dared to present our idea on a crowdfunding platform. The first edition of the game was supported by over 300 backers. Since we still get many requests and ideas for the game, we would be happy if you would support our project in the 2nd edition. So maybe even more families can experience the Doppelkopf fun ...

  • You get a beautiful card game with family-friendly cards 
  • You learn the favourite card game of the Germans in a simple way 
  • You will spend many hours of real fun with your dearest family and friends
  • You will make the hearts of my children (and mine of course) shine 
  • You support a family project, we are not a big game publisher and we do not make a profit with the game

Carl (Boardgame Stories) shows you how to play the game (english): https://youtu.be/gka7MYK5eRU

Marcel (Spiel mal wieder) shows you how to play the game (german): https://youtu.be/iSkEK2GAF1s

Rules 4 Player Game

 german Game Rules (pdf)

 english Game Rules (pdf)

 japanese Game Rules (pdf)

Short overview rules (basic game)

  • Each player is dealt 12 cards. 
  • Play 12 Duels. On each Duel player play one card each, in clockwise order. 
  • The first card played determines the Duel’s leading family crest.
  • The following players must play a card with that family crest if possible. 
  • If you are unable to play such a card there are two scenarios: if the leading crest is from an Earl family (cross, spade, heart), you can trump it with a Royal family card (crown) or discard any other Earl family card if the leading crest is from the Royal family, discard an Earl family card.
  • The highest Royal card played wins. Otherwise the hightest Earl Card played from the leading family crest. Identical strongest cards: first one played wins. Higher strength same family crest wins.
  • The players with the Prince/Princess cards play together as a team against the other 2 players.
  • After 12 Duels everyone adds up their Silver Coins, with team members adding up their Coins collectively.
  • The team with the most Silver Coins wins. Each member receives 1 Golden Coin. 

Rules 6 Player Game (with Expansion in Super Deluxe Edition)

 german/english Game Rules (pdf)

Rules 3 Player Game (Stretch Goal #3)

 german/english Game Rules (pdf)

 

Tobias from fjelfras, the board game blog with bite says: "DOUBLEHEAD KIDS shows how to successfully dust off an old card game classic and make it accessible to the youth. That's true cultural promotion." (Read more, german)

 

 

Andreas says: "A nice idea to spread a classic game further and to simplify it for the younger target group ... Perhaps also an ideal Christmas present from a Doppelkopf player to his friends, who were deterred by the rules and card sequence ... hope that with this family-friendly design he will win many new players for Doppelkopf". (Read more, german)

 

Brettspiel-Guru

 
 
Norman from Brettspiele-Magazin says: "It's absolutely fascinating. I have never before experienced, how one could play a serious round of Doppelkopf after such a short introduction time - especially not with school kids in first grade. Doublehead-Kids really surprised us here all the way." (Read more, german) 
 
 
BRETTSPIEL NEWS - Daniel says: "If you like Doppelkopf or want to try it out, you should buy Doublehead Kids. In a group of four the game works very well and I understand why it is the most popular card game in Germany today. The access is quite easy, especially with the new cards, which are really well designed and remove the abstract character of the original cards." (Read more, german)
 
 
BOARDGAMEMONKEYS - Roy says: "The idea of making Doppelkopf children accessible is absolutely super and laudable. Because in a normal Doppelkopf game it is really very confusing which card is higher ranked and wins the trick and it is even more difficult, in my eyes, to remember how many silver coins (points) the cards bring. Simply printing all this as info on the card is simple and ingenious. ...". (Read more, german)
 
 

So that you can play the game with your children as soon as possible, we will deliver the games as soon as the Indigogo campaign ends. The start of the delivery is planned for August 2020.

The delivery costs are usually 4 EURO for Germany and 7 EURO for the rest of the world. Exceptions: with the 2-pack of the Deluxe Editions for Germany 6 EURO and for the rest of the world 9 EURO. The shipping of the dealer pack to Germany 6 EURO and to the rest of the world costs 20 EURO. We ship with the German Post.

The games are printed in Europe by the traditional Turkish printing house Ajanskart. 

----> DEUTSCH <----

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS ist ein Kartenspiel für 4 Spieler (mit Super Deluxe Edition auch für 6 Spieler, 3 Spieleranleitung als Stretch Goal freigeschaltet), welches das Doppelkopf-Normalspiel mit familiengerechten Karten abbildet. Das Spiel ist für Spieler ab ca. 6 Jahren geeignet (Zahlen von 1 bis 20 müssen selbständig gelesen werden können) und dauert je nach gewählter Siegpunktzahl zwischen 30 und 60 Minuten.

Spielprinzip: Spieler legen Karten in spannenden Kartenstichduellen und spielen dabei in wechselnden Zweierteams zusammen. Jeder Spieler muss durch den geschickten Einsatz seiner Karten Silbermünzen erbeuten. Wer die meisten Silbermünzen erbeutet, „Füchse“ der Gegner einfängt oder mutig sein „Karlchen“ spielt, gewinnt goldene Siegpunkte. Wer zuerst eine vorher festgelegte Anzahl von goldenen Siegpunkten erspielt hat, gewinnt das Spiel.

Den besonderen Reiz des Spiels machen die wechselnden Zweierteams aus, deren Zusammensetzung zu Spielbeginn unbekannt sind.

Die Spielkomponenten im Überblick

Vorhand / First Player Token - Stretch Goal  #5

Absolute Weltklasse, wir haben es geschafft: alle Spielkarten im Hauptspiel und in der neuen Erweiterung werden für euch in 350g Leinenqualität produziert. Die Karten sind richtig schön dick, das Leinen fühlt sich Klasse an - sie liegen einfach gut in der Hand. Der Doublehead Kids Abend wird ein Fest.

Spielkarten in 350g Leinenqualität - Stretch Goal #6

 

Du kannst zwischen drei unterschiedlichen Editionen wählen:

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Normal Edition 

  • das Kartenspiel mit 66 wunderschönen Spielkarten
  • die neue Erweiterung "white Expansion" mit 26 wunderschönen Spielkarten
  • Downloadlink für digitale Spielanleitung (deutsch, englisch oder japanisch)
  • Alle freigeschalteten Stretch Goals

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Deluxe Edition 

  • das Kartenspiel mit 66 wunderschönen Spielkarten
  • die neue Erweiterung "white Expansion" mit 26 wunderschönen Spielkarten
  • gedruckte deutsche Spielanleitung
  • stabiler Spielekarton 
  • alle Deluxe-Unterstützer mit Namen auf einer zusätzlichen Spielkarte verewigt
  • Downloadlink für digitale Spielanleitung (deutsch, englisch oder japanisch)
  • Alle freigeschalteten Stretch Goals

DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Super Deluxe Edition 

  • das Kartenspiel mit 66 wunderschönen Spielkarten
  • die neue Erweiterung "white Expansion" mit 26 wunderschönen Spielkarten
  • gedruckte deutsche Spielanleitung
  • stabiler Spielekarton 
  • alle Deluxe-Unterstützer mit Namen auf einer zusätzlichen Spielkarte verewigt
  • 6 Spieler Erweiterung (32 Spielkarten mit extra gedruckter Spielanleitung) 
  • Doppelkopfspiel für Erwachsene in Leinen-Qualität
  • Downloadlink für digitale Spielanleitung (deutsch, englisch oder japanisch)
  • Alle freigeschalteten Stretch Goals

Ein Händlerpaket mit 20 DOUBLEHEAD KIDS Normal Editionen ist zusätzlich erhältlich.

Doppelkopf wird in Deutschland in unterschiedlichen Formen seit 1895 (!) gespielt und hat mittlerweile SKAT als beliebtestes Kartenspiel der Deutschen abgelöst.

So wie viele 100.000 andere Deutsche treffe auch ich mich einmal im Monat mit Freunden, um Doppelkopf zu knallen. Anfang 2018 kam bei meinen Kindern (12,9 und 4) die Frage auf "Wir wollen das auch mal spielen...". Wir stellten etwas frustriert fest, dass es gar nicht so einfach ist, Kindern und fast Teenagern die Regeln und Karten mit einem normalen Doppelkopfblatt zu erklären.

So kamen wir auf die Idee "Hey lass doch ein spezielles Kartendeck für Familien und Anfänger erstellen, um das Spiel besser lernen zu können, ohne dass der ganze Spielspass von Doppelkopf abhanden kommt". Nach 7 Prototypen und zahlreichen Testspielen war es Ende 2019 soweit und wir trauten uns, unsere Idee auf Kickstarter zu präsentieren. Die erste Auflage des Spiels unterstüzten über 300 Backer. Da wir immer noch viele Anfragen und Ideen zum Spiel bekommen, würden wir uns freuen, wenn Du unser Projekt in der 2. Auflage unterstützen würdest. So können vielleicht noch mehr Familien den Doppelkopf-Spaß erleben ...

  • Du bekommst ein wunderschönes Kartenspiel mit familiengerechten Karten
  • Du lernst auf einfache Weise das Lieblingskartenspiel der Deutschen 
  • Du wirst viele Stunden wirklichen Spaß mit Deinen liebsten Familienmitgliedern und Freunden verbringen
  • Du unterstützt ein Familienprojekt, wir sind kein großer Spieleverlag und wir machen keinen Gewinn mit dem Spiel

You get a beautiful card game with family-friendly cards 
You learn the favourite card game of the Germans in a simple way 
You will spend many hours of real fun with your dearest family and friends

You will make the hearts of my children (and mine of course) shine 

You support a family project, we are not a big game publisher and we do not make a profit with the game
Carl (Boardgame Stories) shows you how to play the game (english): https://youtu.be/gka7MYK5eRUMarcel (Spiel mal wieder) shows you how to play the game (german): https://youtu.be/iSkEK2GAF1sRules 4 Player Game german Game Rules (pdf) english Game Rules (pdf) japanese Game Rules (pdf)Short overview rules (basic game)
Each player is dealt 12 cards. 
Play 12 Duels. On each Duel player play one card each, in clockwise order. 
The first card played determines the Duel’s leading family crest.
The following players must play a card with that family crest if possible. 
If you are unable to play such a card there are two scenarios: if the leading crest is from an Earl family (cross, spade, heart), you can trump it with a Royal family card (crown) or discard any other Earl family card if the leading crest is from the Royal family, discard an Earl family card.
The highest Royal card played wins. Otherwise the hightest Earl Card played from the leading family crest. Identical strongest cards: first one played wins. Higher strength same family crest wins.
The players with the Prince/Princess cards play together as a team against the other 2 players.
After 12 Duels everyone adds up their Silver Coins, with team members adding up their Coins collectively.
The team with the most Silver Coins wins. Each member receives 1 Golden Coin. 
Rules 6 Player Game (with Expansion in Super Deluxe Edition) german/english Game Rules (pdf)Rules 3 Player Game (Stretch Goal #3) german/english Game Rules (pdf) Tobias from fjelfras, the board game blog with bite says: "DOUBLEHEAD KIDS shows how to successfully dust off an old card game classic and make it accessible to the youth. That's true cultural promotion." (Read more, german) 

 
Andreas says: "A nice idea to spread a classic game further and to simplify it for the younger target group ... Perhaps also an ideal Christmas present from a Doppelkopf player to his friends, who were deterred by the rules and card sequence ... hope that with this family-friendly design he will win many new players for Doppelkopf". (Read more, german) Brettspiel-Guru  
Norman from Brettspiele-Magazin says: "It's absolutely fascinating. I have never before experienced, how one could play a serious round of Doppelkopf after such a short introduction time - especially not with school kids in first grade. Doublehead-Kids really surprised us here all the way." (Read more, german)   
BRETTSPIEL NEWS - Daniel says: "If you like Doppelkopf or want to try it out, you should buy Doublehead Kids. In a group of four the game works very well and I understand why it is the most popular card game in Germany today. The access is quite easy, especially with the new cards, which are really well designed and remove the abstract character of the original cards." (Read more, german)  
BOARDGAMEMONKEYS - Roy says: "The idea of making Doppelkopf children accessible is absolutely super and laudable. Because in a normal Doppelkopf game it is really very confusing which card is higher ranked and wins the trick and it is even more difficult, in my eyes, to remember how many silver coins (points) the cards bring. Simply printing all this as info on the card is simple and ingenious. ...". (Read more, german)  So that you can play the game with your children as soon as possible, we will deliver the games as soon as the Indigogo campaign ends. The start of the delivery is planned for August 2020.The delivery costs are usually 4 EURO for Germany and 7 EURO for the rest of the world. Exceptions: with the 2-pack of the Deluxe Editions for Germany 6 EURO and for the rest of the world 9 EURO. The shipping of the dealer pack to Germany 6 EURO and to the rest of the world costs 20 EURO. We ship with the German Post.The games are printed in Europe by the traditional Turkish printing house Ajanskart. ----> DEUTSCH <----DOUBLEHEAD KIDS ist ein Kartenspiel für 4 Spieler (mit Super Deluxe Edition auch für 6 Spieler, 3 Spieleranleitung als Stretch Goal freigeschaltet), welches das Doppelkopf-Normalspiel mit familiengerechten Karten abbildet. Das Spiel ist für Spieler ab ca. 6 Jahren geeignet (Zahlen von 1 bis 20 müssen selbständig gelesen werden können) und dauert je nach gewählter Siegpunktzahl zwischen 30 und 60 Minuten.Spielprinzip: Spieler legen Karten in spannenden Kartenstichduellen und spielen dabei in wechselnden Zweierteams zusammen. Jeder Spieler muss durch den geschickten Einsatz seiner Karten Silbermünzen erbeuten. Wer die meisten Silbermünzen erbeutet, „Füchse“ der Gegner einfängt oder mutig sein „Karlchen“ spielt, gewinnt goldene Siegpunkte. Wer zuerst eine vorher festgelegte Anzahl von goldenen Siegpunkten erspielt hat, gewinnt das Spiel.Den besonderen Reiz des Spiels machen die wechselnden Zweierteams aus, deren Zusammensetzung zu Spielbeginn unbekannt sind.Die Spielkomponenten im ÜberblickVorhand / First Player Token - Stretch Goal  #5Absolute Weltklasse, wir haben es geschafft: alle Spielkarten im Hauptspiel und in der neuen Erweiterung werden für euch in 350g Leinenqualität produziert. Die Karten sind richtig schön dick, das Leinen fühlt sich Klasse an - sie liegen einfach gut in der Hand. Der Doublehead Kids Abend wird ein Fest.Spielkarten in 350g Leinenqualität - Stretch Goal #6 Du kannst zwischen drei unterschiedlichen Editionen wählen:DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Normal Edition 
das Kartenspiel mit 66 wunderschönen Spielkarten
die neue Erweiterung "white Expansion" mit 26 wunderschönen Spielkarten
Downloadlink für digitale Spielanleitung (deutsch, englisch oder japanisch)
Alle freigeschalteten Stretch Goals
DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Deluxe Edition 
das Kartenspiel mit 66 wunderschönen Spielkarten
die neue Erweiterung "white Expansion" mit 26 wunderschönen Spielkarten
gedruckte deutsche Spielanleitung
stabiler Spielekarton 
alle Deluxe-Unterstützer mit Namen auf einer zusätzlichen Spielkarte verewigt
Downloadlink für digitale Spielanleitung (deutsch, englisch oder japanisch)
Alle freigeschalteten Stretch Goals
DOUBLEHEAD KIDS - Super Deluxe Edition 
das Kartenspiel mit 66 wunderschönen Spielkarten
die neue Erweiterung "white Expansion" mit 26 wunderschönen Spielkarten
gedruckte deutsche Spielanleitung
stabiler Spielekarton 
alle Deluxe-Unterstützer mit Namen auf einer zusätzlichen Spielkarte verewigt
6 Spieler Erweiterung (32 Spielkarten mit extra gedruckter Spielanleitung) 
Doppelkopfspiel für Erwachsene in Leinen-Qualität
Downloadlink für digitale Spielanleitung (deutsch, englisch oder japanisch)
Alle freigeschalteten Stretch Goals
Ein Händlerpaket mit 20 DOUBLEHEAD KIDS Normal Editionen ist zusätzlich erhältlich.Doppelkopf wird in Deutschland in unterschiedlichen Formen seit 1895 (!) gespielt und hat mittlerweile SKAT als beliebtestes Kartenspiel der Deutschen abgelöst.So wie viele 100.000 andere Deutsche treffe auch ich mich einmal im Monat mit Freunden, um Doppelkopf zu knallen. Anfang 2018 kam bei meinen Kindern (12,9 und 4) die Frage auf "Wir wollen das auch mal spielen...". Wir stellten etwas frustriert fest, dass es gar nicht so einfach ist, Kindern und fast Teenagern die Regeln und Karten mit einem normalen Doppelkopfblatt zu erklären.So kamen wir auf die Idee "Hey lass doch ein spezielles Kartendeck für Familien und Anfänger erstellen, um das Spiel besser lernen zu können, ohne dass der ganze Spielspass von Doppelkopf abhanden kommt". Nach 7 Prototypen und zahlreichen Testspielen war es Ende 2019 soweit und wir trauten uns, unsere Idee auf Kickstarter zu präsentieren. Die erste Auflage des Spiels unterstüzten über 300 Backer. Da wir immer noch viele Anfragen und Ideen zum Spiel bekommen, würden wir uns freuen, wenn Du unser Projekt in der 2. Auflage unterstützen würdest. So können vielleicht noch mehr Familien den Doppelkopf-Spaß erleben ...
Du bekommst ein wunderschönes Kartenspiel mit familiengerechten Karten

Du lernst auf einfache Weise das Lieblingskartenspiel der Deutschen 

Du wirst viele Stunden wirklichen Spaß mit Deinen liebsten Familienmitgliedern und Freunden verbringen

Du unterstützt ein Familienprojekt, wir sind kein großer Spieleverlag und wir machen keinen Gewinn mit dem Spiel

story:
RPGnet is the top independent web site for tabletop roleplaying games. The heart of our site is one of the most talked-about forums in the industry — with 12,000 active members and 19 million posts. We also publish several gaming reviews every week and a few columns. Finally, we maintain a constantly expanding catalog of roleplaying products that currently indexes 20,000 games and supplements, 2,000 magazines, and 36,000 articles.

All of this costs money, so in 2013 we decided to turn to crowdfunding to encourage readers to become members, to support the site. The drive was successful, so we've turned into a yearly tradition.

In years past, we've thanked our members with proactive work that's helped to make the site a better place. That's included the reinstatement of the search function, the movement of the machines to a cloud platform, the revising of our reviews system, the improvement of review browsing, the enhancement of mobile access, the improvement of security, the tagging of our columns system, and the upgrade of our forums.

We'll be offering proactive work again this year. However, we also want to offer another sort of thanks. So for the fourth year running we'll be offering some free PDFs in January and February to everyone who's a member. So, join us now, and get some cool stuff for some cool RPGs. 

Following the end of this GoGo, you can sign up for a membership directly from RPGnet. Cool stuff will be available to everyone who signs up before the end of February.

This year we've got a huge set of 10 PDFs thanks to our generous product sponsors.

Are you a fan of FRPGs? We've got ...

  • Pelgrane Press' Book of Ages for 13th Age
  • Pelgrane Press' Loot Harder for 13th Age
  • Rogues Games' Embrace for 5E
  • Flying Buffalo's T&T Adventures Japan for Tunnels & Trolls
  • Legendary Games' Legendary Planet for Starfinder

Are you horrified by Cthulhu? We've got ...

  • Arc Dream's The Unspeakable Oath #25

Are you interested in a witch-haunted Revolution? We've got everything you need to play ...

  • Rogue Games' 3e Colonial Gothic Rulebook
  • Rogue Games' Colonial Gothic Atlas
  • Rogue Games' adventure Flames of Freedom: Beginnings

Finally, are you interested in hard science-fiction using a top indie system? We've got ...

  • Posthuman Studio's Transhumanity's Fate: The Fate Conversion Guide for Eclipse Phase

Thanks to our product sponsors!

 

        

      

        

 

Though ads and affiliations pay some of our costs, we are picky about which ads and ad networks we use, so that we can maintain high-quality ads that are likely to be of interest and that won't distract our readers. We've opted out of high-value ads that include audio, that expand, or that are placed as interstitials between pages. We forbid dating ads, gambling ads, gold-farming ads, political ads, and certain other categories of advertising. 

As a result, we occasionally ask RPGnet readers to become members, in order to help support the community. We've done this on a somewhat ad hoc basis in the past, but now that crowdfunding has matured, we've turned to IndieGoGo for our annual RPGnet Membership Drive.

We hope that you'll join us, and help to support the RPGnet community.

Our goal for this IndieGoGo crowdfunding is simple: we want you to become an RPGnet member. Every single reward other than the $5 support level will grant you a membership at RPGnet. Most of them provide membership for the next year*, but we also offer Lifetime Memberships for Patrons and others who want to offer a higher level of support.

As a member, you'll receive a few benefits as thanks.

The following membership bennies are locked in:

  • Cool PDFs. Becoming a member is how you get access to the PDFs our sponsors are providing. From about 1/2/18 to 2/28/18, they'll be available as a free download directly from your membership panel. 

  • Early Columns Access. You can read columns before they're posted.

  • Early Review Access. You can read reviews before they're posted.

  • XP. Just for fun, we'll give you Experience Points every month, to reflect your contribution to the site.* We'll start all memberships shortly after this crowdfunding closes, once we get your forum account names. If you already have a yearly membership, we'll just add a year to your current end date. If you already have a lifetime membership, then we offer our thanks!

We've also traditionally offered forum-related benefits such as Forum Recognition; Ad Control; larger Avatars; and more Forum PMs. Our forums are in a bit of a transition right now due to our recent upgrade, so we're not sure which of these will continue. For example, our default avatar size has leaped to 96x96, so the "larger avatar" benefit no longer makes sense. We are committed to offering continued ad control (once we get any bigger updates out of the way), and other than that, we'll see what works with our shiny new forums.

Your support ensures that we can continue to give RPGnet the same attention that we have in the past. However, we'd like to do more than that. If we raise higher levels of funds, we'll also work to make RPGnet more self-sufficient, so that its improvements don't depend upon Skotos staff not being busy with other tasks.

To ensure this, we'll guarantee increased staff time at many of our stretch goals. That will allow us to once more be proactive in 2019 and to put more time toward increasing the coolness of RPGnet. 

We're keeping it simple this year, and focusing on that staff time to improve the web site. This year in particular we figure that we have a wide open playing field for making the site better, thanks to our brand-new forums.

$2,500. +1 Staff. We'll guarantee a week of staff time improving the web site in 2019, including some focus on better integrating our new forums with the rest of the site and/or looking into plug-ins that might benefit the site.

$5,000. +2 Staff. A second week of staff time, spent on whatever the site needs.

$7,500. +3 Staff. A third week of staff time.

$10,000. Cage of Security. a fourth and final week of proactive work. This one will be focused on securing the site, primarily by finishing on work to improve the security of our MySQL system.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Citadel Deck Block lets you organize, protect and carry your cards, dice, tokens and coins in a smart and secure way.

 

                        

 

Versatile & dazzling Deck Box that holds:

  • Magic: the Gathering
  • Pokémon
  • KeyForge
  • Yu-Gi-Oh
  • Dragon Ball Z
  • Star Realms
  • Arkham Horror: The card game
  • Star Wars Destiny
  • Exploding Kittens 

 and many others...

 

The Citadel Deck Block comes with:

  •  A special fully detachable cover attached with strong magnets 
  •  A phosphorescent label tag 
  •  A transparent custom-made acrylic divider 
  •  A black elastic band 

The cover and the box are covered in Premium Vegan leather with an exterior pattern and velvet on the interior. 

 

 

Detachable cover with sturdy magnets

The cover can easily be attached with strong magnets. But also, can be taken off completely and used as a small playmat, while the box can be easily accessed and moved around the table or used as a dice rolling box.

 

                          

 

Divider

The divider is a rigid transparent card like structure used to create a compartment for dice & tokens. It can be placed in both vertical and horizontal configurations like shown below: 

The divider can also be used as a score board. You can easily remove the writing and reuse it for the next game. 

 

                            

 

 

Organize your decks with the white label that allows you to write the content of the Deck Block and whatever you write can be wiped out completely at any time.

                       

 

This tag is also phosphorescent and it glows in the dark. Pretty cool, eh?

 

 

Not that it wasn’t safe enough already, we went ahead and designed this Elastic Strap that easily wraps around the block and keeps it extra safe while you carry it. So even if it falls from your hands, your precious cards will remain untouched inside the Citadel.

 

                           

 

Pack you cards in the Quiver Time gaming arsenal: the Quiver case, Citadels and Standard Deck Blocks and be ready for battle. 

 

                        

 

 

The CITADEL Deck Block holds up to:

  • 100 double-sleeved cards OR
  • 130+ single-sleeved cards OR
  • 60+ double sleeved + divider + dice & tokens OR
  • 80+ single sleeved + divider + dice & tokens.

 

We didn't abandon our community, we made sure that Citadel is designed so that it fits perfectly with all the other Quiver Time products. This will bring an extra touch of convenience to every Quiver community member.

  • Fits perfectly with Bolt aka Baby Quiver Case 

                      ​

 

  • Quiver Case can house up to 4 Citadel Deck Blocks. 

 

                          

 

 

 

Don't take our word for it, read what people are saying about Citadel Deck Block. As always, we listen to our community, so we first asked around to see what people think.

 

Help us bring Citadel to life and support our cause. You will, of course, be rewarded handsomely, with unbeatable discounted product packs.

And just when you thought it couldn't get any better, we went the extra mile and included FREE SHIPPING with every pledge!

 

 

 

 

The project is now completed and all rewards have been fulfilled.

You can still back us here and we will continue fulfilling all rewards every month.

 

 

 

 

 

The Quiver Time story begins in 2014, when 3 old friends with boring jobs and pretentious job titles (a data scientist, a financial compliance officer and a procurement expert), sitting down for a board-game night were trying to figure out how we could harness our individual skills and work on together on a common project that would make us feel more accomplished. Something that would bring more excitement than building a spreadsheet, reviewing regulatory requirements or getting a better price for our employers.

 

 

 

A project that would add value to society, find solutions for others and empower us to feel more accomplished with results that we could clearly grasp. We looked down to our board game table and to our large boxes of games packed into supermarket bags and realized that we had the answer in front of us. We had a common passion for card games and we decided that we would spend the next years trying to improve the experience of card game players all over the world.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Like any human enterprise, a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo is not without risks and challenges. The main risk is that the campaign would go unfunded and we would be stuck with the losses incurred for organizing the campaign. But this is mostly our problem. As a backer, you are more interested of how our risks might impact you. The main risk for you as a backer is that your pledge would not be rewarded with the prize promised. We will make sure this would not happen under any circumstances. We’ll explain how. But first, the risks:

 

1. Manufacturing risks. Production has its own risks that we might not control. Our suppliers might fail to produce on time, or at the quality expected, or they might go out of business.

-> Measures to mitigate: We have taken measures to prevent that. We work with established suppliers that have a goods background of success. We will invest some of our own resources before the campaign ends but after the campaign is fully funded, so that we make sure production is completed on time.

 

2. Product quality risks. With every production, no matter the product or the company manufacturing it, there will be a small amount of damaged goods. This is something that can’t be avoided but just reduced in scale.

-> Measures to mitigate: Once production is completed we arrange for quality check inspection. We are one of the fewest companies that arrange for full quality check of all products and not just a batch sample. We think that it’s more important to make sure every product is in the right shape before is delivered, even though that means a higher cost for us. We'll also replace any damaged product whatever the reason.

In the end, whatever happens, we will deliver the products, even if it means incurring a loss for us. The only risk you are taking is that your reward might not reach you on time, but we'll do our best to avoid that. We will publish frequent updates on fulfillment status and you’ll always be up to date with the status.

 

If for any reason you are unhappy with the reward you have received, we’ll do what we usually do. We’ll ask you what we can do to make you happy.

If it means getting a replacement, a discount or a full refund, we’ll make sure that you get what you want. If you ever bought a Quiver Time product before, then probably you know what I’m talking about.

If not, ask around.

Happy Quiver Time!
