story:
Cliquez sur le gros bouton bleu ci-dessus pour lire la description française !

 

"We have ruled these lands for many generations now. The Barrier hides us from the Enemy but our children have never seen the stars and probably never will. Few are those who remember where to find the old Gates, let alone how to activate them. Our powers have made us rulers and conquerors but we must never forget. The Congregation will never stop searching. We must keep it safe."

 

Thousands of years ago, a galactic war erupted between the mighty terrestrial civilization of Vareene and an invading alien force over a powerful technological secret that would grant its wielder dominion over the galaxy: the Catalyst. For all their valor and skill, the Vareene were vanquished, most of their people and planetary holdings wiped away in a terrible apocalypse, and the rest fighting a losing battle. To ensure their survival, the last bastion of the Vareene chose a remote, primitive planet named Ceres and sent their survivors there.

With their vastly superior technology and advanced learning, the Vareene refugees quickly rose as leaders among the native population. Many of the technological wonders they brought were initially intended as a means of striking back against the invaders who had destroyed their empire. On Ceres, they built several star-gates so they might one day travel across the galaxy as part of a coordinated strike.

Unfortunately, such would never come to pass. Now called the Congregation, the alien invaders combed over the ashes of the Vareene throneworld, searching for clues as to where they might have secreted the Catalyst. A handful of survivors managed to retreat through a star-gate to Ceres, where they warned the fledgling colony of the threat. Afraid that they would find the hidden planet, the last of the Vareene decided, in a desperate move, to activate a powerful cloaking device that would shroud the planet in an energy barrier, hiding it from Congregation probes but also preventing the use of the star-gates. Thus Ceres became a haven, but also a prison. 

Isolated for thousands of years, the Vareene slowly forgot their origin. The technological devices they brought became magical artifacts, the useless star-gates abandoned ruins, the force field became known as the “Barrier.” The truth was forgotten, or else evolved over the generations into a kind of religion. The Catalyst that the Vareene came from the stars to hide and protect has become an object of veneration, but no one can say precisely what it does or how it might be awakened once more.

A few millennia later, the survivors still rule the countries of Ceres, only partly understanding the cataclysm that looms in their future. The force field is losing power and will soon disappear, revealing the planet once more. Over so many centuries, the Congregation has consolidated its power over the galaxy, where it deals with pesky rulers of rebel worlds, galactic traders and smugglers, technological geniuses and preachers of alien gods, all of whom will stand no match against the awesome power of the Catalyst…

 

In Seeds of Wars, characters will spend most of their time ruling their Realm in a political and economical simulation game. 

Each player will control one of the five different types of Realm: 

  • Order - You are the ruler of a kingdom and you will try to expand your influence through diplomacy and war. 
  • Faith - You are the spiritual leader of a widespread religion and you will try to spread the influence of your god through propaganda and proselytizing. 
  • Trade - you are the owner of a successful trading network and you will try to increase your wealth through espionage and bargaining. 
  • Magic - you have mastered the forces of Nature and you will try to use its energy to alter reality and cast spells affecting vast territories. 
  • Culture – you are one of the great artists of your time and you will try to promote your Art and contribute to the cultural heritage of your contemporaries. 

Will you try to increase the influence of your Realm by forging new alliances with your neighbours through cunning diplomacy, or by destroying your competitors using military strategy?

 

Unlike actions in traditional RPGs that take place over a number of turns and rounds (minutes or seconds), the actions in SOW spread over months and years.

Resources are also measured on a different scale. By collecting taxes and fees, Rulers will increase the wealth of their Realm. They will also earn influence based on their actions, their weight in the balance of the many Kingdoms of Ceres and the attitude of the people towards them. Every action undertaken by the ruler will cost wealth and/or influence.

Geographically, the world of Ceres is divided into Kingdoms and each Kingdom is divided into Counties. There are many actions to choose from. Some of them will only affect a county while others will affect an entire Kingdom.

Likewise, Mage and Priest rulers are capable of casting realm spells that will affect large areas or battle spells that will affect entire units on the battlefield.

Because yes, there will be battles. Every ruler will be able to muster an army and use strategic and tactical warfare, gather military intelligence, move troops across the land and occupy the enemy’s lands.

Beware, though, of alliances and treaties. You know with whom you start a war, but you never know who you might meet on the battlefield in the end.

When characters are not sitting on their throne, planning their next move on the diplomatic chessboard, they may join and go on adventure, just like in traditional RPG’s. When you switch to the Adventure mode, you can just use the rules system of your favourite RPG... and hope your Realm will still be yours when you come home!

 

The Realm management rules are independent from all RPG systems. This means you can create your character with any rules system you like.

The only thing you will have to do is decide which type of Realm your character is most likely to rule:

  • Fighter-like characters will naturally tend to Order based realms.  
  • Cleric-like characters will naturally tend to Faith based realms.  
  • Rogue-like characters will naturally tend to Trade based realms.  
  • Mage-like characters will naturally tend to Magic based realms.  
  • Bard-like characters will naturally tend to Culture based realms.

 

 

The PDF and the hardcover version of the book should be released together by the end of 2nd quarter of 2019. In the unlikely event that there would be a delay in the printing or shipping of the book, we’ll make sure the PDF version is available on time.

 

The team already has all the necessary skills to lead this project. The software development team was at the beginning of this initiative, starting from the prototype of the application created a few years ago.

New members joined this venture such as Flash Raccoon that will lead the crowd funding campaign, design and communication.

Most importantly, we gathered a team of very talented authors and designers who also believe there is a desire for a Realm management RPG on the market.

 

Shipping within the USA will be free of charge. We can ship anywhere else in the world for an extra charge of $10.

story:
A new adventure awaits the crosslances world: let's go back to a project that we already faced years ago: a Fantasy football team, but with a completely new look!

Very angry leprechauns! Inspired by the funny Saint Patrick's day, but not only, come and find out more inside this kickstarter!



                      The world of 3d printing grows more every day and represents one of the technologies of the future.

When in 2016 we launched our first project: rought and tumble many did not believe that this market could have such a great development, many told us they were too futuristic and pioneers.

But we are happy that today we can say that we were right, and many have followed us entering this world.

Today, 3d printing is not only an alternative to the standard physical product, but also a more funnier and often cheaper product.

-if you already own a 3D printer, it's cheap and also funny, you will print unique and incredible quality models

-If you don't own a 3D printer, it can be an opportunity to buy one! Prices for a printer are already low and accessible to anyone. You can still use a service like: 3D hub, shapeways, or any other that are crowding on the net.

-No shipping cost! Anywhere in the universe, you just download the files and print!

-You can print it as many times as you want, for you and your friends.

-You can decide any printing dimension, from miniatures to real size titan sculptures!

 PLEASE NOTE - This INDIEGOGO is for digital files (STLs) to make all these items on your own home 3D printer - these are not physical goods 



                     Our leprechauns team has been designed to be played with two different factions: Dwarves and Halfling.

So we differentiated the look of some of these evil pixies!

So let's go introduce you to our little friends!

The linemen, base of each team.

Some blitzer, well they are obviously more armored!

And slayers are definitely worse!

Here are the tree men!

Here is the whole team!

This time we didn't want to offer you only a fantasy football team, we decided to make available an epic scenario where your battles can take place!

a modular stage that you can assemble at your convenience.

Let's see the various elements

it is usual for us to insert a dicetower into our kickstarters!

a themed tower, which you can also use individually

a typical part of the game!

some stands, to be filled with ultras!

this is the great effect it creates once mounted!

in addition we think it is a good opportunity to be able to transform the stadium into a fortress with the addition of some walls.
 

this is how the castle could become

all add-ons have already been unlocked during the kickstarter campaign, no other add-ons will be added

All add-ons will be included in packages of € 32 or more


You can download it freely even immediately by visiting our post on patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/posts/36610340


 

The next add-ons are included in all packages from € 32 or higher

But all 3 are available to buy with the figure of € 2 as an addition to the kickstarter just concluded

 


Given the delicate moment that the world is facing, we are committed to distributing the files as quickly as possible, we will not wait for the kickstarter payment but we will deliver the files in advance, as soon as your payment to kickstarter is confirmed.

All the files have already been uploaded to our server and there will be no pledge manager, you will simply have the files in record time, so that you can print them and have fun and be able to make these difficult days a little better.

 



                      (valid only for packages with purchase rights)

By buying these files you will be allowed to:

- print the 3D miniatures
                      - print them for friends
                      - Print in 3D and resell the printed miniature in 3D
                      -use render-prints and other derivatives of the file for promotional purposes.
                      -modify the file according to needs and educational purposes
                      - Modified derivative files may be sold printed in 3D

Not allowed:

- Use the files to create molds for mass production
                      - sell the files for profit
                      - distribute the file to third parties

For non-granted points, please contact the crosslances studio, with which you can find an agreement.

It is asked in addition to cite crosslances studio where possible.

For all the remaining details we stick to the common creative.

Refer to legally binding General Terms and Conditions to learn more about conditions regarding extracting product from end product created, which applies to all models under any license.



The crosslances studio are a solid reality created by the founder Filippo Giovannini.

Now pioneers in the world of 3D sculpture dedicated to play and modeling.

We can boast some acknowledgments to our awards such as the “Grog” from lucca comics, or a gold medal in the open section of “monte san savino show” .

Students at the Comics courses in Florence, made by the greebo games sculptures, we have approached the world of miniatures.  We have actually became a revelant studio in the world of miniatures and digital miniatures prototyping. Our products can be found in many places, we had collaborations with: Labmasu, Megalith Godslayer, Hidden Dreams, Minuteman miniatures, Fireforge , EC3D , Animatter games and many others.
story_txt: A new adventure awaits the crosslances world: let's go back to a project that we already faced years ago: a Fantasy football team, but with a completely new look!Very angry leprechauns! Inspired by the funny Saint Patrick's day, but not only, come and find out more inside this kickstarter!                      The world of 3d printing grows more every day and represents one of the technologies of the future.When in 2016 we launched our first project: rought and tumble many did not believe that this market could have such a great development, many told us they were too futuristic and pioneers.But we are happy that today we can say that we were right, and many have followed us entering this world.Today, 3d printing is not only an alternative to the standard physical product, but also a more funnier and often cheaper product.-if you already own a 3D printer, it's cheap and also funny, you will print unique and incredible quality models-If you don't own a 3D printer, it can be an opportunity to buy one! Prices for a printer are already low and accessible to anyone. You can still use a service like: 3D hub, shapeways, or any other that are crowding on the net.-No shipping cost! Anywhere in the universe, you just download the files and print!-You can print it as many times as you want, for you and your friends.-You can decide any printing dimension, from miniatures to real story:
The Black Box is a brand new expansion for Catacombs 3E. It features a new double-sided playmat featuring the Athenoch Mortuary on one side and the Notholag Dungeon on the other. 

It provides a full set of alternate monsters cards for the base Catacombs game plus every expansion published so far including: Cavern of Soloth, Ice Box, Keystones & Keeps, Resurrection Packs 1 & 2, and Wyverns of Wylemuir. 

There is a new set of monsters for the Vermin family and the new Mushroom familiar for the heroes. The expansion provides room cards featuring these new Vermin monsters and the Burial Chamber special room card.

In terms of rules, this expansion introduces the snowball ranged shot, group rush shot,  move to rune "shot" and the transmogrify shot modifier. 

The box artwork  is an homage to the cover of Catacombs First Edition, first released over ten years ago.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For this campaign, we will use our custom built Elzra Pledge Manager where you will confirm the details of your order including providing your shipping address, paying for shipping, and paying any applicable sales tax / VAT.

We will email with a link inviting you to activate your Elzra Pledge Manager account when it is ready.

 

 

 

All prices in this campaign are expressed in Canadian dollars.

 

Canada

Prices expressed in pledge / reward levels for backers in Canada are in Canadian dollars and are exclusive of GST / HST.

We must charge applicable GST/HST to all orders from backers within Canada. This is a legal requirement to ensure our company's compliance with both the law and with the Canada Revenue Agency's rules.

 

UK and European Union

There are significant regulatory changes in the UK and European Union that will affect all crowdfunding campaigns. These are BREXIT, Import Control System (ICS2) and the VAT De Minimis Removal.

 BREXIT (January 2021): Will require Customs Declarations for EU-GB-EU shipments. Affects shipments from the European Union to Great Britain, and from Great Britain to the European Union 

 Import Control System (ICS2) (March 2021): The enhancement of the security screening program will require that certain shipment data elements be sent to the EU Customs authorities for review and approval prior to loading at the country of export. Affects shipments from everywhere in the world to (or transiting) the European Union, Norway or Switzerland 

 VAT De Minimis Removal (July 2021): The abolition of the 22 Euros VAT De Minimis for imports into the EU will result in formal Customs clearance for all inbound EU shipments and the levying of VAT. Affects shipments from everywhere in the world to the European Union 

With these changes, Customs authorities are further enforcing the regulatory requirements related to the provision of complete and accurate customs data in order to optimize security and safety screening, as well as combat counterfeiting and piracy, prevent unfair competition and ensure full collection of duties and taxes.

 

UK

Prices expressed in pledge / reward levels for backers in the UK should be considered exclusive of VAT.

VAT on your selected reward level will be collected during the Elzra Pledge Manager. VAT will also be collected on the cost of shipping.

One of the main changes that will affect customers from 1st January 2021 is the change to the deemed place of supply of goods. As things stand now, goods are subject to VAT in the country in which they are located at the point of sale.

The government is proposing that from 1st January 2021, a Business to Consumer sale of goods to a UK consumer will be deemed to take place in the UK, even if the goods were located outside the UK at the point of sale. 

Read more here.

 

European Union

For an overview of the current VAT system in the European Union, please see this article (europa.eu).

There are significant regulatory changes scheduled to come into effect on the 1st of July, 2021. One of the significant changes that affects foreign companies selling to customers in the EU is the 22 Euros VAT de minmis threshold on shipments will be abolished. As noted above, all shipments into the EU will require formal customs clearance.

The official memo from the European Union regarding these changes can be read online here:

Modernising VAT for e-commerce (europa.eu)

With regards to this campaign, prices expressed in pledge / reward levels for backers in the European Union should be considered exclusive of VAT. 

VAT on your selected reward level will be collected during the Elzra Pledge Manager. VAT will also be collected on the cost of shipping.

Read more here.

 

 

 

You will be charged shipping after the campaign ends based on the actual costs incurred to ship your package to you. We will collect these charges via the Elzra Pledge Manager after this campaign.

 

 

 

For customer support, please submit a support ticket.

Please note also that we cannot respond to specific customer support requests on the comments page of this project. We take pride in our excellent customer service, and aim to deal with  requests as quickly and efficiently as possible when using channels that we have setup for this purpose. Note that sometimes we will receive a  significant volume of requests, so please be patient while we work through them.

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram for announcements and behind the scenes photos.

 

 

Refunds

We are unable to issue refunds once we have confirmed quantities and/or started production and/or if we have begun the packaging and shipment stages of the project.

Abandoned Pledges

If you do not confirm your shipping and pledge details in the Elzra Pledge Manager within ten weeks of our notification via email, we will consider it abandoned. The funds from your pledge will be considered a donation to this campaign.

Your Responsibilities

By pledging for this campaign, you agree that our responsibility to you is for shipping your reward as confirmed in the Elzra Pledge Manager. 

You are responsible for import taxes, sales taxes or other fees that may be payable to relevant tax authorities. 

You accept that you are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and will risk your pledge being unable to be delivered or lost in transit. 

You acknowledge that you will pay attention to your package's tracking status and arrange to have your package taken to a safe place upon delivery to prevent package theft.

You acknowledge that the final look and contents of your reward may be different from what is presented at the start of the campaign.

story:
This is Autarch's ninth crowdfunding project, but it's our first Fifth Edition project. All of our prior material has been for our proprietary Adventurer Conqueror King System. We're very excited to begin to adapt our material for the world's most popular RPG. 

About the Adventure

In the tradition of classic adventure scenarios such as The Keep on the Borderlands and The Village of Hommlet, The Sinister Stone of Sakkara features a detailed starting base and small wilderness sandbox in addition to a dungeon. 

  • The adventure scenario is approximately 50,000 words. That's 10,000 words more than the adventure's old school version.  The Sinister Stone of Sakkara has been re-written from the ground up to follow the XP, Challenge Rating, and Treasure guidelines for 5E. 
  • The adventure features dozens of black and white illustrations by Michael Syrigos and a pair of full-color landscape paintings, one of the fortress of Türos Tem and one of the buried temple by concept artist Jeff Brown.
  • The starting base includes a villa, headquarters, hospital, chapterhouse, infantry barracks, cavalry barracks, bathhouse, traveler's inn, and forum, all mapped and keyed.
  • The dungeon features two levels, the first with 75 rooms and the second with 39 rooms, mapped and keyed, along with two custom random encounter tables. 
  • The adventure is set in our Auran Empire campaign world, a swords & sorcery setting inspired by the Late Roman Empire. For the first time, we offer Fifth Edition stats for many monsters of the Auran Empire, including the Abominable Young Dragon, Abomination, Birthing Tree, Brigand, Possessed Giant Spider, and Zaharan Ruinguard, plus 5E stats for Imperial Cataphracts, Legionaries, Legates, and more. 
  • Additional delights include the "Adventurer Motivation Table", "Random Philosophical Meditations Table", "Profligate Imperial Banquet Table," "Abominable Mutations Table," as well as a menu of options available at an Auran fast-food restaurant, excerpts of Zaharan prayer-verses, and more!

About the Setting

The Auran Empire setting was inspired by the collapsing empires of earth’s Late Antiquity (250 – 750 AD), a turbulent era in which ancient glories were drowned in a torrent of violence. However, in the Auran Empire setting, the horror of civilization’s imminent collapse is worsened by the existence of nightmarish evils lurking in the world’s dark places, threatening to strike mankind at its weakest moment. The established leadership is too preoccupied by the empire’s political and military downfall to take these shadowy threats seriously, leaving them to be handled by adventurers, fortune-hunters, and would-be heroes. The adventurers’ success in dealing with such threats is, however, what garners them the fame, wealth, and strength they need to take power and restore order. Of course, the adventurers are not certain to win; indeed, the odds are stacked against them.  

These premises of the Auran Empire setting are evident throughout The Sinister Stone of Sakkara, most notably in its backstory. The adventure begins with local hamlets and villages suffering from humanoid raids because the troops that ought to be protecting them have been sent to stem an invasion at another border. With the local military barely able to garrison its strongholds, it falls to the adventurers to deal with the monstrous threat. If they do not, no one else will, until it is too late. The setting premises are also evident in the design of the dungeon itself. The upper level of the dungeon was inspired by real-world ancient architecture, and the brigands and beastly barbarians that populate it would not be unfamiliar to any Late Roman centurion (albeit the barbarians who menaced Rome were only figuratively beastly). Conversely, the lower level of the dungeon is a warren of weird horror wherein lurks an insidious evil that is far more threatening than mere humanoids. The dungeon thus represents the Auran Empire setting in microcosm – visibly endangered by mundane threats, appallingly imperiled by hidden horrors. 

Of course, if you don't want to use the Auran Empire setting, the adventure can be placed into any down-on-its-luck empire with some ancient and evil opposition!

Perks

ADVENTURER ($5): You get a PDF copy of the adventure with your name in the credits as an Adventurer. You also get a complimentary PDF copy of the Auran Empire Primer, a system-neutral 22-page gazetteer of the Auran Empire campaign setting.

CONQUEROR ($20): You get a softcover copy of the adventure with your name in the credits as a Conqueror. You also get a PDF copy of The Sinister Stone of Sakkara and Auran Empire Primer. 

KING ($30): You get a softcover copy of the adventure with your name in the credits as a King and a softcover copy of Auran Empire Primer. You also get a PDF copy of The Sinister Stone of Sakkara and Auran Empire Primer. 

Shipping costs will be applied when you make your pledge. 

Risks & Challenges

This is Autarch's ninth crowdfunding project. We already successfully have crowdfunded and published The Sinister Stone of Sakkara for our own ACKS rules set. While this is our first offering for Fifth Edition rules, the entire book is already written and playtested, the art is complete, and the maps are finalized. This crowdfunding campaign is just to pay for layout and printing of the books. Here's an image of books being used as an arm rest by an orc king. That's what our warehouse looks like.

story:
Túró Dóra Darálója

Túró Dóra, lánykori nevén Halmozottan Hátrányos Helyzetű Drabális Túró Dóra gyermekkora rémálom volt számára.

Két anyukát szeretett volna, de ez nem volt lehetséges.

Ezért a Bagdimalizmus kórság elhatalmasodott rajta, mivel  ebben a korban a saját nemi identitás rögzítése a feladat, hogy a gyerekből egy harmonikus és kiegyensúlyozott felnőtt váljon, aki képes lesz majd elfogadni más ember devianciáit.

Hát ez nem jött össze...

Eljött az idő!

 

 

Mi is ez voltaképpen?

A nagysikerű Legyél te is Nerlovag! folytatásaképp és továbbfejlesztéseképp létrejött játék, melynek fő célja egy asztalhoz ültetni a jobbos és balos tábort - mindketten megtalálhatják a saját szerepüket ebben a csodás világban.

A játék célja:

A külső pályán a ballibsik egymással és Túró Dórával is harcolva igyekeznek megmenekülni a házukba, míg a belső pályán Túró Dóra, mint egy sérthetetlen Isten időről időre ledarálja valamelyik játékost.

Hogy mikor és melyiket?

Ezt a játékosok stratégiája dönti el. Összefogás nélkül nehéz lesz nyerni, de ki kivel fog össze, az csak rajta áll.

A játék szabályai:

A Libernyákok célja a lehető legtöbb színű bábuval (max. 4-el) célba érni. 

A játék előkészületei

Minden Libernyák kap egy-egy figurát minden játékban lévő színből (amennyiben négyen játszotok, úgy mindenkinél négy darab különböző színű bábu lesz, ha hárman, akkor csak három szín játszik, stb., lényeg, hogy mindenkinél ugyan azok a színek legyenek).

Túró Dóra egy darab fehér bábu a belső pályán.

Minden körben egy-egy játékos Túró Dórával köteles lépni az alábbi ábra alapján:

 

 

A játék szabályai

Mindenki dob egyet, majd az a játékos kezd, aki a legnagyobbat dobta. Egyes és hatos dobással elhelyezhető az első, tetszés szerinti bábu a játéklapra az adott játékos start mezőjén (színes mező). Ezután a játékba helyezett bábu a kockadobás számának megfelelően lép előre az óramutató járásával ellentétesen. Új bábu viszont továbbra is csak egyes és hatos dobással helyezhető a játékba.

Túró Dóra bábuját a legelső körben legkisebbet dobó játékos indítja a bal kéz felől hozzá legközelebb eső Ramazuri mezőről a belső körben.

Játékmenet

Hatos dobás esetén újra ugyanaz a játékos lép bármelyik, játékban lévő bábujával, vagy elhelyezhető egy újabb, tetszés szerinti bábu a táblán.

Amennyiben több játékosnak is azonos színű bábuja járja a táblát, bármelyik játékos léphet bármelyik bábuval, azzal a feltétellel, hogy az adott színű saját bábuja szintén a játékmezőn található (tehát ha "A" játékos piros bábuja valahol a mezőn van, bármelyik piros bábuval léphet saját stratégiai döntése alapján; ellenben ha "A" játékos még nem lépett játékba a piros bábujával / sikeresen bejuttatta  a házba / Túró Dóra ledarálta, akkor egyáltalán nem léphet piros bábuval).

Hatos dobás esetén Túró Dóra is hatot lép előre és újra dob. Minden más dobásnál a kockán szereplő számmal megegyező mezőt lép előre, mint a többi bábu.

A Ramazuri mezőre érve azonban Túró Dóra megpróbálhat ledarálni egy bábut. Amennyiben valamelyik Libernyák bábu a külső kör Ramazuri mezőjén áll, úgy Túró Dóra köteles azt a bábut választani a daráláshoz. Amennyiben nincs Libernyák bábu a Ramazuri mezőn, úgy Túró Dóra maga választhatja ki a játékban lévő bábuk közül azt, amelyiket le szeretné darálni, valamint azt is, hogy ki bábuja legyen az (a felső szabály itt is érvényes, Túró Dóra csak akkor választhatja ki "A" játékost, ha "A" játékos már játékba hozta az adott színű saját bábuját és az még nem került sem a házba, sem ledarálásra).

Ramazuri,

avagy a nagy darálás: Túró Dóra és a kiválasztott Libernyák dobnak. Ha Dóra dob nagyobbat, sikeres volt a darálás. Amennyiben Dóra sikerrel jár, az illető Libernyák többé nem játszhat ezzel a színű bábuval (félre kell raknia, nem mehet vissza a játékban még nem résztvevő bábuk közé, az adott játékos többé nem helyezhet játékba, nem léphet és nem juttathatja házba ezt a színű bábut).

Ha a Libernyák dob nagyobbat, úgy a bábuját sikerült megmentenie, a daráló zárlatos lett.

Viszont, 

a Libernyákok is marják ám egymást, így ki is tudják egymást dobni. Amennyiben egy játékos ugyanarra a mezőre lép, amelyiken egy másik bábu tartózkodik, kidobja a bábut. Ha az adott színű bábuval több játékos is játszik, a játékos eldöntheti, hogy melyik másik játékosnak adja vissza a bábut, tehát, hogy kit dobott ki. Fontos, hogy csak olyan játékosnak adható vissza a bábu, aki ténylegesen játszik az adott színnel (tehát nem adható vissza pl. zöld bábu "B" játékosnak, ha a "B" játékos zöld bábuja még játékra várakozik, ha a zöld bábuja már ledarálásra került vagy házba jutott). Kidobáskor a bábut vissza kell helyezni a start mezőre várakozó bábuk közé.

Oké, de ki nyer? 

A játék célja, hogy minden Libernyák a lehető legtöbb színt bejutassa a saját házába. Egy színből csak egy bábu juthat be az adott játékos házába és nem juthat be olyan színű bábu, amelyet előzőleg Túró Dóra már ledarált és visszaadott az adott játékosnak. Ha egy adott játékosnak Túró Dóra minden bábuját ledarálta, kiesik.

Hazaérni csak pontos dobással lehet. Az a játékos nyeri a játékot, aki a lehető legtöbb színű bábut menti meg a darálótól és juttatja biztonságba.
story_txt: Túró Dóra DarálójaTúró Dóra, lánykori nevén Halmozottan Hátrányos Helyzetű Drabális Túró Dóra gyermekkora rémálom volt számára.Két anyukát szeretett volna, de ez nem volt lehetséges.Ezért a Bagdimalizmus kórság elhatalmasodott rajta, mivel  ebben a korban a saját nemi identitás rögzítése a feladat, hogy a gyerekből egy harmonikus és kiegyensúlyozott felnőtt váljon, aki képes lesz majd elfogadni más ember devianciáit.Hát ez nem jött össze...Eljött az idő!  Mi is ez voltaképpen?A nagysikerű Legyél te is Nerlovag! folytatásaképp és továbbfejlesztéseképp létrejött játék, melynek fő célja egy asztalhoz ültetni a jobbos és balos tábort - mindketten megtalálhatják a saját szerepüket ebben a csodás világban.A játék célja:A külső pályán a ballibsik egymással és Túró Dórával is harcolva igyekeznek megmenekülni a házukba, míg a belső pályán Túró Dóra, mint egy sérthetetlen Isten időről időre ledarálja valamelyik játékost.Hogy mikor és melyiket?Ezt a játékosok stratégiája dönti el. story:
Dwarf War is the first game system, from up-start game publishers Moondance Games. We are a micro start up team of two: Mark Miller and Robert van der Dussen, and we have produced everything you see here in just two years, all the while holding down day jobs.

We are both software engineers, and we are both passionate gamers. But one day we noticed there might be more to life than computers, and we decided to build Table Top Games.

The inspiration for the game can be found in a book Mark wrote, Winter – The Vracken’s Gate. 

“Dwarf War” is one of the chapter titles, and he thought to himself when he wrote it, “That would make a great game.” 

We have one specific goal in our design philosophy:

What was it the man said? “Make no small plans!”. 

 

Dwarf War is a fast, action-packed strategy, 3D table-top game for 1 to 4 players. The Game board is built as you play from stackable caverns, connected by attachable Tunnels.

The Play Pieces are held on to the Cavern Positions by magnets, giving the game play a robust and satisfying feel.

There are two rule sets that can be used with the Dwarf War Games System, a Battle game for 2-4 Players or the Solo/Coop Game for 1-2 Players.

There is a basic game mechanic used in both Rule Set, and is demonstrated on our tutorial site.  There, you can find details of how the game-play proceeds in the Battle Game. 

 

The Battle Rules allow Players to fight it out in different scenarios of underground warfare. The Rules are deterministic and resource based, but the number of possibilities to consider will keep you guessing.

The Starter Set has 12 Caverns and  allows two Players to Battle.

The Expansion Set adds 9 generally larger Caverns and 2 more Players.

The 1-2 Player Solo/Coop game Dwarf War – Retake the Outlands sets the Player of Players against the Bosses and Monsters of the Game Engine. Battle your way through the caverns reclaiming cave by cave the Outlands of the once great Dwarven Nation.

Here is a PDF to a description of the opening moves of the Solo/Coop Game.

Dwarf War is a 3D Table-Top game. The players combat each other while exploring a network of caverns that can be connected to one another: up, down, or all around. 

The underground of the mountain is built with stackable Caverns that each have a number of mounting positions for the different pieces in the game. 

The Dwarf War Game Board is made up of Stackable Caverns. These are the Caverns in the Starter Game Set.

The Mounting positions in each of the Caverns are magnetic. The different Positions play different parts in the Game.

The Red  Player Positions are Tunnel Positions. There are 2 kinds, Horizontal and Vertical.

Tunnels can connect Caverns Vertically or Horizontally.

Vertical Tunnel

Horizontal Tunnel

These pieces are used in the mechanics of the game to keep the state of play.

The Game play is fast. There are four game phases in the Battle Game (visit the tutorial for more details on the battle rules) and five Phases in the Solo/Coop Game (look here for a Tutorial showing how the game is played.

After new Units are raised in the, aptly named, Raise Units Phase, the bulk of the action takes place during the during the Commit Phase, which is broken into rounds where the players take turns committing their pieces to actions, basically, Make Resources, Tunnel, Engage in Battle, or Cast Spells.

During a normal game, a player might have 12 to 14 Units in the field, and the players take turns deciding, Unit by Unit, what each will do next. This is the fast part, think all you want, you've got to make decisions and move on.

But there is plenty of action in the Commit Phase, spells are cast, tunnels hijacked, and resources garnered or laid to ruin.

The spells are the most challenging aspect of the strategy. By use of cunning combinations, even players on the back-foot, can squeeze out a victory.

So, your best laid plans gang aft and all that, and the mayhem flows freely. 

But when the Commit Phase ends Battles are resolved (if any units survived the torrent of spells) in the Combat Phase. This is followed by the De-Commit phase, where the units return to old bases or claim new ones.

 

The Starter Game is a 2-Player, 12 Cavern set. It is big enough for many hours and combinations of play. It’s a great way to start and get familiar with the basic game mechanics. 

 

Add the Solo-Coop Game Expansion to the 12-Player Start Game!

 

Add 9 more Caverns for up to 4-Player Action!

story:
TRIP 1907 is an interactive - survival - escape the book game.

It consists of 40 + riddles revealing the story background. While solving the riddles, the book unfolds its hidden story, providing key words and missing parts of it.  Answers are submitted online while a "sanity bar” and an embedded  hint system are keeping the character in story mode, exchanging sanity tokens for hints + gaining tokens for each correct answer. 

"Scattered around the globe, parts of a legendary naval journal

Writings of an insane mind others say while stories speak of a greater mystery, filled with sea monsters, dreams, nightmares and messages from other dimensions.

Years since its disappearance, the sea legends speak of a dark journey on a ship long forgotten. Seamen refused to speak of it, knowing what it is said to do to those who challenge it.

All that until now.

 The missing pages of this journal have been mysteriously put together.

The sailor's diary has now been remade.

It's now the time to see what lies hidden and reveal the ship's final days."

........................................

The story behind the idea of TRIP 1907 is to create an immersive book experience novel.

The game will provide an escape the book game mechanic. Players need to solve each riddle submitting their answers on trip1907.com.

The story unfolds as the player solves the riddles of each section. Hand drawn illustrations, story points and keywords are aligned to assist players to their final mission. While time is not a game constrain, the embedded hint system consumes player’s mentality tokens, so spend wisely.

You will Need

  • A copy of Trip 1907.
  • A pencil.
  • An Internet connected device.

Step 1.

Solve the riddle on the riddle page.

Step 2.

Log in and check your answer on line.

Step 3.

Collect the missing parts of the story.

Step 4.

Reach the end maintaining your sanity tokens.

To solve the riddles you will need to read, think, draw, fold pages, search and combine elements from inside and outside of the book. While the story is a part of a game, only its key words are needed in order to solve.

December 2017

Website launch Trip1907.com

January 2018

Forum Launch for Trip 1907.

February 2018

Shipping Trip 1907.

May 2018

Official public Launch of Trip 1907.

 

"Boatswain Early Bird" - 35$

Notorious Boatswains will receive a copy of Trip 1907 & their name on the book credits.

"Mariner" - 19$

The standard Mariner will receive a copy of Trip 1907 & Web credits

"Mariner Gift " - 30$ (20%off)

Mariners Gift will include 2x copies of Trip 1907 & Web credits

"Boatswain's Special" - 49$

Notorious boatswains will receive a copy of Trip 1907 plustheir name on the book credits.

"Captain's Special"  - 69$

Captain's Special edition will be an limited copy (100 books) of Trip 1907  with 40 to 60 additional pages that will include the full story of trip 1907 on the hard copy. It  includes:

  • +40-60 pages of story on hard copy.
  • Book Credits.
  • Special package. 
  • Signed & personally dedicated.
  • Trip1907 Pencil.

Is TRIP 1907 an ebook?

Nope, Trip 1907 is  a hard copy book.

Do I need an app to play it?

Nope, all you need is the copy of the book a pen and an internet connection.

Is there a hint system for the riddles?

A hint system is provided on trip1907.com, where players can exchange their sanity tokens for hints.

Is there any additional charges for playing the book?

Nope, once you have purchased your copy there are no additional perks to buy.

What happens if my sanity meter drops to Zero?

If a Player's sanity pool reaches zero (0)  then the player is declared "insane" and the game ends. 

What is the language of the game?

English.

Is there a forum to keep up with the riddles?

A forum will be provided for players exchanging ideas over the riddles.

Do I need to read all the books story in order to play it?

The story of the sailors diary, is an additional part of the game experience. All you will need is the keywords in order to get the direction you need to solve each riddle.
story_txt:
TRIP 1907 is an interactive - survival - escape the book game.It consists of 40 + riddles revealing the story background. While solving the riddles, the book unfolds its hidden story, providing key words and missing parts of it.  Answers are submitted online while a "sanity bar” and an embedded  hint system are keeping the character in story mode, exchanging sanity tokens for hints + gaining tokens for each correct answer. "Scattered around the globe, parts of a legendary naval journalWritings of an insane mind others say while stories speak of a greater mystery, filled with sea monsters, dreams, nightmares and messages from other dimensions.Years since its disappearance, the sea legends speak of a dark journey on a ship long forgotten. Seamen refused to speak of it, knowing what it is said to do to those who challenge it. All that until now. The missing pages of this journal have been mysteriously put together.The sailor's diary has now been remade.It's now the time to see what lies hidden and reveal the ship's final days."........................................The story behind the idea of TRIP 1907 is to create an immersive book experience novel.The game will provide an escape the book game mechanic. Players need to solve each riddle submitting their answers on trip1907.com.The story unfolds as the player solves the riddles of each section. Hand drawn illustrations, story points and keywords are aligned to assist players to their final mission. While time is not a game constrain, the embedded hint system consumes player’s mentality tokens, so spend wisely.You will Need
A copy of Trip 1907.
A pencil.
An Internet connected device.
Step 1.Solve the riddle on the riddle page.Step 2.Log in and check your answer on line.Step 3.Collect the missing parts of the story.Step 4.Reach the end maintaining your sanity tokens.To solve the riddles you will need to read, think, draw, fold pages, search and combine elements from inside and outside of the book. While the story is a part of a game, only its key words are needed in order to solve.December 2017Website launch Trip1907.comJanuary 2018Forum Launch for Trip 1907.February 2018Shipping Trip 1907.May 2018Official public Launch of Trip 1907. "Boatswain Early Bird" - 35$Notorious Boatswains will receive a copy of Trip 1907 & their name on the book credits."Mariner" - 19$The standard Mariner will receive a copy of Trip 1907 & Web credits"Mariner Gift " - 30$ (20%off)Mariners Gift will include 2x copies of Trip 1907 & Web credits"Boatswain's Special" - 49$Notorious boatswains will receive a copy of Trip 1907 plustheir name on the book credits."Captain's Special"  - 69$Captain's Special edition will be an limited copy (100 books) of Trip 1907  with 40 to 60 additional pages that will include the full story of trip 1907 on the hard copy. It  includes:
+40-60 pages of story on hard copy.
Book Credits.
Special package. 
Signed & personally dedicated.
Trip1907 Pencil.
Is TRIP 1907 an ebook?Nope, Trip 1907 is  a hard copy book.Do I need an app to play it?Nope, all you need is the copy of the book a pen and an internet connection.Is there a hint system for the riddles?A hint system is provided on trip1907.com, where players can exchange their sanity tokens for hints.Is there any additional charges for playing the book?Nope, once you have purchased your copy there are no additional perks to buy.What happens if my sanity meter drops to Zero?If a Player's sanity pool reaches zero (0)  then the player is declared "insane" and the game ends. What is the language of the game?English.Is there a forum to keep up with the riddles?A forum will be provided for players exchanging ideas over the riddles.Do I need to read all the books story in order to play it?The story of the sailors diary, is an additional part of the game experience. All you will need is the keywords in order to get the direction you need to solve each riddle.

story:
Cruising Through the Valley in Style

How do you get from Ilun Valley to the Adras Mountains? How to merchants carry their goods across The Isle? How do they navigate the vast deserts of Vinyata? Transportation is an important part of any sci-fantasy universe and Swordsfall is no different! And there's no better form to show that than illustrations!

The goal is simple. Fund art for transport and vehicles of Tikor.

I've selected a number of artists to help in this endeavor. How much art will be made? Well, it depends on you, the fans and backers!

 


Alternate Hoverbike Concenuel Martinez

 

How It Works

By hitting goal I'll be able to fund TWO full-color illustrations. The sketches and other behind the scenes work for those pieces will be included in the PDF.

For every $500 dollar above goal another art piece will be added! ALL the money for this IndieGoGo (Minus platform and bank fees) will go toward the ARTISTS! This one is truly about the art!

So instead of Stretch Goals where we add stuff, hitting Stretch Goals will fund a specific type of vehicle from Tikor!

 


The Ilun Valley by Sabina Lewis

 

The Stretch Goals

$1,500 - Sport Hoverbike (Zepyher 3000)
$2,000 - Industrial Transport (HWK-Mass 14)
$2,500 - Cybernetic Horse #1 (The Abysissinan)
$3,000 - Leisure Hoverbike with Sidecar (HWK-Leanback 1)
$3,500 - Extreme Sport style Hovercar (GC-Twister)
 

The Karu by Tumo Mere

 

 

The Artists

In what is now Swordsfall tradition, I've gathered a team of incredibly diverse artists to help bring these ideas to life! I've gathered a mix of landscape and concept designers to illustrate these designs. 

  • Enmanuel Martinez
  • Juan Ochoa
  • BriAnna Haley

  • Jessica Cheng

​


Various Hoverbike Concept by Juan Ochoa

 

 

The Rewards

The rewards for this Art Booster is straight forward, a PDF that includes all the art produced along with a bit of lore giving you context and flavor.

  • Art PDF

The rewards for this Art Booster is straight forward, a PDF that includes all the art produced along with a bit of lore giving you context and flavor.​

  • Wallpapers

Each of the pieces of art coming from this booster pack will be converted into a Wallpaper Set! They will include HD desktop and phone versions. A great way to show off the art that you helped fund!

 

Limited Rewards

Some of our rewards only have limited slots, so get them while you can!

  • Hoverbike Rider

This limited tier lets you have yourself or your own Original Character drawn into one of the pieces from the Art Booster! Not just as anybody, but as one of the riders of these sweet machines. Will you be riding your hoverbike through the windy roads of the Adras Mountains? Or are you chilling in the back of a floating transport as it travels through The Isle? 

  • Vehicle Designer

This limited tier lets you design your own vehicle within Swordsfall! Have a sweet idea for a sidecar? Or maybe a transport for perishable goods? Or maybe it's just a sweet futuristic bicycle. Either way, we'll take your idea and make it a sweet thing within Swordsfall! As well you'll receive all the rewards from Hoverbike Rider tier and below!


Leisure Hoverbike by BriAnna Haley

 

 

What is Swordsfall?

In the beginning... Tikor is a world where deities and spirits are as real as the nature that surrounds us. Since the earliest writings of mankind, the gods have been there alongside humanity. They are a vital part of the makeup of human societies across the globe. In a way, this is to be expected. Humans were in fact created by the gods. Various great deities created cultures of their design and ethos. As time marched forward, these various cultures and groups co-existed. Sometimes contentiously, sometimes harmoniously, but always striving to co-exist. 

 


Ishvana Creates Tikor by Tumo Mere

 

History, however, would change its course in a single tragic day and the horrific night that followed. Mime, the Garuda deity of Wisdom, is assassinated at the hands of an alleged Vinyatian assassin. Mortal hands had never before slain a deity. As tensions between the rival nations of Garuda and Vinyata soared under a long Tikor night, a bloody battle erupted between the two sides. A truce was called once the truth of the news surrounding the assassination was called into question, but not before irreversible damage to both sides was done. 

Despite the armistice between bitter enemies, the wounds of that day will forever linger. The world heaves as the one constant, the gods themselves, waver. A new struggle begins…

 


Official Swordsfall Logo by Taylor Ruddle

 

It's The Year 10 A.R

As the world still recovers, ten years after the bloody events that ended the Era, its fallout begins to appear. Rumors around the world tell of the arrival of a new kind of weapon. Instruments capable of killing gods, Grim Arms. Could this be related to the unsolved assassination of Mime? 

In Garuda, a power struggle is in full effect as the current ruler of The Divine Order of the Phoenix, Amma Zencora, vies to hold onto his ill-gotten throne. How far will the ruler go to defend the throne he so desperately wants to keep? 

Vinyata is adjusting to a world with one less major city and cultural hub. The Eastern Node was destroyed during the bloody war at the End of the Era. An unpleasant surprise emerges as the survivors rebuild and a rash of malevolent spirits now roam the region. The souls of those lost 10 years ago are still attached to the mortal plane, hungry for vengeance and retribution. 


Dreamweaver Profession by FlorescentWolf

Hawklore's neutrality during The Longest Night has finally paid dividends. The God King, Hawken, basks in the increasing wealth of his nation. On the outside, it seems like a rich paradise where any want can be attained. Yet below the surface, in the dingy streets of the capital city of High Perch, dissent stirs.

Rumors abound that the desolate stretch of land known as the Ebon Cascade has become home to a new form of horror. Something cunning that is uniting the monstrous beings that inhabit the region. Whispers say a Raksha is on Tikor, hiding away and building an army. None want to believe the horrifying rumor, and none dare to confirm it.

In the boundless waters of The Grand Divide, new forces arise as the largest pirate fleet of them all, Heaven's Fall, begins to marshal. With the cold genius of Nubia leading them, her power has begun to make those on land to take notice. The law of the sea changes as rumors of an alliance between her and the tech genius, Kent Musa begin to circulate. 

In all corners of the world, events are in motion.

The Kickstarter that Started it All - Welcome to Tikor


Tikor/Minos Wallpaper by Taylor Ruddle

 

 

The Core Team

Brandon Dixon - Creator and Author of Swordsfall. He's a longtime omni-nerd who grew up during the golden days of Toonami, Spawn comic books and G4. (yeaaa remember that?) However, as a black man in the hobby, he found himself longing for more stories that told the adventures of people that looked like him. Creating Swordsfall has not only been an effort to be the change he wanted to see, but also as his own personal journey.

While this was his first major property, Brandon has moonlighted in designing before. Having built a number of smaller, unreleased tabletop games, freelanced in the gaming industry and built his own small convention - its easy to see that creating things is what he loves the most.

You can find him at: The Swordsfall Website  
And on Instagram: @swordsfallrpg 
And on Twitter: @swordsfall1 

T'umo Mere - Lead Artist. T'umo is the lead artist on Swordsfall and an exceptional illustrator. Hailing from Botswana, T'umo uses their knowledge of Africa's intricate art and culture to bring a local's modernized ideas to Swordsfall. They consider themselves an aspiring concept artist and illustrator specializing in video games and comics. 

You can find them at: Artstation 
And on Instagram at: @itstumo 
And on Twitter at: @ItsTumo 

Taylor Ruddle - Graphic Designer. Taylor is the lead Graphic Designer for Swordsfall and the sultan of making things gorgeous. He currently resides in New Zealand, where he knocks them dead with his stand-up comedy whenever he's not designing logos and other art. Taylor designed the newest Swordsfall logo, Chibis, icons and more.

You can find him at: Designsbychamp 
And on Twitter: @taylorruddle 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Share it on your favorite social media.
  • Use the hashtag #Swordsfall wherever you go!

 


Map of Tikor by Brandon Dixon

story:
NOTE: These are resin dice and not candy. Do not try to eat dice, children, because they're not edible and could harm you. These are resin dice and not candy.

Greetings, dice fans! Steve Jackson Games is no stranger to custom dice, having produced several different dice sets over the last few years. Our Kitten d6 Dice Set, Army Men d6 Dice Set, and Robot d6 Dice Set are only a handful of the designs you can find at Warehouse 23 and now, with your support, we're bringing an entirely new set of 19mm six-siders to your game table!

The Candy Heart d6 Dice Set is a pack of three different resin dice . . . and this time we're bringing you in on the ground floor of the project! Unlike the majority of our earlier dice sets, this crowdfunding campaign is your chance to be a part of the process all of the way from "we have an idea!" to " the dice have landed!" 

The above image is a digital mockup of the planned 19mm resin dice designs. The set includes three different dice. Exact colors, corner radius, and details may vary, depending on the factory's technical capabilities. Unlike the other dice we have produced, this campaign shows you the steps we take as we design a new pack of dice.

It All Starts With An Idea

First step: Send notes to the production team so that they have a rough starting point for the dice designs. The below text is what was provided to our production department:

"Inspired by the classic Valentine's Day candy. Colors are pastels.

Resin dice set of three 19mm dice. Hearts instead of pips on the two through six sides. The ones side has text:

1x LOVE
1x HUGS
1x XOXO"

Then the team prepares a flat image showing the six faces of each of the dice. Ideas are knocked around until the production department has something they're happy with that meets the project's core concept.

The above image shows the three dice designs as well as the color selections. The exact dice details are subject to change during the manufacturing process, but we will do all that we can to get as close to these designs as possible. Once this crowdfunding campaign has closed, then the factory will create the molds needed to produce the three different resin dice. The moldmaking process could result in slight adjustments to the size, positioning, and spacing of the design elements.

Next It Is The Factory's Turn

After submitting the designs, the factory reviews everything and provides us with a pricing estimate and rough schedule. Since these are resin dice, we're using a different supplier than we use for many of our dice . . . but have no fear! We know from experience that Longpack, our resin dice factory for this project, can create what we're looking for because they have already produced several dice for us. The Gelatinous dice game and our 19mm Munchkin Rainbow Dice were both handled by Longpack.

And This Is Where You Come In

Rather than take our usual next steps, we've turned to you, the dice collectors, to share in the process before we move to the manufacturing stage. If there's enough interest in the concept, then just as soon as this Indiegogo campaign comes to a close we will pull the trigger on the order. We will post photos as they come in so that you can watch updates as these dice go from our team's design drawings to the real world.

Join us, gang, and let's make these dice happen in time for Valentine's Day 2021!

NOTE: These are resin dice and not candy. Do not try to eat dice, children, because they're not edible and could harm you. These are resin dice and not candy.

Stretch Goal

We have only one stretch goal for this campaign, but it's a fun one that embraces the idea of sharing the dice manufacturing process with all of you. If the project reaches $10,000 before it ends, we will roll the dice on a new factory! We have been in communication with a new resin dice factory and have locked down the numbers. What we do not know, though, is exactly how the process will go.

If this project reaches $10,000 before it ends, we will place two orders for the new Candy Heart d6 Dice Set: One with Longpack, a supplier we have worked with before, and one with a completely new factory. If the second factory comes through on time and with quality dice, we will pack one bonus set of dice -- from the new factory -- in every $13 and higher rewards package.

If the new factory fails to deliver on time, or if the new factory fails to deliver acceptable dice, we will not include a bonus set in your rewards. This extra set of dice will only be packed in your rewards if we meet $10,000 and if the new factory delivers on schedule and delivers dice that we're willing to ship out. If the new dice are not of an acceptable quality, then we will destroy the dice and never speak of this again.

We will, of course, share pics and information on the manufacturing process with both of the dice suppliers. Think of this $10,000 stretch goal as an experiment and exploration of sorts. Can we find a new resin dice factory that can deliver quality dice, on time? Let's find out together!

Add-On Items

In addition to the new dice, you may wish to add some of these items to your rewards package! You may add them here during the Indiegogo campaign or in the BackerKit pledge manager (see below). 

Random Fun Generator - $15

This 76-page 7" x 10" wire-bound book is loaded with over 20 new dice games, every one of which requires several six-sided dice, pencil and paper, as well as your friends. We designed, developed, and playtested all 26 new games during lockdown through video chat, so we know from experience that you can play each one of these games using your favorite video chat service.

Meeple d6 Dice Set - $10

One pack of eight 16mm pearlized six-sided dice, all in the same color! We will randomly select your set from one of the six different colors that are currently available. If you want to select a specific color, please see your favorite local game store or our online store, Warehouse 23.

BackerKit Pledge Manager

We are using the BackerKit system to collect addresses and manage the project's fulfillment. After the project closes, we will send BackerKit surveys to all project supporters. At that time, we will also issue a survey deadline. As many of you are no doubt thinking, there will be many more add-on options in the BackerKit pledge manager.

NOTE: These are resin dice and not candy. Do not try to eat dice, children, because they're not edible and could harm you. These are resin dice and not candy.

This extra set of dice will only be packed in your rewards if we meet $10,000 and if the new factory delivers on schedule and delivers dice that we're willing to ship out. If the new dice are not of an acceptable quality, then we will destroy the dice and never speak of this again.We will, of course, share pics and information on the manufacturing process with both of the dice suppliers. Think of this $10,000 stretch goal as an experiment and exploration of sorts. Can we find a new resin dice factory that can deliver quality dice, on time? Let's find out together!Add-On ItemsIn addition to the new dice, you may wish to add some of these items to your rewards package! You may add them here during the Indiegogo campaign or in the BackerKit pledge manager (see below). 
Random Fun Generator - $15This 76-page 7" x 10" wire-bound book is loaded with over 20 new dice games, every one of which requires several six-sided dice, pencil and paper, as well as your friends. We designed, developed, and playtested all 26 new games during lockdown through video chat, so we know from experience that you can play each one of these games using your favorite video chat service.
Meeple d6 Dice Set - $10One pack of eight 16mm pearlized six-sided dice, all in the same color! We will randomly select your set from one of the six different colors that are currently available. If you want to select a specific color, please see your favorite local game store or our online store, Warehouse 23.BackerKit Pledge ManagerWe are using the BackerKit system to collect addresses and manage the project's fulfillment. After the project closes, we will send BackerKit surveys to all project supporters. At that time, we will also issue a survey deadline. As many of you are no doubt thinking, there will be many more add-on options in the BackerKit pledge manager.NOTE: These are resin dice and not candy. Do not try to eat dice, children, because they're not edible and could harm you. These are resin dice and not candy.

story:
The Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game is designed to be played with only a standard set of dice -- two six-sided dice. No pouch of various polyhedrons needed here. Just swipe a pair of good ol' fashion dice out of one of the board games tucked away in the linen closet. And while the dice required are minimum, the game itself is not limited. The POD RPG utilizes variations of familiar mechanics of old school role-playing games, while at the same time minimizing a lot of the crunch that can sometimes get in the way of playing a good story.

The Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game is not a "story telling" game. It's a bonafide role-playing game with all of the elements that players like: character attributes, skill checks, combat, and of course... dice rolling. There may be more "realistic" role-playing game systems out there, but is that why you really play role-playing games? The POD RPG system takes a more cinematic approach for more thrills and chills -- which is why you play role-playing games in the first place. Right?

The Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game is ideal for the one-off spur of the moment game (because someone in the group didn't show up or the game master is unprepared) or even an ongoing campaign that doesn't rely on the trappings of cumbersome rules and components.

The goal of this IndieGoGo campaign is to fund and distribute a digital (PDF) version of the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game Guide Book. The term "guide book" is used instead of "rule book" as the basis of the POD RPG system is meant to be flexible to fit the needs of the players, and not not be a set of hard and fast rules. Besides, rules are meant to be broken. The Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game Guide Book is estimated to clock in at 42 pages and will include the guidelines (or "rules" if you insist) for the POD RPG and examples and samples of how they can be applied in different role-playing game genres.

And, like any good role-playing game crowdfunding campaign worth your pledge, there are stretch goals. The Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game is more than just one guide book. The POD RPG line also consists of supplements (or PODs) to expand the system to fit any and all genres. Each stretch goal will unlock a new supplement (or POD) that goes into further detail on how the POD RPG can be utilized for specific genres of games such as fantasy, sci-fi, super hero, horror, you name it. These supplements will have more specific elements based on and constructed using the POD RPG system. For example the Fantasy POD will contain character archetypes, skills, weapons, spells, artifacts, creatures, and lore pertaining to the classic fantasy role-playing game setting. All backers of the campaign at the "Advanced Pod People Pledge" and the "Lifelong Pod People Pledge" will receive digital (PDF) copies of all unlocked POD RPG supplements (or PODs).

If the initial funding goal of $500 is reached the STRETCH GOALS will kick in. Psst... The first two stretch goals are already unlocked.

How to unlock the stretch goals...

100 Backers: Pretty simple and straightforward. Once the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game IndieGoGo campaign achieves 100 backers this stretch goal will be unlocked. Every backer at the "Advanced Pod People Pledge" and the "Lifelong Pod People Pledge" will receive the "100 Backers Unlocked Reward" in addition to the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game Basic Guide Book (PDF) and other unlocked stretch goals.

120 Facebook Page Likes: Once  the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game Facebook page each reach 120 likes this stretch goal will be unlocked and backers at the "Advanced Pod People Pledge and the "Livelong Pod People Pledge" levels will receive the "120 Facebook Page Likes Unlocked Reward" in addition to the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game Basic Guide Book (PDF) and other unlocked stretch goals.

120 Twitter Follows: Once the POD RPG (@pod_rpg) Twitter accounts each reach 120 follows this stretch goal will be unlocked and backers at the "Advanced Pod People Pledge and the "Livelong Pod People Pledge" levels will receive the "120 Twitter Followers Unlocked Reward" in addition to the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game Basic Guide Book (PDF) and other unlocked stretch goals.

200 Backers: Again, pretty simple and straightforward. Once the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game IndieGoGo campaign achieves 200 backers this stretch goal will be unlocked. Every backer at the "Advanced Pod People Pledge" and the "Lifelong Pod People Pledge" will receive the "200 Backers Unlocked Reward" in addition to the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game Basic Guide Book (PDF) and other unlocked stretch goals.

Keep in mind that these stretch goals will only be rewarded if the initial $500 funding goal is achieved.

And the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game supplements aren't stopping once this campaign has run its course. No siree. There are already over two dozen POD RPG supplements and adventures either in the works or planning stages -- with more to come. They range from genre specific bestiaries and campaign settings to one-off adventures. From alien field guides to zombie survival manuals, the POD RPG library will have your role-playing game needs covered. And that is why the "Lifelong Pod People Pledge" reward is being offered. This is your opportunity to get in on the ground floor of a versatile and ever-expanding role-playing game line. If you pledge at the "Lifelong Pod People Pledge" level you will receive every Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game digital (PDF) supplement and adventure that is produced and published by GeekPunk Games. You won't need to spend another dime to receive every POD RPG digital (PDF) product. There is no time limit nor maximum quantity limitation. As long as GeekPunk Games has a current email address you'll get the latest Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game product delivered to your inbox. (Or at least a link in which to download said POD RPG product.) There is no set timeline on when future POD RPG products will be released.

All of the rewards for this Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game IndieGoGo campaign are digital. No physical products are being produced at this time. (Stay tuned for the books.)

The Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game has already been successfully funded through other crowdfunding means, so even if the initial $500 funding goal is not achieved all IndieGoGo backers will receive their pledge rewards.

What are some details about the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game System?

The information provided below should serve as a sample of the very basics of the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game system and does not represent the entire scope of the game.

The overall resolution mechanic utilized with the Pair O’ Dice system is two six-sided dice—or 2d6. Resolution rolls are modified by a simple progression ladder of penalty and bonus modifiers. These modifiers are stackable, but are limited. Both character attributes and skills use the same 2 thru 12 ranking system. The modifiers generally rank from "Worst" (-3) to "Best (+3).

Most characters, player and non-player alike, as well as creatures, have six attributes. They are Muscle, Moves, Might, Mind, Moxie, and Mojo, or the six Ms. Each attribute is ranked or scored between 2 and 12—with 7 being the most common.

Grit (or grit points) is what keeps a character alive—a combination of physical and mental endurance, coping and enduring with damage and pain, and a will to live to fight another day.

Checks to determine success or failure are rolled using 2d6. (Just like about everything else in the game.) The method for skill checks is called “SAM.” S.A.M. = Skill + Attribute + Means.

The X-Factor represents abilities that are above and beyond “normal” capabilities. They may be manifested by a number of different means, such as alien, divine, mechanical, magic, mutation, special circumstances or conditions, etc… The X-Factor increased the chance of success and the end result.

Again, the examples above do not represent the Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game system as a whole, and is offered here to provide an idea of what it is all about.

Why create another role-playing game system?

The goal with the Pair o’ Dice Role-Playing Game is to devise a fun and enjoyable method to enjoy role-playing with a variety of different and creative settings and genres. In order to cook up a role-playing system that would be simple to learn, yet flexible enough to manage a wide variety of settings familiar role-playing game standards were borrowed and modified and a lot of excess was shaved off. In the Pair O’ Dice universe(s), certain laws of science, nature, and reality needed to be simplified and/or modified in order to achieve the goal of creating a simple role-playing game system that captured a cinematic feel.

So, things work the way they do in the Pair O’ Dice Role-Playing Game for a reason. It’s understood that the system here might not be ideal for every RPGer, and that’s why there are already hundreds of other different role-playing systems out there. If there’s a rule that you don’t like in the POD RPG system, then by all means break it and make it work the way you want. After all, rules were made to be broken. The rules, as they are, are rather sparse and straight forward for ease of play. A concentrated effort has been made not to expand or overthink the rules too much.

The Pair O’ Dice Role-Playing Game is the sort of game that you can play on the fly if your regular gaming session falls through by someone not showing up. Or, as a break from your mega-long epic campaign—just to mix things up. It’s a simple system that can be played during your lunch break at school or work, in a blanket fort with your kids, or in the backseat of a car during a long road trip.

The Pair O' Dice Role-Playing Game can also be used for extended campaigns and/or adventures when it is desirable for the rules to take a backseat to the overall story and fun.

Risks and Challenges

The Pair O' Dice Role Playing Game Guide Book is on track to be completed before the July ETA. The September ETA for additional unlocked stretch goal supplements is for the first few products with the additional products following in a timely manner of a few months. There is no set timeline for the additional "Lifelong Pod People Pledge" products, but they are anticipated to be released on at least a monthly schedule by the end of the 2017 calendar year.

The risk of successfully producing the final product is minimized by the fact that only digital rewards are being offered. There is no physical production of printed material to delay delivery. GeekPunk has run successful crowdfunding campaigns under the name "Dan Taylor" for various comic books such as Hero Happy Hour: On The Rocks, Hero Happy Hour Vs. The Supreme Leader, and Donald of the Dead.

GeekPunk's first RPG crowdfunding campaign Crosswell: Junction to Adventure was successful as well. While delays were experienced in production of the final product, lessons were learned to help assure that future campaigns run more efficiently.
