story:
Freebooter Miniatures presents: Limited 10 Year Anniversary Set – Freebooter's Fate "Legends" Character Set

   Diesen Text gibt es in der Gallery als Kampagnenbeschreibung auch auf Deutsch.

(Rechtsklick auf den Link und dann "Ziel speichern unter" auswählen).

Freebooter Miniatures is a German company producing mostly 30mm size metal miniatures for gamers, collectors and painters. The company is owned and run by Werner Klocke who has been a freelance sculptor for more than 18 years. His credits include sculpts for such well-known companies as Games Workshop, Reaper and Pivateer Press, among others. He has become particularly known for his love of dynamic poses and his skill at capturing the female form. Two years ago, Freebooter Miniatures successfully launched its own game, Freebooter’s Fate, a card-based, pirate-themed, diceless, tabletop skirmish game, which has had people going “Arrr!” all over the world since then and has already had two expansion sets published for it.

 

This year, Freebooter Miniatures celebrates its first 10 years in business. So what better way for a miniatures company to celebrate an event like that than to issue a set of limited edition special anniversary miniatures? Exactly.

So the idea was born to design a set of characters which were special: Legends of our game world, given the outstanding and finely-detailed physical form which our customers have come to expect from us.

Doing it via crowdfunding gives us the opportunity to add a few extra options which would not have been feasible in the classic business model and it gives you the opportunity to decide exactly how deeply to become involved.

Sounds interesting? It gets better. Read on.

 

So what can you expect to receive when forking out your hard-earned doubloons? Well, at the basic level, the project is about a set of five miniatures, depicting legendary characters from the world of Freebooter’s Fate. They have all left their mark in different ways and, in addition to unique abilities for each individual, they all use a new rules mechanic, called the Fate Point System.

And here they are:

Raven, aka Mistress of Shadows – an Imperial Noble, clandestine supporter of the Brotherhood and practitioner of a very dark and shadowy form of mysticism.

Maestro Cerebro & Birro – a mad goblin inventor of things that go Boom! and his long-suffering assistant who fusses over him like an old hen.

El Almirante – a heroic young man who in his declining years will become Gobernador of Longfall.

Captain Antoinette Balfour – an excellent sailor but a rotten leader, grubby, rum-sodden and not especially bright.

Ixchelcoatl – a legendary high priestess of the Amazons.

 

 

 

Of course, once you go beyond the basic level, and the more people get involved, the more advanced the options get. The beauty of crowdfunding projects is that you can go for the safe option of a basic pledge (our “Pirate” level) which gets you a guaranteed set of stuff, provided the project reaches its minimum funding level.

In our case, this minimum level sits at USD 5,000.

Alternatively, you can invest a bit more money (with a “Captain” level) and reap the benefits when more people become involved and the project really takes off. Once certain funding levels are reached (see below), the return for your initial pledge grows, even though you don’t you have pay any additional money.

These benefits can include additional parts or substitute parts for the characters, such as better weapons, sidekick characters or other miscellaneous stuff. Most of these add-ons are accompanied by character or equipment cards which take our already impressive Legends to even greater levels of power. Neat, huh?

Not all extra goals give you automatic bonuses, though, some release additional pledging/update options. These can be available for all pledge levels or just for specific ones, please see below for details.

 

 

So what happens once the campaign is over? Well, these miniatures are intended as a once-off special on the occasion of our 10 year anniversary. And once that is over, they will no longer be available from us. In fact, most of these sets will only be available as part of this Indiegogo campaign. The best way to secure your miniature(s) is to pledge the amount for what you’d like, spread the word among your mates so they get in on it as well and the project reaches not only its minimum funding level but also some stretch goals. Once this campaign is over, we cannot guarantee that we will have any models left over. They will at most be available until the end of our anniversary year. So, even if we have some unpledged ones left over, we will only sell them until October 2013. At a higher price. Only while stocks last. And that will be it. At Freebooter Miniatures, limited production run really does mean limited production run.

 

Please note that while shipping is free of charge, the items will be shipped from Germany and may thus be liable to customs duties outside the European Union.

 

The following applies to all perks,:

All miniatures are sculpted by Werner Klocke.

All sets are securely shipped in padded envelopes, there is no box.

All miniatures are made from metal. They will be supplied as unassembled, unbased kits, except where explicitly stated otherwise. They are all supplied with the standard Freebooter's Fate plastic bases with metal inserts.

The miniatures and all additional parts are 30mm size like all the other Freebooter’s Fate miniatures.

Each character comes with all the cards necessary to make it usable in Freebooter’s Fate, in German and in English.

Each set comes with a certificate of authenticity.

Shipping commences in March 2013.

All sets are shipped free of charge! Yes, that’s worldwide. Postage to anywhere in the world is on us.

Please also note that you do not necessarily need a credit card to participate in an Indiegogo campaign (see FAQ for setails).

Right, here are the perk levels and the stuff you can receive depending on the total funding level reached.

 

 

Deckhand level perk US$ 16

You will receive one Freebooter's Fate Legendary Character miniature of your choice including its character card. Please tell us the exact name of the character in Step 5 Comments section of your contribution. Some characters are excluded from this perk level (see picture above for who is available and who isn’t). Please note that characters at this level do not benefit from any stretch goals which might be reached.

This perk level will only be available exclusively at Indiegogo and at conventions attended by us while stocks last or our anniversary year is over!

FREE shipping worldwide!

WIP of Freebooter Goblin Captain Ragg!

 

Pirate Level Perk US$ 65

You will receive the Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set (all 5 miniatures) including all character cards.
This set will not benefit from any stretch goals reached during the campaign; you will only receive the basic miniatures.

This perk level will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. It will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be approx. $ 80.

FREE shipping worldwide!

 

NEW:  Codex Level Perk US$ 90

Some of you appear to have been so dazzled by the shiny metally goodness on offer that they completely overlooked the fact that we have a game in which the Legendary Characters can be used. So we made an extra perk to provide an entry point for those of you who would like to see their Legend stride through a world of rum, doubloons and salty seadogs in a fast, fun and entirely card-based tabletop skirmish game. With peg legs. For more information on the game of Freebooter’s Fate, see 

http://www.freebooters-fate.de//index.html.

With this perk, you will receive the Freebooter's Fate Rulebook (German or English), a set of Freebooter’s Fate playing cards, a starter set for the crew of your choice, and one Legendary Character from the Deckhand level perk. This set will not benefit from any stretch goals reached during the campaign; you will only receive the basic miniature.

NB: It is important that you tell us in the comments section

- in which language you would like your rulebook (German or English)

- which crew you would like (it should be noted that while it is not absolutely necessary, the separate purchase of the “Deep Jungle” expansion book when choosing Amazons as your crew would be beneficial for all parties concerned)

- which specific Legendary character you would like.

! Please add US$ 10 when pledging for the Goblin Pirates in this perk, because their starter set contains 6 instead of the usual 4 miniatures. !

Should you have already made a pledge which overlaps with this one and would like to upgrade, simply pledge the difference without claiming a perk and let us know in the comments field (or via email at crowdfunding_AT_freebooterminiatures.de) from where to where you would like to upgrade.

A brief note for those of you thinking of Christmas or who are just plain impatient. This perk will be sent out in two parts: shipping of the limited edition miniature will commence in March 2013 as advertised, but the rules, cards and starter box will be shipped in November. (Free of charge worldwide, of course.) That’s right, in time for Christmas for most countries.

FREE Shipping Worldwide!

 

Captain Level Perk US$ 100

You will receive the Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set (all 5 miniatures shown in the Pirate level perk) including character cards.

Plus

a sixth character and her character card: Calamitè Balfour. She is a Pirate and a Cult character. Sort of a culty pirate. She will only be available here with this perk!

Plus

all extra goals for these six characters which will be reached in the course of this campaign.

This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo! This perk level is your only chance to get upgrades for these already stunning Legendary Characters.

FREE shipping worldwide!

 

 

Quartermaster Level Perk US$ 125

You will receive 2 copies of the basic Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Pirate Level perk!

This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo!

FREE shipping worldwide!

 

Commodore Level Perk US$ 195

You will receive 2 copies of the six Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Captain Level perk including all stretch goals for these six characters which will be achieved over the course of this campaign! One to paint and play with, the other to keep under controlled conditions in a locked vault…

This perk level will only be available here at Indiegogo!

FREE shipping worldwide!

 

NEW:  Long John Silver Level Perk US$ 250

We at Freebooter Miniatures love us some shiny metally goodness. So we looked at our new Legend miniatures and thought about whether there was any way of making them even shinier and, um, more metally. And we have found one. The result is this version of the Freebooter goblin captain in silver for the serious collector. Yes, not just silver-plated, one step up from ordinary sterling silver (925), this miniature is made of solid fine silver (935).

These miniatures have individual sequential numbers engraved on them so you can be sure to own a unique copy. We are offering the first 10 of these here on Indiegogo. In future, we may release additional ones, e.g. as trophies for tournaments, on special occasions, maybe even in different materials or finishes, but your only real chance of obtaining one of the single-digit ones is here on Indiegogo.

FREE shipping worldwide!

WIP of Freebooter Goblin Captain Ragg!

 

NEW!  Admiral Level Perk US$ 280

Limited to 5!

You will receive one of the basic Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters from the Pirate Level perk fully painted in studio quality by famous German painter Rafael Urbanski!

This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo and is limited to 5! These can be multiples of the same character, however, so several pledgers can obtain a painted El Almirante, for example.

FREE shipping worldwide!

You do not have to decide which miniature you would like Rafael to paint for you when you pick this perk, but instead are allowed to wait until you have seen all Greens.

Here are some examples of Rafael’s work. Find more in the gallery, in our online shop or on his blog at http://www.minimanie.de/ . These miniatures are for illustration purposes only and are not part of this perk!

 

 

NEW!  Pirate Queen Level Perk US$ 500

Limited to 10 up for grabs!

You will receive one of the Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters from the set shown at the Captain level perk or the Deckhand level perk, fully painted by world famous painter Jennifer Haley! Yes, that Jennifer Haley.

This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo and is limited to 10! These can be multiples of the same character, however, so several pledgers can obtain a painted El Almirante, for example.

Jennifer has also kindly agreed to paint not just the basic version of the character but, where applicable, the one including all the stretchgoals achieved at campaign end which directly affect the character (i.e. excluding sidekick characters on separate bases).

Of course you will choose, which parts will be used to assemble the miniature and thus be painted!

You do not have to decide which miniature you would like Jennifer to paint for you when you pick this perk, but instead are allowed to wait until you have seen all Greens.

FREE shipping worldwide!

And WIP pics of Cerebro:

 

 

Treasure Hunter Level Perk US$ 700

Limited to 6 up for grabs!

You will receive the six Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Captain Level perk including all extra goals for these six characters which will be achieved over the course of this campaign!

plus

an original Green of one of the six Captain level Legendary Characters.

That’s right. How much more limited can you get? This set contains one of the original sculpts from which the masters for this set were made. Please give us a ranked list of preferences for all six characters in the comments section of your contribution. First come, first serve!

The Green in this perk will include all the original sculpted bits (arms and heads) for the miniature as well which have been achieved as part of the stretchgoals.

This perk level will only be available here at Indiegogo! As do all the other miniatures, the green does NOT come with production rights, copyrights or a commercial licence in any way, shape or form. Apart from bragging rights. Those you do get, of course.

FREE shipping worldwide!

 

Gobernador Level Perk US$ 1,700

Estimated delivery: June 2013

Limited to 3 up for grabs!

You will receive the six Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Captain Level perk including all extra goals for these six characters which will be achieved over the course of this campaign!

plus

A Freebooter's Fate miniature designed by you!

Here's the deal in detail: You tell us what kind of miniature you would like, provided it is humanoid in shape, roughly human-sized and fits one of the Freebooter's Fate crews. We will provide concept sketches with your likeness or the likeness desired by you. The character will become part of a crew in the next Freebooter's Fate expansion book to be published next year, so we will write some rules for it as well. This means that we will also be giving it a name based on your own or based on your suggestions. Please keep in mind that the character will have to fit into the world of Freebooter's Fate, please don't ask for male Amazons, for example.

In addition to your place in gaming history, you will also receive the orignal green of the character. Of course, the production rights, copyright of the sculpt and any commercial licence in any way, shape or form shall remain with Freebooter Miniatures. So you're not allowed to make copies of it. You won't have to, mind, because we will also be supplying you with 10 metal casts of your miniature, which should be enough to be getting on with for all sorts of gaming-related purposes.

This perk level will only be available here at Indiegogo! 

FREE shipping worldwide!


 

 

 

 

The legendary Freebooter Goblin Captain will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!

He will be only available here on Indiegogo and - while stocks last - at conventions we are attending. RRP will be $ 18.

 

 

The Ranged Attack Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

All six characters will each get an extra arm to enhance their ranged combat ability. You can never go wrong with extra oomph! at range. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 

 

"Coatl" the feathered snake will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

A feathered snake, easily hidden on the body of an Amazon Priestess in full ceremonial getup, Coatl is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 
 

 

The Skeletal Powdermonkey will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

A pirate who can also fight for the Cult, and you think she will hand her pistol to just any old monkey for reloading? No, no, no. You have to do these things with style. The skeletal Powdermonkey fits onto Calamité's base and comes with a unique equipment card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 


The Head Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

All six characters will each get an extra head. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 

"Mozo" the standard bearer of El Almirante will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

Mozo is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 

Mercenario-Capitan Virgo Despiedad will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!

In addition to his other special abilities, Virgo has charisma and authority practically oozing out of every pore. Coupled with his legendary reputation, this allows him to act as leader of a crew consisting entirely of mercenaries.

Like the Pirate level set, Virgo will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. He will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be US$ 18.

Free shipping worldwide!

 

The Close Combat Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

All six characters will each get an extra arm to enhance their close combat ability. You can never go wrong with extra strength. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 

Bonus Stretchgoal

We have been so overwhelmed with the success of this campaign that we have decided to include a spontaneous bonus to the Captain level. Yes, it wasn’t announced, you didn’t know it was coming, it just so happens that we are nice people who appreciate their loyal fans and customers. So here you go:

The Raven Queen’s ethereal Shadow will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

The Shadow is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 

"Cebo", Cerebro's faithful assistant, will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

Cebo is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

The Additional bit Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

All six characters will each get an extra bit to enhance their look and fighting ability. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

"Dirtbag", Antoinette's little monkey, will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

Dirtbag is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

Bonus surprise Stretchgoal!

Chassa, a new mercenary will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!

Our confidence has been boosted to such an extent by all the support which people have shown us that we have decided to throw in another stretch goal out of schedule. Chassa is, well, you know, when people want to have a quiet word with somebody? Somebody who might not necessarily want to have any word whatsoever with them, quit or otherwise? That’s when they call people like Chassa. Yeah, that’s right, she’s a bounty-hunter. Since she is excusively motivated by money, she is quite happy to sign up as a mercenary with a crew fighting against her mark anyway, thus getting effectively paid twice.

Like the Pirate level set, Chassa will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. She will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be US$ 18.

Free shipping worldwide!

 

Double Time! At 50.000 USD we will give you TWO new stretch goals instead of one:

FIRST:

"Tufo", Calamite's assistant, will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

Tufo is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. As you can see, this puppet like thing is unliving in some sort and needs to be controlled by Calamite.  Only available here on Indiegogo!

SECOND:

Papa Houngan will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!

Papa Houngan shows what happens when you actually start to enjoy being possessed by loas. Since he is unable to invoke them himself, he is forced to roam the countryside constantly on the lookout for a mystic to attach himself to and revel in the feeling of another being controlling his thoughts and actions. Without a spiritual rider, Papa Houngan is reduced to shuffling around like a coffee addict before their first cup of the day.

Like the Pirate level set, Papa Houngan will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. He will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be US$ 18.

Free shipping worldwide!

 

 

The "Legendary Upgrade" pack will be added for free to all Mercenario Captain Virgo Despiedad “Deckhand” perk levels!

This upgrade pack includes an alternate head and two arms, which will enhance Virgos combat skills, as well as two new weapons (a rifle and a boar spear) for singular use. With this upgrade Virgo becomes truly terrifying and extremely versatile on the gaming table.

The RRP for him will be approx. US$ 20.

 

 

The second Additional bit Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

All six characters will each get an extra bit to enhance their look and fighting ability. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

The "Legendary Upgrade" pack will be added for free to all Papa Houngan “Deckhand” perk levels!

This upgrade pack includes an alternate head and two arms, which will enhance Papa Houngans combat or mystic skills, as well as a set of shrunken heads. With these upgrades Papa will be an even more valuable enhancement for every Cult-Mystic.

The RRP for him will be approx. US$ 20.

 

 

Cererbro's mini canon will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

 

The "Legendary Upgrade" pack will be added for free to all Chassa “Deckhand” perk levels!

This upgrade pack includes an alternate head and two arms holding a netgun.

The RRP for her will be approx. US$ 20.

 

Special bonus stretch goal:

"Pelado" the powder monkey of El Almirante will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!

Pelado fits onto El Almirante's base and comes with a unique equipment card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

So come on, do your bit. Loosen those purse strings. Is this really an opportunity you can afford to miss out on? Do you really want to be suffering from regretful envy next year when everybody else is showing off their shiny metally goodness, leaving you to wish you had got in on it when you had the chance? Of course you don't. Arrr! :-)

 

12 hours to go!

I am stunned and very happy of how our 10th years anniversary campaign is going so far. I would like to thank you very much for your support and the confidence you put in me and Freebooter Miniatures.

I hope that you have the same fun with the Freebooter’s Fate Legend set and our game than I will surely have sculpting these figures for you. I am really looking foreward to the next 10 years!

All the best

Werner Klocke

_

Noch 12 Stunden!

Und was für ein Erfolg! Ich bin glücklich und sehr stolz darauf, wie weit wir mit unserer Kampagne zu unserem 10 jährigen Jubiläum bereits gekommen sind. Vielen Dank für Eure Unterstützung und Euer Vertrauen an mich und Freebooter Miniatures!

Ich hoffe, Ihr habt ebenso viel Spaß mit dem Freebooter’s Fate Legend set und unserem Spiel Freebooter’s Fate, wie ich ihn haben werde, sie zu modellieren und zu designen. Und ich freue bereits jetzt auf die nächsten 10 Jahre!

Vielen Dank!

Werner Klocke

 

 

FAQ summary:

It seems that the FAQ section is hidden quite well, so here is the top list of questions we have been asked:

Do I need a credit card for that? Can I pay with credit card?

Indiegogo uses Paypal AND credit card for contributions, and, in Germany at least, you do not need a credit card for Paypal use, a current bank account is sufficient.

Can I upgrade my contribution at a later stage?

Sure, if you can`t resist the temptation as more and more groovy extra bits get revealed, you can contribute the difference to what you want to have now, put a corresponding note in the comments box. Please note that downgrading your contribution is not possible.

Can I make multiple contributions for the same level?

Absolutely, go right ahead. This could be necessary if you want to have all ten Legends (needing one Captain and four Deckhand perks in total).

Can I get a single miniature of the Pirate set, but with all the bonus options?

No, sorry. In order to be able to offer the sets on Indiegogo at the prices we do, we have to group certain options together. Only the Captain perk and Captain-related ones guarantee you these updates. Deckhand perks for Virgo Despiedad, Papa Houngan and Chassa can possibly benefit from stretch goals.

Can I get Calamite Balfour in any other form than in the Captain perk?

No, sorry. Calamite is the “Indiegogo Captain Perk”-exclusive. She is the only model of this campaign that will ONLY be available at Indiegogo and ONLY for Captain or Captain based perks.

How do I have to contribute for a limited perk?

In order to contribute for a limited perk you MUST claim that perk. It is NOT possible to just make a contribution and tell us, that you want to have a limited perk. We need the counter for the limitation to go up, so that everyone can see how much limited sets are left and thus we won't fullfill any limited perk orders we received via comments only.

Can I add regular orders from the Freebooter shop to my Indiegogo contribution to gain free shipping on that order?

Yes, of course you can. Just tell us in the comments section of the Freebooter Miniatures Online Shop, that you have contributed and want to have the contribution and the regular order shipped all in one. But please note, that we ship the Inidegogo goods in March 2013, so any additional orders from our shop will also be shipped in March 2013 if you link them to the Indiegogo contribution. 

In case you don't want to wait and need some stuff from our store earlier, please have a look at our shipping conditions:

Germany: 2,50 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 60,-+ EURO

Europe: 4,50 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 120,-+ EURO

World: 6,00 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 180,-+ EURO
story_txt:
Freebooter Miniatures presents: Limited 10 Year Anniversary Set – Freebooter's Fate "Legends" Character Set
   Diesen Text gibt es in der Gallery als Kampagnenbeschreibung auch auf Deutsch.
(Rechtsklick auf den Link und dann "Ziel speichern unter" auswählen).

Freebooter Miniatures is a German company producing mostly 30mm size metal miniatures for gamers, collectors and painters. The company is owned and run by Werner Klocke who has been a freelance sculptor for more than 18 years. His credits include sculpts for such well-known companies as Games Workshop, Reaper and Pivateer Press, among others. He has become particularly known for his love of dynamic poses and his skill at capturing the female form. Two years ago, Freebooter Miniatures successfully launched its own game, Freebooter’s Fate, a card-based, pirate-themed, diceless, tabletop skirmish game, which has had people going “Arrr!” all over the world since then and has already had two expansion sets published for it.
 

This year, Freebooter Miniatures celebrates its first 10 years in business. So what better way for a miniatures company to celebrate an event like that than to issue a set of limited edition special anniversary miniatures? Exactly.
So the idea was born to design a set of characters which were special: Legends of our game world, given the outstanding and finely-detailed physical form which our customers have come to expect from us.
Doing it via crowdfunding gives us the opportunity to add a few extra options which would not have been feasible in the classic business model and it gives you the opportunity to decide exactly how deeply to become involved.
Sounds interesting? It gets better. Read on.
 

So what can you expect to receive when forking out your hard-earned doubloons? Well, at the basic level, the project is about a set of five miniatures, depicting legendary characters from the world of Freebooter’s Fate. They have all left their mark in different ways and, in addition to unique abilities for each individual, they all use a new rules mechanic, called the Fate Point System.
And here they are:

Raven, aka Mistress of Shadows – an Imperial Noble, clandestine supporter of the Brotherhood and practitioner of a very dark and shadowy form of mysticism.

Maestro Cerebro & Birro – a mad goblin inventor of things that go Boom! and his long-suffering assistant who fusses over him like an old hen.
El Almirante – a heroic young man who in his declining years will become Gobernador of Longfall.
Captain Antoinette Balfour – an excellent sailor but a rotten leader, grubby, rum-sodden and not especially bright.
Ixchelcoatl – a legendary high priestess of the Amazons. 

 
 
 

Of course, once you go beyond the basic level, and the more people get involved, the more advanced the options get. The beauty of crowdfunding projects is that you can go for the safe option of a basic pledge (our “Pirate” level) which gets you a guaranteed set of stuff, provided the project reaches its minimum funding level.
In our case, this minimum level sits at USD 5,000.
Alternatively, you can invest a bit more money (with a “Captain” level) and reap the benefits when more people become involved and the project really takes off. Once certain funding levels are reached (see below), the return for your initial pledge grows, even though you don’t you have pay any additional money.
These benefits can include additional parts or substitute parts for the characters, such as better weapons, sidekick characters or other miscellaneous stuff. Most of these add-ons are accompanied by character or equipment cards which take our already impressive Legends to even greater levels of power. Neat, huh?
Not all extra goals give you automatic bonuses, though, some release additional pledging/update options. These can be available for all pledge levels or just for specific ones, please see below for details.
 
 

So what happens once the campaign is over? Well, these miniatures are intended as a once-off special on the occasion of our 10 year anniversary. And once that is over, they will no longer be available from us. In fact, most of these sets will only be available as part of this Indiegogo campaign. The best way to secure your miniature(s) is to pledge the amount for what you’d like, spread the word among your mates so they get in on it as well and the project reaches not only its minimum funding level but also some stretch goals. Once this campaign is over, we cannot guarantee that we will have any models left over. They will at most be available until the end of our anniversary year. So, even if we have some unpledged ones left over, we will only sell them until October 2013. At a higher price. Only while stocks last. And that will be it. At Freebooter Miniatures, limited production run really does mean limited production run.
 

Please note that while shipping is free of charge, the items will be shipped from Germany and may thus be liable to customs duties outside the European Union.
 

The following applies to all perks,:
All miniatures are sculpted by Werner Klocke.
All sets are securely shipped in padded envelopes, there is no box.
All miniatures are made from metal. They will be supplied as unassembled, unbased kits, except where explicitly stated otherwise. They are all supplied with the standard Freebooter's Fate plastic bases with metal inserts.
The miniatures and all additional parts are 30mm size like all the other Freebooter’s Fate miniatures.
Each character comes with all the cards necessary to make it usable in Freebooter’s Fate, in German and in English.
Each set comes with a certificate of authenticity.
Shipping commences in March 2013.
All sets are shipped free of charge! Yes, that’s worldwide. Postage to anywhere in the world is on us.
Please also note that you do not necessarily need a credit card to participate in an Indiegogo campaign (see FAQ for setails).
Right, here are the perk levels and the stuff you can receive depending on the total funding level reached.
 

 

Deckhand level perk US$ 16
You will receive one Freebooter's Fate Legendary Character miniature of your choice including its character card. Please tell us the exact name of the character in Step 5 Comments section of your contribution. Some characters are excluded from this perk level (see picture above for who is available and who isn’t). Please note that characters at this level do not benefit from any stretch goals which might be reached.
This perk level will only be available exclusively at Indiegogo and at conventions attended by us while stocks last or our anniversary year is over!
FREE shipping worldwide!

WIP of Freebooter Goblin Captain Ragg!
 

Pirate Level Perk US$ 65
You will receive the Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set (all 5 miniatures) including all character cards.  This set will not benefit from any stretch goals reached during the campaign; you will only receive the basic miniatures. This perk level will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. It will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be approx. $ 80.
FREE shipping worldwide!
 

NEW:  Codex Level Perk US$ 90
Some of you appear to have been so dazzled by the shiny metally goodness on offer that they completely overlooked the fact that we have a game in which the Legendary Characters can be used. So we made an extra perk to provide an entry point for those of you who would like to see their Legend stride through a world of rum, doubloons and salty seadogs in a fast, fun and entirely card-based tabletop skirmish game. With peg legs. For more information on the game of Freebooter’s Fate, see 
http://www.freebooters-fate.de//index.html.
With this perk, you will receive the Freebooter's Fate Rulebook (German or English), a set of Freebooter’s Fate playing cards, a starter set for the crew of your choice, and one Legendary Character from the Deckhand level perk. This set will not benefit from any stretch goals reached during the campaign; you will only receive the basic miniature.
NB: It is important that you tell us in the comments section
- in which language you would like your rulebook (German or English)
- which crew you would like (it should be noted that while it is not absolutely necessary, the separate purchase of the “Deep Jungle” expansion book when choosing Amazons as your crew would be beneficial for all parties concerned)
- which specific Legendary character you would like.
! Please add US$ 10 when pledging for the Goblin Pirates in this perk, because their starter set contains 6 instead of the usual 4 miniatures. !
Should you have already made a pledge which overlaps with this one and would like to upgrade, simply pledge the difference without claiming a perk and let us know in the comments field (or via email at crowdfunding_AT_freebooterminiatures.de) from where to where you would like to upgrade.
A brief note for those of you thinking of Christmas or who are just plain impatient. This perk will be sent out in two parts: shipping of the limited edition miniature will commence in March 2013 as advertised, but the rules, cards and starter box will be shipped in November. (Free of charge worldwide, of course.) That’s right, in time for Christmas for most countries.
FREE Shipping Worldwide!
 

Captain Level Perk US$ 100
You will receive the Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set (all 5 miniatures shown in the Pirate level perk) including character cards.
Plus
a sixth character and her character card: Calamitè Balfour. She is a Pirate and a Cult character. Sort of a culty pirate. She will only be available here with this perk!

Plus
all extra goals for these six characters which will be reached in the course of this campaign.
This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo! This perk level is your only chance to get upgrades for these already stunning Legendary Characters.
FREE shipping worldwide!
 
 

Quartermaster Level Perk US$ 125
You will receive 2 copies of the basic Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Pirate Level perk!
This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo!
FREE shipping worldwide!
 

Commodore Level Perk US$ 195
You will receive 2 copies of the six Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Captain Level perk including all stretch goals for these six characters which will be achieved over the course of this campaign! One to paint and play with, the other to keep under controlled conditions in a locked vault…
This perk level will only be available here at Indiegogo!
FREE shipping worldwide!
 

NEW:  Long John Silver Level Perk US$ 250
We at Freebooter Miniatures love us some shiny metally goodness. So we looked at our new Legend miniatures and thought about whether there was any way of making them even shinier and, um, more metally. And we have found one. The result is this version of the Freebooter goblin captain in silver for the serious collector. Yes, not just silver-plated, one step up from ordinary sterling silver (925), this miniature is made of solid fine silver (935).
These miniatures have individual sequential numbers engraved on them so you can be sure to own a unique copy. We are offering the first 10 of these here on Indiegogo. In future, we may release additional ones, e.g. as trophies for tournaments, on special occasions, maybe even in different materials or finishes, but your only real chance of obtaining one of the single-digit ones is here on Indiegogo.
FREE shipping worldwide!

WIP of Freebooter Goblin Captain Ragg!
 

NEW!  Admiral Level Perk US$ 280
Limited to 5!
You will receive one of the basic Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters from the Pirate Level perk fully painted in studio quality by famous German painter Rafael Urbanski!
This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo and is limited to 5! These can be multiples of the same character, however, so several pledgers can obtain a painted El Almirante, for example.
FREE shipping worldwide!
You do not have to decide which miniature you would like Rafael to paint for you when you pick this perk, but instead are allowed to wait until you have seen all Greens.
Here are some examples of Rafael’s work. Find more in the gallery, in our online shop or on his blog at http://www.minimanie.de/ . These miniatures are for illustration purposes only and are not part of this perk!

 
 

NEW!  Pirate Queen Level Perk US$ 500
Limited to 10 up for grabs!
You will receive one of the Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters from the set shown at the Captain level perk or the Deckhand level perk, fully painted by world famous painter Jennifer Haley! Yes, that Jennifer Haley.
This perk level will only be available here on Indiegogo and is limited to 10! These can be multiples of the same character, however, so several pledgers can obtain a painted El Almirante, for example.
Jennifer has also kindly agreed to paint not just the basic version of the character but, where applicable, the one including all the stretchgoals achieved at campaign end which directly affect the character (i.e. excluding sidekick characters on separate bases).
Of course you will choose, which parts will be used to assemble the miniature and thus be painted!
You do not have to decide which miniature you would like Jennifer to paint for you when you pick this perk, but instead are allowed to wait until you have seen all Greens.
FREE shipping worldwide!


And WIP pics of Cerebro:

 
 

Treasure Hunter Level Perk US$ 700
Limited to 6 up for grabs!
You will receive the six Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Captain Level perk including all extra goals for these six characters which will be achieved over the course of this campaign!
plus
an original Green of one of the six Captain level Legendary Characters.
That’s right. How much more limited can you get? This set contains one of the original sculpts from which the masters for this set were made. Please give us a ranked list of preferences for all six characters in the comments section of your contribution. First come, first serve!
The Green in this perk will include all the original sculpted bits (arms and heads) for the miniature as well which have been achieved as part of the stretchgoals.
This perk level will only be available here at Indiegogo! As do all the other miniatures, the green does NOT come with production rights, copyrights or a commercial licence in any way, shape or form. Apart from bragging rights. Those you do get, of course.
FREE shipping worldwide!
 

Gobernador Level Perk US$ 1,700
Estimated delivery: June 2013
Limited to 3 up for grabs!
You will receive the six Freebooter's Fate Legendary Characters set from the Captain Level perk including all extra goals for these six characters which will be achieved over the course of this campaign!
plus
A Freebooter's Fate miniature designed by you!
Here's the deal in detail: You tell us what kind of miniature you would like, provided it is humanoid in shape, roughly human-sized and fits one of the Freebooter's Fate crews. We will provide concept sketches with your likeness or the likeness desired by you. The character will become part of a crew in the next Freebooter's Fate expansion book to be published next year, so we will write some rules for it as well. This means that we will also be giving it a name based on your own or based on your suggestions. Please keep in mind that the character will have to fit into the world of Freebooter's Fate, please don't ask for male Amazons, for example.
In addition to your place in gaming history, you will also receive the orignal green of the character. Of course, the production rights, copyright of the sculpt and any commercial licence in any way, shape or form shall remain with Freebooter Miniatures. So you're not allowed to make copies of it. You won't have to, mind, because we will also be supplying you with 10 metal casts of your miniature, which should be enough to be getting on with for all sorts of gaming-related purposes.
This perk level will only be available here at Indiegogo! 
FREE shipping worldwide!
 
 
 
 
The legendary Freebooter Goblin Captain will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!
He will be only available here on Indiegogo and - while stocks last - at conventions we are attending. RRP will be $ 18.

 
  

The Ranged Attack Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
All six characters will each get an extra arm to enhance their ranged combat ability. You can never go wrong with extra oomph! at range. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
 
 

"Coatl" the feathered snake will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
A feathered snake, easily hidden on the body of an Amazon Priestess in full ceremonial getup, Coatl is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
  
 

The Skeletal Powdermonkey will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"!  
A pirate who can also fight for the Cult, and you think she will hand her pistol to just any old monkey for reloading? No, no, no. You have to do these things with style. The skeletal Powdermonkey fits onto Calamité's base and comes with a unique equipment card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
 
 

The Head Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
All six characters will each get an extra head. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
 

"Mozo" the standard bearer of El Almirante will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
Mozo is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
 

Mercenario-Capitan Virgo Despiedad will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!
In addition to his other special abilities, Virgo has charisma and authority practically oozing out of every pore. Coupled with his legendary reputation, this allows him to act as leader of a crew consisting entirely of mercenaries. Like the Pirate level set, Virgo will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. He will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be US$ 18.
Free shipping worldwide!

 

The Close Combat Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
All six characters will each get an extra arm to enhance their close combat ability. You can never go wrong with extra strength. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
 

Bonus Stretchgoal
We have been so overwhelmed with the success of this campaign that we have decided to include a spontaneous bonus to the Captain level. Yes, it wasn’t announced, you didn’t know it was coming, it just so happens that we are nice people who appreciate their loyal fans and customers. So here you go:
The Raven Queen’s ethereal Shadow will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
The Shadow is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
 

"Cebo", Cerebro's faithful assistant, will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
Cebo is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

The Additional bit Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
All six characters will each get an extra bit to enhance their look and fighting ability. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

"Dirtbag", Antoinette's little monkey, will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
Dirtbag is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

Bonus surprise Stretchgoal!
Chassa, a new mercenary will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!
Our confidence has been boosted to such an extent by all the support which people have shown us that we have decided to throw in another stretch goal out of schedule. Chassa is, well, you know, when people want to have a quiet word with somebody? Somebody who might not necessarily want to have any word whatsoever with them, quit or otherwise? That’s when they call people like Chassa. Yeah, that’s right, she’s a bounty-hunter. Since she is excusively motivated by money, she is quite happy to sign up as a mercenary with a crew fighting against her mark anyway, thus getting effectively paid twice.
Like the Pirate level set, Chassa will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. She will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be US$ 18.
Free shipping worldwide!

 

Double Time! At 50.000 USD we will give you TWO new stretch goals instead of one:
FIRST:
"Tufo", Calamite's assistant, will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
Tufo is an additional character on its own base and with its own character card. As you can see, this puppet like thing is unliving in some sort and needs to be controlled by Calamite.  Only available here on Indiegogo!

SECOND:
Papa Houngan will be added as a new option to the perk level “Deckhand”!
Papa Houngan shows what happens when you actually start to enjoy being possessed by loas. Since he is unable to invoke them himself, he is forced to roam the countryside constantly on the lookout for a mystic to attach himself to and revel in the feeling of another being controlling his thoughts and actions. Without a spiritual rider, Papa Houngan is reduced to shuffling around like a coffee addict before their first cup of the day.
Like the Pirate level set, Papa Houngan will be available from regular retail outlets (you know, FLGSs, our own online store etc.) after this campaign has finished. He will have a limited production time of one year until the end of October 2013. RRP will be US$ 18.
Free shipping worldwide!

 
 

The "Legendary Upgrade" pack will be added for free to all Mercenario Captain Virgo Despiedad “Deckhand” perk levels! 
This upgrade pack includes an alternate head and two arms, which will enhance Virgos combat skills, as well as two new weapons (a rifle and a boar spear) for singular use. With this upgrade Virgo becomes truly terrifying and extremely versatile on the gaming table. 
The RRP for him will be approx. US$ 20.
 

 

The second Additional bit Upgrade pack will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
All six characters will each get an extra bit to enhance their look and fighting ability. This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 

The "Legendary Upgrade" pack will be added for free to all Papa Houngan “Deckhand” perk levels! 
This upgrade pack includes an alternate head and two arms, which will enhance Papa Houngans combat or mystic skills, as well as a set of shrunken heads. With these upgrades Papa will be an even more valuable enhancement for every Cult-Mystic.
The RRP for him will be approx. US$ 20.
 

 

Cererbro's mini canon will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
This upgrade will include equipment cards where appropriate. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
 

The "Legendary Upgrade" pack will be added for free to all Chassa “Deckhand” perk levels! 
This upgrade pack includes an alternate head and two arms holding a netgun.
The RRP for her will be approx. US$ 20.
 


Special bonus stretch goal:
"Pelado" the powder monkey of El Almirante will be added for free to perk levels “Captain”, “Commodore”, “Treasure Hunter” & "Gobernador"! 
Pelado fits onto El Almirante's base and comes with a unique equipment card. Only available here on Indiegogo!

 
So come on, do your bit. Loosen those purse strings. Is this really an opportunity you can afford to miss out on? Do you really want to be suffering from regretful envy next year when everybody else is showing off their shiny metally goodness, leaving you to wish you had got in on it when you had the chance? Of course you don't. Arrr! :-)
 
12 hours to go!
I am stunned and very happy of how our 10th years anniversary campaign is going so far. I would like to thank you very much for your support and the confidence you put in me and Freebooter Miniatures.
I hope that you have the same fun with the Freebooter’s Fate Legend set and our game than I will surely have sculpting these figures for you. I am really looking foreward to the next 10 years!
All the best
Werner Klocke
_
Noch 12 Stunden!
Und was für ein Erfolg! Ich bin glücklich und sehr stolz darauf, wie weit wir mit unserer Kampagne zu unserem 10 jährigen Jubiläum bereits gekommen sind. Vielen Dank für Eure Unterstützung und Euer Vertrauen an mich und Freebooter Miniatures!
Ich hoffe, Ihr habt ebenso viel Spaß mit dem Freebooter’s Fate Legend set und unserem Spiel Freebooter’s Fate, wie ich ihn haben werde, sie zu modellieren und zu designen. Und ich freue bereits jetzt auf die nächsten 10 Jahre!
Vielen Dank!
Werner Klocke
 
 
FAQ summary: 
It seems that the FAQ section is hidden quite well, so here is the top list of questions we have been asked:
Do I need a credit card for that? Can I pay with credit card?
Indiegogo uses Paypal AND credit card for contributions, and, in Germany at least, you do not need a credit card for Paypal use, a current bank account is sufficient.
Can I upgrade my contribution at a later stage?
Sure, if you can`t resist the temptation as more and more groovy extra bits get revealed, you can contribute the difference to what you want to have now, put a corresponding note in the comments box. Please note that downgrading your contribution is not possible.
Can I make multiple contributions for the same level?
Absolutely, go right ahead. This could be necessary if you want to have all ten Legends (needing one Captain and four Deckhand perks in total).
Can I get a single miniature of the Pirate set, but with all the bonus options?
No, sorry. In order to be able to offer the sets on Indiegogo at the prices we do, we have to group certain options together. Only the Captain perk and Captain-related ones guarantee you these updates. Deckhand perks for Virgo Despiedad, Papa Houngan and Chassa can possibly benefit from stretch goals.
Can I get Calamite Balfour in any other form than in the Captain perk?
No, sorry. Calamite is the “Indiegogo Captain Perk”-exclusive. She is the only model of this campaign that will ONLY be available at Indiegogo and ONLY for Captain or Captain based perks.
How do I have to contribute for a limited perk?
In order to contribute for a limited perk you MUST claim that perk. It is NOT possible to just make a contribution and tell us, that you want to have a limited perk. We need the counter for the limitation to go up, so that everyone can see how much limited sets are left and thus we won't fullfill any limited perk orders we received via comments only.
Can I add regular orders from the Freebooter shop to my Indiegogo contribution to gain free shipping on that order?
Yes, of course you can. Just tell us in the comments section of the Freebooter Miniatures Online Shop, that you have contributed and want to have the contribution and the regular order shipped all in one. But please note, that we ship the Inidegogo goods in March 2013, so any additional orders from our shop will also be shipped in March 2013 if you link them to the Indiegogo contribution. 
In case you don't want to wait and need some stuff from our store earlier, please have a look at our shipping conditions:
Germany: 2,50 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 60,-+ EURO
Europe: 4,50 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 120,-+ EURO
World: 6,00 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 180,-+ EURO

story:
Now available!

Visit www.book-404.com for details

A mysterious book arrives in the post, full of cryptic images.

Puzzles and challenges fill its pages, hinting toward a shadowy, secret organization: The Republic.

Who are they, and why have they chosen you? 

Solve the Mystery

404 is a new kind of puzzle book. There are no instructions, and it won't always be obvious what to do (although hints are always available). You will need to think creatively to extract answers from the book, which can be validated on the accompanying 404 website. If you are correct, the website will unlock information which you will need to solve challenges later in the book. 

As you progress, you will also receive further communications from the organization who sent you the book, delivered via the website. These will reveal story elements, and may include cryptic hints, including references to information hidden elsewhere.

Only for backers

404 will be printed in a unique crowdfunded edition, which will never again be available - and, as a backer, you will be one of the very first to receive 404. 

How do I play 404? 

404 is a physical book. You will probably want to write in the book, and sometimes cut it up or manipulate it. Solve the puzzles on each page to reveal words or numbers, then enter these on the website at www.book-404.com to verify them. They may be required for later puzzles. If you are wrong, but on the right track, the answer parser built into the website will tell you so - although you can disable this assistance if you wish. The website will also provide access to progressively more specific hints, so the puzzles will be accessible to all abilities of solver.

Who is creating 404? 

I am Dr Gareth Moore, the author of over 100 best-selling international puzzle and brain-training titles. My books have sold over 7 million copies, and have been translated into over 30 different languages. They include number 1 bestsellers such as The Ordnance Survey Puzzle Book (UK only) - which sold over 125,000 copies at Christmas 2018 - and range from complex adult mystery titles through to puzzle books for kids.

As one of the world's best-selling puzzle authors, I am uniquely placed to create a title which will provide a sensible level of challenge throughout. The puzzles will test you, but will always be fair.

Praise for my puzzles

I have been called "Britain's King of Puzzles" by The Sun, and "One of Britain's most trusted brain trainers" by The Sunday Telegraph. Will Shortz described my puzzles as "Fresh and lively". But you don't need to just take their word for it - you can read my Amazon reviews too.

Stretch Goals

Book Specifications

  • Dimensions: 5.5" x 8.5" (14cm x 21.5cm)
  • Puzzles: 56+
  • Pages: 128+
  • Plus additional online content, unlocked as you progress.

Why Crowdfunding? 

This book is not the type of book a traditional publishing house would take on. This book isn't aimed at the mass market - it's aimed at a specific type of person: you. It would cause confusion on the shelves of your local bookshop, and most publishers would not have the resources to create the accompanying interactive website. 

I want to achieve my vision for the book with as much creative control over the final product as possible. This means that I need your help to make the physical product a reality. The project goal will cover the initial print run, and enable me to place a well-produced, exclusive crowd-funded edition of 404 in your hands.

story:
Lingo Games

            For the last two years, I have been working on Lingo when I had time off from my day job.  After an unsuccessful crowdfunding campaign on another website I was pretty down and defeated. I felt that my idea would have to go into my memory warehouse and never be seen again.  Thankfully that didn’t last, through meeting several good people I have been able to grow my team and continue work on Lingo. 


            Currently I am working on three Asian languages and I have ten other languages in the works including Spanish and American Sign Language.  I’m extremely excited and happy to bring this game into development.  There is no limit to what we can offer.  This game is so simple that adults and young children can learn together.

 

What We Need & What You Get

            Currently I have been funding this project on my own but without the help of others I just can’t bring this project to life.  Our current goal is $20,000, these funds will go towards marketing, production of decks and development of additional ones. We have set up perks based off donations. Each donation brings us closer to making this game a reality and we will reward our backers with quality decks of their own in different forms to show our gratitude and for our backers to have a piece of something they helped bring to life.

  • Basic Decks 200 languages cards with a single word and the translation
  • Advanced Decks 200 languages cards with several words or phrases
  • Master Decks 200 languages card with complete sentences for conversations

 

The Impact

            Let’s be honest here, I’m not a professor or a cunning linguist, I’m an honest hardworking person with several dreams and ambitions. I have worked hard to put together resources to make up where I lack.  Successfully reaching our goal will allow me to create something fun and unique to other programs out there.  This project will allow people to easily afford and learn languages they have always dreamed of. 

            Imagine being able to communicate more effectively with that neighbor down the street or co-workers who speak a different language.

           

Risks & Challenges


            The biggest risk we face, like any business, is inadequate funding and failure to market to the right crowd.  Starting a new company is always a huge leap and never comes without its ups and downs. I plan on a lot of sleepless nights and a lot of hard work but with your support and contributions we can over come these challenges. By spreading the word about our campaign and what we are trying to achieve you can help further the success of Lingo and your contribution.

             To reach our goal we ask that you help us spread the word through Facebook @lingogamesllc and on Instagram at LingogamesLLC and through word of mouth. We will provide regular updates through email and social media. We are happy to answer any questions and can be reached at Lingogamesllc@gmail.com.

story:
"Best abstract game I've played this year!"
-UnfilteredGamer

Why we're here

We need $3000 to bring DOCE™ to life. The funds will go directly to start production of the Classic game, and to have the necesssary materials to make the Color splash, Special Edition, Luxury Set and Jumbo set, here in USA.

We, the Smart Iguana Games Team with years and years of craft and woodworking experience, will make these sets ourselves. You can rest assured you will receive the best quality with these hand crafted boxes. All the products you see in this campaign have been made by us and depict a true sample of what you will receive if you contribute to our campaign.

* Only available for Color Splash, Special Edition, and Luxury Set.

DOCE™ is an awesome 2-player competitive and strategic abstract dice game.

BASIC RULES

You take turns placing a die on the playing grid with the goal of making a line of 4 dice that equal 12, but, you have to follow some unique rules that will defy your mind. 

It is a game of simple rules and at the same time very challenging and fun to play, and the complexity and strategies are very deep.

 

"...Really well done. Really solid, really simple"

-Unfilteredgamer

1. You and your opponent choose a color set of dice, one marker and one blocker.

2. Take turns placing a die on any available square on the grid.

3. Make a line of 4 of your own dice that equal 12.

4. You may also win by strategically using one of your opponents’ die that is already in play, but it must be either at the beginning or at the end of your line, meaning 3 of your dice must be connected.

5. Score the round.  

6. Play a total of 4 rounds, alternating 1st player. The person with the most points at the end of the 4th round wins the game.

You can get details on the full rules in the following video or downloading the rulebook pdf. 

The Ghost Of Ancient Times (GOAT for short) takes over so we can present to you our very first (fake) clip show! He takes us back to recordings from a week or two prior as we talk with Christian from Osprey Games (we get the Osprey Treatment), Dan from Smart Iguana Games about his new game: DOCE, and plenty of game reviews recorded back in the yestertimes of January 2018 at SCARAB 2018.

[1:01:00] Interview: Smart Iguana Games – DOCE

https://jonman.podbean.com/e/classic-1543443681/

 

Welcome back to Board With Video Games, covering all the things you play on your table and your television!

This week Josh and Kyle welcome special guest Dan Machado from Smart Iguana Games! The trio discusses some of the board games and video games they have been playing. In addition, Dan gives some updates of Gravity Warfare and also talks about the new game from Smart Iguana Games called Doce.

https://psvg.blog/board-with-video-games/2018/11/29/board-with-video-games-60-doce

All perks - $5

Retailer Perk - $20/case

Jumbo Set - Shipping included. 

*** If you are in another country and want to get this game, contact us for more information. Simply email us at customercare@smartiguanagames.com

 

Risks & Challenges

We are very confident that we can deliver our game successfully and on time. We have prepared for success and are ready to deal with any challenges that come our way in the process of making this game a reality. We will deal with those challenges in the best way we can with your best interest in mind. We will be working closely with our partners to maintain the desired level of quality for the product and assure satisfaction to our backers.

We guarantee that we will treat every backer with the upmost respect. You will receive the best product we can make with the support you have provided us.

We'll will work hard during the campaign so that we can deliver the Color Splash, Special Edition and Luxury set of DOCE™  in time for the New Year for all our backers in those perk levels. These game sets will be made as the contributions come in during the campaign and we'll be posting updates consistently about their progress.

The estimated delivery for the Classic game is April, 2019. We're always happy to refund contributions if for some totally unforeseen reason the game can't be delivered to you at all. We don't believe this is in the least bit likely.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't pledge to our campaign at the moment, there are other ways in which you can support us and help us reach out goal:

Share our campaign on Facebook and other social media using the Indiegogo share buttons to help us get the word our there for our game. Thank You!

Grapchics and resources

story_txt:
"Best abstract game I've played this year!"-UnfilteredGamer
Why we're here


We need $3000 to bring DOCE™ to life. The funds will go directly to start production of the Classic game, and to have the necesssary materials to make the Color splash, Special Edition, Luxury Set and Jumbo set, here in USA.
We, the Smart Iguana Games Team with years and years of craft and woodworking experience, will make these sets ourselves. You can rest assured you will receive the best quality with these hand crafted boxes. All the products you see in this campaign have been made by us and depict a true sample of what you will receive if you contribute to our campaign.


* Only available for Color Splash, Special Edition, and Luxury Set.

DOCE™ is an awesome 2-player competitive and strategic abstract dice game.
BASIC RULES
You take turns placing a die on the playing grid with the goal of making a line of 4 dice that equal 12, but, you have to follow some unique rules that will defy your mind. 
It is a game of simple rules and at the same time very challenging and fun to play, and the complexity and strategies are very deep.



 
"...Really well done. Really solid, really simple"
-Unfilteredgamer

1. You and your opponent choose a color set of dice, one marker and one blocker.

2. Take turns placing a die on any available square on the grid.

3. Make a line of 4 of your own dice that equal 12.

4. You may also win by strategically using one of your opponents’ die that is already in play, but it must be either at the beginning or at the end of your line, meaning 3 of your dice must be connected.

5. Score the round.  
6. Play a total of 4 rounds, alternating 1st player. The person with the most points at the end of the 4th round wins the game.
You can get details on the full rules in the following video or downloading the rulebook pdf. 
















The Ghost Of Ancient Times (GOAT for short) takes over so we can present to you our very first (fake) clip show! He takes us back to recordings from a week or two prior as we talk with Christian from Osprey Games (we get the Osprey Treatment), Dan from Smart Iguana Games about his new game: DOCE, and plenty of game reviews recorded back in the yestertimes of January 2018 at SCARAB 2018.
[1:01:00] Interview: Smart Iguana Games – DOCE
https://jonman.podbean.com/e/classic-1543443681/
 

Welcome back to Board With Video Games, covering all the things you play on your table and your television!
This week Josh and Kyle welcome special guest Dan Machado from Smart Iguana Games! The trio discusses some of the board games and video games they have been playing. In addition, Dan gives some updates of Gravity Warfare and also talks about the new game from Smart Iguana Games called Doce.
https://psvg.blog/board-with-video-games/2018/11/29/board-with-video-games-60-doce


All perks - $5
Retailer Perk - $20/case
Jumbo Set - Shipping included. 
*** If you are in another country and want to get this game, contact us for more information. Simply email us at customercare@smartiguanagames.com

We are very confident that we can deliver our game successfully and on time. We have prepared for success and are ready to deal with any challenges that come our way in the process of making this game a reality. We will deal with those challenges in the best way we can with your best interest in mind. We will be working closely with our partners to maintain the desired level of quality for the product and assure satisfaction to our backers.
We guarantee that we will treat every backer with the upmost respect. You will receive the best product we can make with the support you have provided us.
We'll will work hard during the campaign so that we can deliver the Color Splash, Special Edition and Luxury set of DOCE™  in time for the New Year for all our backers in those perk levels. story:
The dreamer is the centre of all dream experiences. When we are dreaming, we are often avatars of our woken selves. We manifest, occasionally, as specific personas and alter egos but we are almost never aware of those manifestations when we are dreaming. We may look different, we may be of the opposite gender, we can be younger or older or we can be someone else. To the dreamer, the dream is reality. Lepidopterological musings aside, we have to agree with the Taoist allegory that it is sometimes hard to tell what is dream and what is reality.

We are printing 2 editions:

The Dreamers deck is another exciting collaboration with Copete Cohete, Designers of Explorers Revelation & Domination Playing Cards.

Combining an intriguing concept with their signature whimsical graphical styles. A tribute to Kon Satoshi, the stylistic themes are heavily influenced by Japanese anime, especially that of Paprika and are characterized by striking and vivid mash-ups of colours and highly imaginative representations. The Dreamers is another thrilling attempt to push the boundaries of playing card design. 

Court cards: The avatars of the kings, queens and jacks of the Dreamers deck. Each avatar is depicted in multifaceted manner showing how different personas can be reflected in dreams.

 

Tuck case & card backs: Intricate and whimsical details exhibiting the nature of the dreamers in dreams

Risks and challenges

We anticipate minimal risks in terms of design (they are done!), production (we have settled the major details!) and fulfilment (this is always a challenge for KS projects) for this project. Of course, getting sufficient support to make this project a reality is always the most important factor.

As mentioned above, the main challenge is to get the decks and rewards that you pledged to you in the fastest possible time. We have gotten better at smoothing the production and fulfilment processes with our partners and striking a good balance between ensuring that the decks and rewards are of the best quality, which usually took up a fair bit of our time in refining the design and assuring quality, and timely production and fulfilment. Having said that, we always strive to do better for every project.

We will be fulfilling directly from us in Hong Kong depending on your location. The decks will be packed safely and shipped with tracking number. We look forward to you receiving your rewards as soon as possible.

story:
Why this Campaign

The Pyxi Oracle took 2 years to create, but several more to be able to design each card and find a printer. And even then I don't have the funds to print 100 decks and call it a day. Using my existing funds I would be lucky to print 25, and who knows if I would ever be able to reprint...  I want this oracle to reach more people, so that others can benefit from this labor of love! This is an amazing opportunity to be able to gauge interest and be able to see this project finally reach fruition! This Campaign has a small goal with big dreams!  The Goal is $500, which is under 34 deck orders! Each dollar goes towards the production of the cards and the altar/reading cloths, as well as the cost of materials and the time it takes to hand-burn each tile and dice set. I also hand-make each Rosary. I am blessed to run my shop full time, but I must admit that it's not always easy, so any profit from this campaign will be split between my bills and going back into the shop, I have a list a mile long of projects waiting for the funds to be created.

About The Perks

The Pyxidanthera Oracle (Pyxi Oracle for short) was created over the course of 2 years- mostly I have no memory of the actual creation of the oracle; I sat down with the concept and the rest came like a whisper on the wind. It is my baby, based in my love of The Elder Futhark and created in a similar style; where a single symbol tells a story.

*The Deck: This "Learning" Oracle is poker sized and breaks down each symbol into its most basic parts using key words to help you easily be able to pick up and utilize this unique oracle. In addition to the 24 cards are the white Instruction Cards, these tell the story of Pyxidanthera (a young humanoid from Venus) finding the oracle, gives two example spreads as well as a more in depth meaning to each symbol. Each deck will come shrink wrapped and with a black velvet pouch for safekeeping. 

*Pyxi Tiles; symbols hand- burned onto 1" wooden disks which can be pulled from a pouch and read more similarly to the Elder Futhark Runes. Each set will come with a PDF instruction booklet which will tell the story of Pyxidanthera finding the oracle, a few example spreads as well as a more in depth meaning to each symbol. 

*Pyxi Dice, the oracle is split up into four 6-sided .6" dice, which are hand-burned and available either natural or dyed purple. They can be thrown and read according to where they land on your throwing surface as well as their relationship to eachother. (The "Altar/Reading Cloth" is the perfect throwing surface for these)

*Altar/Reading Cloth as a reading cloth for the cards, tiles or dice or can be used as an altar cloth or other decorative cloth. It is 14 inches x 14 inches, and is made of super soft spun polyester. 

*True to the heart of my shop is a Limited Edition Alternative Rosary! The Pyxidanthera is a 5 petaled flower and as such this rosary has flower divider beads and Y connector. You can use it as a meditation tool to work with and learn this oracle, as a standard rosary (mala or affirmation beads) or simply wear it as a stunning piece of jewelry! The pendant is a symbol designed by my partner and I as a universal symbol of balance, unity and enlightenment.  

About HadaPixie Designs

I'm Pixie of HadaPixie Designs. My shop started with a single Alternative Rosary design in 2015 and has blossomed into a multifaceted online metaphysical shop!  My shop is not only my livelihood, it is an extension of The Craft and it is my life's blood. I found my Path when I was 12 and in a way my shop really began there. Being a child I didn't have the money to go buy things, so I made do with what I had and what I could create. I utilized the internet to learn everything I could about The Craft and turned around to make the tools I desired to manifest. Everything I sell is something that I use in my personal practice, It wouldn't be right to do otherwise, however that also creates some challenges as there are only so many hours in a day, and it takes months and sometimes years to learn something new to share.

Please Spread the Word!

If you want to see this deck come to life, please let other people know! Sharing can have a huge impact. Indigogo has built in share functions at the top to make this easy!
You can also save my website: http://hadapixie.com
My Etsy: https://www.etsy.com/shop/hadapixiedesigns
and my Storenvy: http://hadapixie.storenvy.com
