story:
Starting out on the AT & the 14 State Challenge

Your support will help me get a Forms Lab II 3D printer to bring the  AT My Way game to you, friends and family. 

Be one of the 1st to receive a copy or copies and enjoy the fun Appalachian Trail game.
 

By raising at least $3500 I will be up and printing AT My Way and sending copies to all campaign supporters.

1 to many players and teams can play and you can make up your own rules from simple to complex. Great at home, parties, schools and many other places.

 

It will be challenge to achieve my goal but so was the 14 State Challenge of the Appalachian and I was able to complete that. Even if you cannot contribute at this time please share with your friends and that will be a big help. Using the Indiegogo share tools will make it easy!
Thank you so much for your support!
Tom Hughes

story:
Welcome!

 

Allow us to introduce ourselves, we are Fanath’s Team. Our time is dedicated to sculpt, paint and sell fantasy figures for differents board and strategy games, also markers and other staff that you can imagine. Improving step by step in quality and design.


 

Take a look of our work in fanath.com and news in our facebook 

 

In this project we do the best team so far, a full team of 16 players and additional figures.

 

To avoid delays making and sending your team, we work with a local caster who have a big experience doing figures. Because of that we reduce the logistic problems about shipments and you will receive your team in time.

Orders will start to be shipping between 45 and 60 days at the end of the campaign.

 

Here you have some more detailed images of the team:

The warriors are made with small details of the four gods, so they can be painted generically or each of one with the respective color of the god. Although they have generic details to not lose coherence as a team: as a chest, helmet and shoulder pads personalized

 

Warriors with the optional pieces

 

 

Remember to share the campaign with your friends

¡¡ At more people interested more EXTRAS will be unlocked !!

 

You could add any other figures from our catalog on  fanath.com . With your order you will receive a 15% discount coupon to use in our web to complete your order with no additional shipment cost.



These are the packs available, single figures, or complete teams with gifts.

 

Every pack "Full Chaos Team" are the same figures, but if you're quick you can get a better price.

All figures are produced in high quality metal and will come with a round base of 32mm

 

Shiping cost

 

Shipment cost that includes one or more team is for free.

 

If you only want single figures the shipping costs is:

5€ - Spain

10€ - Rest of world

 

Depending the funds raised, new figures and markers to complete the team will be unlocked for free or at very low price. These gifts are only available to those who purchase a "Full Chaos Team"

story:
The game will be printed with a professional quality 3d printer such as the like the Ultimaker 3 or Prusa i3 and will be lasercut on a 60w laser cutter. These designs will be designed purely for this campaign and are not available anywhere else. 

A prototype of the design 3D printed board and game. The final design will be higher resolution and have more detail. Additionally the game will be is designed to be easy to paint.

Our standard lasercut board.

Stretch Goals

£2, 000 - The 3d printed game will be in a single piece and not 2 pieces connected with a slot & rod. 

£3,000 - Stone dice. 

£5,000 - 20% thicker board. 

£7,500 - Lasercut wooden box. 

£10,000 - Stone counters (no engraved dots)

£15,000 - Stone counters with engraved dots on one side.

Stone counters £10,000 stretch goal.

Please note this project is not created by or endorsed by the British Museum.

story:
GHOST HUNTERS WANTED

 

* Explore hallways, unravel rooms, and use secret passages.

* Communicate with paranormal creatures and set their souls free.

* Work together with other investigators... OR NOT!

* One of you will be possessed and will try and stop the others from leaving...

A GAME OF STRATEGY THAT WILL MAKE SURE HALLOWEEN NEVER ENDS IN YOUR HOME!

Shockfest Horror Factory is proud to present a tabletop game version of their interactive escape room, Hotel Paranormal.  But be careful! you may get trapped forever in the house where Halloween Never Ends.

 

What We Need & What You Get

$5,000.  That is what we need to complete this game for all to play.  We want to keep perks simple.  We do not want to promise a bunch of crazy bells and whistles when we can spend our time and your investment on making a solid game that you will not want to put down.  But, we want to offer some perks you won't get anywhere else, so we are offering copies of the game, expansion packs, and exclusive opportunities, like transforming you into a character in the game or having you join us for our live event in Los Angeles.  

The funding for this game will predominantly go toward the physical construction of the game pieces and distribution of the game.  Additional funding will go toward payment for the artist, Michael Bayouth, who has hand drawn every game image to be its own unique work of art. 

 

The Team

  • Guil Claveria (Game Creator) is the creator of the game Halloween Never Ends as well as the festival director of the 12-year running Shockfest Film Festival.  He is a nationally award-winning multi-media producer and devoted college teacher. As an independent writer/producer/director/actor, Claveria has accumulated over two dozen awards for his thought provoking short films. He is a military veteran, martial artist, and an avid motorcycle enthusiast. On his spare time, he writes and composes musical theater.

 

  • Michael Bayouth (Illustrator) is a Director, Producer, Graphic Designer and Storyboard Artist whose work includes productions and movie covers such as 101 Dalmatians, The Aristocats, The Rescuers, The Return of Jafar, The Land Before Time, Gargoyles and countless other iconic films and TV shows.   For die-hard horror fans out there, Michael is actually horror royalty, the infamous "The Son of Jason" (Ted White - as in Jason Voorhees from Friday the 13th The Final Chapter. No kidding. Read all about it in his book on Amazon). And the corpse doesn’t fall far from the coffin. Michael is a horror film director and has earned his bread and butter as a storyboard artist on  shows like Salem, The Orville, and Clive Barker’s Books of Blood directed By Brannon Braga (on Hulu, October 2020).

 

  • Matthew Rosvally (Project Manager) is the driving force of Halloween Never Ends.  He is a national Telly Award winner for directing the paranormal travel series, Haunted Routes, which maps out paranormal road trips from across the United States.  For the past decade, Matt has made appearances in movies, tv, theater and haunted attractions across the country, in addition to managing the various live productions of Shockfest Film Festival in Hollywood, Las Vegas, Salem and New York City.

 

  • Alesha Claveria (Copywriter) is a doctoral fellow in Contemporary Native North American drama at the University of California-Santa Barbara. Lucky for us, she also has an M.F.A. in Creative Writing-Fiction. She has presented her serious work at tons of posh gatherings, like the International Society for the Study of Religion, Nature and Culture, the Assocation for Theater in Higher Educaiton, the American Literary Association, the American Academy of Religion, and on a plenary at the American Society for Theater Research. She has serious, academic publications in The Eugene O'Neill Review and forthcoming from the University of New Mexico Press. Astonishingly, she still super humble and agreed to work with us commoners on this wild and spooky project.

 

The Impact

Strategy. Fun. HALLOWEEN!  This game is designed to relive the best holiday of the year anytime, which is something we do with our 12-year-running SHOCKFEST FILM FESTIVAL.

Our team has created live interactive events, red carpets, film festivals and gaming experiences for 12 years throughout the country including in Hollywood, New York City and Salem Massachusetts.  This past November, we opened Hotel Paranormal in Las Vegas where, for three days straight, each floor of an actual haunted hotel was the location of a unique escape room.  Throughout the weekend, guests collected trading cards from mysterious sources, vendors, celebrity guests and mysterious rooms.  Whoever collected every single card first was the winner of the GRAND CASH PRIZE of $666.  

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our very first mass produced game to be distributed to the masses.  We have a lot of experience with media, live game development and entertainment and our entire team is excited to be taking part in this first time experience building something of this magnitude.

  • We have experience sticking landings.  Even during the Quarantine of 2020, our company, Shockfest Horror Factory, has doubled down to provide our audience with top notch entertainment at some of the greatest venues, including Times Square and Salem, Massachusetts.
  • We have our development blueprint, we have our production team, and the game is complete. We now need the funding to physically build it!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Following our social media, joining our mailing list, and sharing this campaign is incredibly appreciated:

  • Liking and following our social media (Instagram = @shockfesthorrorfactory Facebook = www.facebook.com/shockfesthorrorfactory)  is a major help.
  • Sharing this campaign on your social media and hash tagging #shockfest and #shockfestff is also a big to do, which we greatly appreciate.  
  • Sign up for our mailing list at www.shockfilmfest.com for more updates and announcements about Shockfest events and products, including our 12th year anniversary taking place in November on Friday the 13th, 2020.

* Work together with other investigators... OR NOT!
* One of you will be possessed and will try and stop the others from leaving...
A GAME OF STRATEGY THAT WILL MAKE SURE HALLOWEEN NEVER ENDS IN YOUR HOME!
Shockfest Horror Factory is proud to present a tabletop game version of their interactive escape room, Hotel Paranormal.  But be careful! you may get trapped forever in the house where Halloween Never Ends.
 

What We Need & What You Get
$5,000.  That is what we need to complete this game for all to play.  We want to keep perks simple.  We do not want to promise a bunch of crazy bells and whistles when we can spend our time and your investment on making a solid game that you will not want to put down.  But, we want to offer some perks you won't get anywhere else, so we are offering copies of the game, expansion packs, and exclusive opportunities, like transforming you into a character in the game or having you join us for our live event in Los Angeles.  
The funding for this game will predominantly go toward the physical construction of the game pieces and distribution of the game.  Additional funding will go toward payment for the artist, Michael Bayouth, who has hand drawn every game image to be its own unique work of art.  The Team

Guil Claveria (Game Creator) is the creator of the game Halloween Never Ends as well as the festival director of the 12-year running Shockfest Film Festival.  He is a nationally award-winning multi-media producer and devoted college teacher. As an independent writer/producer/director/actor, Claveria has accumulated over two dozen awards for his thought provoking short films. He is a military veteran, martial artist, and an avid motorcycle enthusiast. On his spare time, he writes and composes musical theater.
 

Michael Bayouth (Illustrator) is a Director, Producer, Graphic Designer and Storyboard Artist whose work includes productions and movie covers such as 101 Dalmatians, The Aristocats, The Rescuers, The Return of Jafar, The Land Before Time, Gargoyles and countless other iconic films and TV shows.   For die-hard horror fans out there, Michael is actually horror royalty, the infamous "The Son of Jason" (Ted White - as in Jason Voorhees from Friday the 13th The Final Chapter. No kidding. Read all about it in his book on Amazon). And the corpse doesn’t fall far from the coffin. Michael is a horror film director and has earned his bread and butter as a storyboard artist on  shows like Salem, The Orville, and Clive Barker’s Books of Blood directed By Brannon Braga (on Hulu, October 2020).
 

Matthew Rosvally (Project Manager) is the driving force of Halloween Never Ends.  He is a national Telly Award winner for directing the paranormal travel series, Haunted Routes, which maps out paranormal road trips from across the United States.  For the past decade, Matt has made appearances in movies, tv, theater and haunted attractions across the country, in addition to managing the various live productions of Shockfest Film Festival in Hollywood, Las Vegas, Salem and New York City.
 

Alesha Claveria (Copywriter) is a doctoral fellow in Contemporary Native North American drama at the University of California-Santa Barbara. Lucky for us, she also has an M.F.A. in Creative Writing-Fiction. She has presented her serious work at tons of posh gatherings, like the International Society for the Study of Religion, Nature and Culture, the Assocation for Theater in Higher Educaiton, the American Literary Association, the American Academy of Religion, and on a plenary at the American Society for Theater Research. She has serious, academic publications in The Eugene O'Neill Review and forthcoming from the University of New Mexico Press. Astonishingly, she still super humble and agreed to work with us commoners on this wild and spooky project.

 
The Impact
Strategy. Fun. HALLOWEEN!  This game is designed to relive the best holiday of the year anytime, which is something we do with our 12-year-running SHOCKFEST FILM FESTIVAL.
Our team has created live interactive events, red carpets, film festivals and gaming experiences for 12 years throughout the country including in Hollywood, New York City and Salem Massachusetts.  This past November, we opened Hotel Paranormal in Las Vegas where, for three days straight, each floor of an actual haunted hotel was the location of a unique escape room.  Throughout the weekend, guests collected trading cards from mysterious sources, vendors, celebrity guests and mysterious rooms.  Whoever collected every single card first was the winner of the GRAND CASH PRIZE of $666.  
 

Risks & Challenges
This is our very first mass produced game to be distributed to the masses.  We have a lot of experience with media, live game development and entertainment and our entire team is excited to be taking part in this first time experience building something of this magnitude.

We have experience sticking landings.  Even during the Quarantine of 2020, our company, Shockfest Horror Factory, has doubled down to provide our audience with top notch entertainment at some of the greatest venues, including Times Square and Salem, Massachusetts.
We have our development blueprint, we have our production team, and the game is complete. We now need the funding to physically build it!


 
Other Ways You Can Help
Following our social media, joining our mailing list, and sharing this campaign is incredibly appreciated:

Liking and following our social media (Instagram = @shockfesthorrorfactory Facebook = www.facebook.com/shockfesthorrorfactory)  is a major help.
Sharing this campaign on your social media and hash tagging #shockfest and #shockfestff is also a big to do, which we greatly appreciate.  
Sign up for our mailing list at www.shockfilmfest.com for more updates and announcements about Shockfest events and products, including our 12th year anniversary taking place in November on Friday the 13th, 2020.

story:
The Folio: Black Label series are fantasy adventure modules that are compatible with BOTH classic Advanced Dungeons & Dragons and 5th Edition D&D formats.  Each adventure combines what I enjoyed most from the heady days of of the late 1970s and the 1980s swords & sorcery storytelling. 

The Folio: Black Label #3 continues in the same locations as Black Label's #1 & #2, and is going to have even more adult edge than is found in the standard Folio, and yes, there might be some nudity, and maybe some horror, and maybe a twisted quality here or there, but at the base its really just about the unfettered fun of hacking and slashing your way through a pulp style adventure with blatant evil doers, magical treasures, and exposed flesh.  

So, I'm throwing out the playbook for 2019, and turning the flux capacitor back to the early days of gaming.  I hope some of you will join me. 

Who is this adventure for?: It will be based around  classic AD&D gaming mechanics, while also have 'grey' stat and  treasure blocks for 5th Edition D&D,  so it is easily playable in  BOTH formats.  It has been designed for  6-8 characters, roughly 3rd  through 5th, and will include a Virtual  Table Top map without secret doors, traps, and numbers.  

What does the adventure for White Witch and Black Stone revolve around? Well, this will be a standard swords & sorcery based adventure that deals with a lost fortress and tower located in the dark central plateau reaches of the map.  The adventurers will be forced to find the hidden location, defeat the minions of the White Witch, and find the secret cache of magical elixirs that will help them gain the favor of a dying lord.

What are all the other Folio products? The bulk of the Folio adventure series has  been in physical form and can be found at artofthegenre.com.   For the  purposes of some of the upper pledge levels, these previously  produced  adventures are offered.  Thus far, there  have been  23 Folio standard removable cover adventures, and 6 hardcover Folio books  (3 compile and reprint the Folio campaigns, and 2 are gaming supplements). 

 

What are the 'Orange Spine' books?: These 'Complete' volumes include not only all the information from 6 Folio adventure modules, but also 6 or more 'mini-adventure' supplements  added for extra content, iconic character cards that are playable, and a  gazetteer supplement that defines the world the adventure takes place  in.  Also included is the Storyteller's Arcana, a 128 page DM & Player guide of my own tips and experiences in 30 years of gaming, and the Folio of Fiendish Monsters with 115 new monsters.  ALL these books are in in both AD&D and 5th Edition D&D formats. 

*TRADEMARK DISCLAIMER

"D&D" and "AD&D" are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, LLC. Art of the Genre is not affiliated with Wizards of the Coast LLC. We make no claim to, or challenge to, such trademarks.

story:
Inequality-opoly is a custom property trading game that demonstrates how structural racism and sexism in America serve as impediments to accumulating wealth. In this game like in the real world, certain players based on their perceived identity enjoy privileges while others face obstacles to building wealth. 

             I am raising funds to manufacture and distribute as many games as possible games throughout the country to spread awareness and advance discourse about the effects of structural racism and sexism in America, specifically how it impacts the accumulation of wealth.

             This project became a passion of mine after I recognized the need to make diversity and inclusion training more engaging and impactful. I figured it would be interesting and educational to make a property trading game that modeled the real-life effects of Sexism and Racism have on accumulating wealth. 

             This game does not claim to encompass or simulate the enormous complexity of Racism and Sexism in America. The game aims to focus on how Sexism and Racism effect the accumulation of wealth. The data in the game is based on recent national studies which can be found in the Inequality-opoly Index at www.inequalityopoly.com. This game will evolve and change as inequality in America fluctuates, so all $20+ backers will receive unlimited access to the updated iterations of Inequality-opoly components.

Thank you so much for your time and support!

story:
Nuova pagina 1Nuova pagina 1Nuova pagina 1Nuova pagina 1Nuova pagina 1



Also the first freebie for you. Every Fanatic and Supporter will get this free limited ball added to their package.


About us

MK1881 Miniatures is the new miniature line from Maki Games, featuring high quality miniatures mainly suitable for fantasy football games and more. We offer innovative design and very high quality casts. MK1881 team is composed of many experienced artists all with several years of experience in their fields that range from design, to classic and 3D sculpting and painting.  We work only with high quality casting facilities and use only top quality materials for our creations. All miniatures are made with lead free metal.

MK1881 temporary page can be found here:
http://www.mk1881.com
MK1881 work progress can be followed on our FB page:
https://www.facebook.com/mk1881

You can also follow us on out Tanatos campaign for the first team:
http://igg.me/at/mk1881-tanatos2/x/5526550


Why crowd funding?

At MK1881 we have done extensive research and tests to deliver only very high quality miniatures. Designing, sculpting and printing these miniatures is quite expensive. We are looking for your contribution to speed up the printing and casting process and cover some of the costs for the design and production of special characters for this fantasy football team.


ADDITIONAL SPECIAL CHARACTERS AVAILABLE:

Additional models unlocked in the Tanatos Campaign are also available with the Honos. If you pledged in the campaign each additional Special will be: 6€ or also available alone for 9€ for non contributors.

Hubris has received a make-up. See the updates for a almost final look of him.

Eldrid is available 

Horken is available 

Irtaka is available


Our models:


After several collaborations and tests we selected a selected group of professional 3D sculpting artists and 3D printing companies. Merging the experience in traditional sculpting techniques of our team with the new technologies of 3D sculpting and rapid prototyping we are able to produce top quality miniatures. Some examples can be seen in the video below. The examples below are from the Tanatos team running on our other campaign. Honos will match their quality.


We already have all the 3D models necessary to print and put in production the team.

A lot of time was spent to make sure models had less separated parts as possible, and where this was not possible we are making sure that the junctions are done at art to ease assembly and increase the strength of them. As a player I hate when my nicely painted models looses his arm during a game, and as a modeler I hate to spend hours trying to figure out where a specific piece goes or attaches. These examples are from the Tanatos team running on our other Indiegogo, but the Tanatos will be the same detail and quality.


The basic perks:

12 model team, enough to play the majority of Fantasy Football games on the market. Now you can select the combination of models you desire. Once the Indiegogo is over we will ask you what combination of models you will like to get. You can also get multiples.

16 model team, for the enthusiast gamer and collector who wants them all. Now you can select the combination of models you desire.
Once the Indiegogo is over we will ask you what combination of models you will like to get. You can also get multiples.

Stretch goals:


Longstrike will be next. We don't have a model yet, but you will be assured it will match or exceed the other Specials


The models in detail:

Blitzer 1

Blitzer 2

Lineman 1

Lineman 2 (this particular model will be supplied with a metal flying stand)

Lineman 3

Lineman 4

Lineman 5

Lineman 6

Lineman 7

Lineman 8

Catcher 1

Catcher 2

Catcher 3

Catcher 4

Thrower 1

Thrower 2

New available models for you to choose from:



Size Comparison:

During the creation of the Tanatos team, and W.I.P pics several have questioned the size of the models. Below courtesy by RN estudio there is a picture of the actual models next to some existing well known models for comparison purposes. It was an overall opinion that the selected size is the best to match any current range.

Risk and Challenges:

Not many, all the 3D models are done and visible, the printing facility was chosen and selected for his highest printing standard, test models where done to make sure the materials and size are adequate to obtain the highest standard product. We have already ordered and paid for the metal for this production. Many can testify that any models we have worked in the past have always been top quality casts, and we have produced hundreds of models for other companies in the past. At this stage the only challenge is to ship all the items according to the planned schedule and to unlock enough stretch goals to create the special characters for this team.

Box Art Team:

 RN Estudio will be painting the box art of this team and the painted team will be for sale. If interested please contact me or Rafa at RN for more details. During the campaign we will show more painted models.

Special Limited Field:

FF Fields will be making a special field for the Tanatos only available during the Indiegogo. After the campaign these fields will not be available anymore. This Indiegogo is your chance to get something unique for your team.

Price:

The prices set in the campaign have a significant discount and shipping included. These prices will be no longer available from us in the future. Our policy is to keep prices stable and avoid crazy holidays or event discount in order to protect our present and future distributors / store sales. So this is your chance to save some cash on our products: don't miss it. 


 Additional notes:

- All the models will be made using very high quality lead free metal that matches or exceeds the standards required by law in all the states that these miniatures will be sent. 
- Models will be provided un-assembled and unpainted.
- Models are not intended for kids 14yrs old or younger due to small parts, 
- Each model will come with a matching 25mm round plastic base.

story:
In Vino Gigantus

An introductory adventure by award winning author and designer James M. Spahn for Fifth Edition, Swords & Wizardry and the Pathfinder Role-Playing Game System.

This is your chance own the premium* softcover of In Vino Gigantus the newest adventure from Frog God Games! Available for Fifth Edition, Swords & Wizardry and the Pathfinder Role-Playing Game System, this will be the first, and likely only, printing of In Vino Gigantus. This softcover is as nice as can possibly make it using a specialty print shop that is proven to deliver a variety of specialty glossy booklets for major luxury name-brand clients (and, well less well-known luxury brands like Frog God Games. In Vino Gigantus will be delivered to you on the best high-gloss paper showing off the most exciting and vivid color art afforded us- by the supporters of this Project.

*expected to be between 20-24 pages with high-gloss 100 lb interior paper with card stock cover. All Softcover options include the matching PDF file and other unlocked digital extras (Player Map, New Creature Tokens, etc) which may not be in the softcover or available to PDF customers  in the future.

The Location

Stormridge Sanctum was once home to the the an ancient and noble line of storm giants. It floated miles beyond the sight of mortal men, witnessing the birth and death of countless civilizations. But as time wore on and decadence laid hold to the Tempestas clan, both Stormridge Sanctum and its magnificent liege lords surrendered to the decay of time and decadence.

The Premise

Now a single storm giant noble remains, the haughty dilettante sorcerer-prince Clovis Tempestas II. He concerns himself only with base pleasures and none more so than his beloved stock of family wine. But his beloved wine cellar has become flooded with a foul murk and strange creatures slither between bottles of his finest family vintage. He cannot be bothered to wade into such filth himself and he has no servants remaining in his household, so he has used what little magic his grape-addled mind can recall and summoned new servants: A troupe of unsuspecting adventures who will serve -- and if necessary, die -- to save his beloved wine.

This introductory adventure can be instantly inserted into any campaign without preamble, as it opens with the player characters being the unwitting targets of a Summon Monster spell! Once summoned into the very hands of a mad and drunken giant, the player characters will find themselves exploring a realm designed for creatures ten times their size as they fight all manner of strange creature, traverse larger than life obstacles and objects, encounter other adventurers who have fallen into the clutches of the mad prince Tempestas, and even risk plummeting to their death as the very foundation of the cloud castle of Stormridge Sanctum is crumbling beneath their boots!

Can the player characters placate the whims of a giant drunk on power and lost grace? Will they survive encounters with the strange animated objects that have become twisted by decades of neglected magic beneath a crumbling castle? And just what the hell is that echoing boom coming from the eastern part of the wine cellar?!

You’ve been granted the hospitality of the storm giant prince Clovis Tempestas II, and he’s always up for a little​ more...

ABOVE: Fifth Edition Cover Mock-Up

What to Expect

In Vino Gigantus by James M. Spahn- available in either Fifth Edition, Pathfinder or Swords & Wizardry versions, is an adventure for introductory-level characters.

Within it's covers (or the digital PDF file) you will find-

  • New creatures and new magic items.
  • NPC adventurers to serve as allies or antagonists.
  • An adventure told on a massive scale, where dinnerware is the size of a full-grown man, chairs must be scaled like flagpoles, and great animated objects as large as a man can spring to life.
  • Options for and potential expansion is provided, but the design lends itself to modifications, allowing the adventure to be included at any moment in any campaign.
  • Full-Color Map by Robert Altbauer

In Vino Gigantus uses the same formula introduced with our last Indiegogo, we refer to this method including the focused enhancements (stretch goals) that improve the product as total project funding increases with art, extra content written content and digital play enhancing extras (player handouts etc)...

The Tiny Print Run

Why Indiegogo?

Frog God Games is testing a new approach with the launch of this project- almost the inverse of how we design our crowdfunding projects on Kickstarter. We call it the 'Tiny Print Run'.

Thus, Indiegogo projects by Frog God Games will-

  • Be short in duration
  • Be limited to a single title
  • Have options priced between $5-$30
  • Design all stretch goals and project bonus' affect the principle reward only (usually both the PDF and the softcover).
  • Be the only guaranteed method to get the premium print copy (NOTE: the softcover versions  in this printing will not be sold on our website: see FAQ for explanation).
  • Have simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit

Why the Tiny Print Run?

Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.

This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.

Is Frog God Games giving up on Kickstarter?

No. Far from it, in fact these smaller projects are happening in response to the feedback we have heard from both fans and 'almost' fans alike. We hear the request for less expensive options for our projects and products all the time. A second frequent desire expressed to us, whether at conventions, on social media or in email, is for a larger selection of smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions and not necessitate a full two year campaign.

Additionally, Frog God Games has grown in both sales and brand awareness.  This opportunity will give us the additional resources to invest in the very best books in all of our formats. This will be the second project we have launched on Indiegogo for the purpose. The first, the City the Dripped Blood is at the printer now for supporters and is expected to arrive more than 2 months earlier than planned. 

Project Reward 

With the wishes of the fans in mind, this and future Indiegogo projects will fund standalone projects that are both affordable and fun. This project, as well future Tiny Print Run projects, is narrowly focused with all stretch goals adding resources to the principle reward which traditionally would not be feasible for a publisher our size. 

Examples of Enhancements from Higher Funding

During the 15 day primary project period for In Vino Gigantus  and after the $1500 goal is met the focus will be to improve the delivered product. The are not special tiered collectors editions or add-on purchase extras. Thus as total project funding increases the better the final product will be for everybody.

Examples of the planned extras that increased funding would bring to In Vino Gigantus-

  • Additional commissions for interior color art specific to the adventure
  • Extra written content commissioned from the author
  • Printed Player Maps
  • Downloadable Options designed for popular virtual table-top software (New creature/NPC tokens etc). 
  • Digital extras (player handouts etc) that are focused on quality table-top play

ABOVE: Example of Digital Token Extra for previous Tiny Print Run project 'The City that Dripped Blood'

 

Project Delivery

PDF Perks

We will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the Frog God Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.

The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the Frog God Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.

Softcover Perks

Softcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo. 

NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive we understand this and are not able to ship the In Vino Gigantus for less than US$25 to Canada or US$35 worldwide. To explain what we mean, please see the shipping calculator for UPS by clicking .

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

About the Author

This introductory-level adventure was written by ENnie and Origin Award winning author James M. Spahn, whose credits include the White Box Omnibus, the Three Castles Award nominated The Hero’s Journey Fantasy Role-playing , White Star: White Box Science Fiction Role-playing, and several products in the Star Wars and The One Ring role-playing game product lines. He has been a passionate freelance writer and independent creator within the role-playing game community for over a decade and brings over thirty years of gaming experience to this product. He served as a contributing author on several Frog God Games products, including Bard’s Gate, The Riot Act: A Bard’s Gate Adventure, and Predator’s Oath: A Northlands Saga Adventure. James’s diverse portfolio and passion for gaming in all its form means In Vino Gigantus is sure be a fast-funding hit.
story_txt:
In Vino GigantusAn introductory adventure by award winning author and designer James M. Spahn for Fifth Edition, Swords & Wizardry and the Pathfinder Role-Playing Game System.This is your chance own the premium* softcover of In Vino Gigantus the newest adventure from Frog God Games! Available for Fifth Edition, Swords & Wizardry and the Pathfinder Role-Playing Game System, this will be the first, and likely only, printing of In Vino Gigantus. This softcover is as nice as can possibly make it using a specialty print shop that is proven to deliver a variety of specialty glossy booklets for major luxury name-brand clients (and, well less well-known luxury brands like Frog God Games. In Vino Gigantus will be delivered to you on the best high-gloss paper showing off the most exciting and vivid color art afforded us- by the supporters of this Project.*expected to be between 20-24 pages with high-gloss 100 lb interior paper with card stock cover. All Softcover options include the matching PDF file and other unlocked digital extras (Player Map, New Creature Tokens, etc) which may not be in the softcover or available to PDF customers  in the future.The LocationStormridge Sanctum was once home to the the an ancient and noble line of storm giants. It floated miles beyond the sight of mortal men, witnessing the birth and death of countless civilizations. But as time wore on and decadence laid hold to the Tempestas clan, both Stormridge Sanctum and its magnificent liege lords surrendered to the decay of time and decadence.The PremiseNow a single storm giant noble remains, the haughty dilettante sorcerer-prince Clovis Tempestas II. He concerns himself only with base pleasures and none more so than his beloved stock of family wine. But his beloved wine cellar has become flooded with a foul murk and strange creatures slither between bottles of his finest family vintage. He cannot be bothered to wade into such filth himself and he has no servants remaining in his household, so he has used what little magic his grape-addled mind can recall and summoned new servants: A troupe of unsuspecting adventures who will serve -- and if necessary, die -- to save his beloved wine.This introductory adventure can be instantly inserted into any campaign without preamble, as it opens with the player characters being the unwitting targets of a Summon Monster spell! Once summoned into the very hands of a mad and drunken giant, the player characters will find themselves exploring a realm designed for creatures ten times their size as they fight all manner of strange creature, traverse larger than life obstacles and objects, encounter other adventurers who have fallen into the clutches of the mad prince Tempestas, and even risk plummeting to their death as the very foundation of the cloud castle of Stormridge Sanctum is crumbling beneath their boots!Can the player characters placate the whims of a giant drunk on power and lost grace? Will they survive encounters with the strange animated objects that have become twisted by decades of neglected magic beneath a crumbling castle? And just what the hell is that echoing boom coming from the eastern part of the wine cellar?!You’ve been granted the hospitality of the storm giant prince Clovis Tempestas II, and he’s always up for a little​ more...ABOVE: Fifth Edition Cover Mock-UpWhat to ExpectIn Vino Gigantus by James M. Spahn- available in either Fifth Edition, Pathfinder or Swords & Wizardry versions, is an adventure for introductory-level characters.Within it's covers (or the digital PDF file) you will find-
New creatures and new magic items.
NPC adventurers to serve as allies or antagonists.
An adventure told on a massive scale, where dinnerware is the size of a full-grown man, chairs must be scaled like flagpoles, and great animated objects as large as a man can spring to life.
Options for and potential expansion is provided, but the design lends itself to modifications, allowing the adventure to be included at any moment in any campaign.
Full-Color Map by Robert Altbauer
In Vino Gigantus uses the same formula introduced with our last Indiegogo, we refer to this method including the focused enhancements (stretch goals) that improve the product as total project funding increases with art, extra content written content and digital play enhancing extras (player handouts etc)...The Tiny Print RunWhy Indiegogo?Frog God Games is testing a new approach with the launch of this project- almost the inverse of how we design our crowdfunding projects on Kickstarter. We call it the 'Tiny Print Run'.Thus, Indiegogo projects by Frog God Games will-
Be short in duration
Be limited to a single title
Have options priced between $5-$30
Design all stretch goals and project bonus' affect the principle reward only (usually both the PDF and the softcover).
Be the only guaranteed method to get the premium print copy (NOTE: the softcover versions  in this printing will not be sold on our website: see FAQ for explanation).
Have simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit
Why the Tiny Print Run?Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.Is Frog God Games giving up on Kickstarter?No. Far from it, in fact these smaller projects are happening in response to the feedback we have heard from both fans and 'almost' fans alike. We hear the request for less expensive options for our projects and products all the time. A second frequent desire expressed to us, whether at conventions, on social media or in email, is for a larger selection of smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions and not necessitate a full two year campaign.Additionally, Frog God Games has grown in both sales and brand awareness.  This opportunity will give us the additional resources to invest in the very best books in all of our formats. This will be the second project we have launched on Indiegogo for the purpose. The first, the City the Dripped Blood is at the printer now for supporters and is expected to arrive more than 2 months earlier than planned. Project Reward With the wishes of the fans in mind, this and future Indiegogo projects will fund standalone projects that are both affordable and fun. This project, as well future Tiny Print Run projects, is narrowly focused with all stretch goals adding resources to the principle reward which traditionally would not be feasible for a publisher our size. Examples of Enhancements from Higher FundingDuring the 15 day primary project period for In Vino Gigantus  and after the $1500 goal is met the focus will be to improve the delivered product. The are not special tiered collectors editions or add-on purchase extras. Thus as total project funding increases the better the final product will be for everybody.Examples of the planned extras that increased funding would bring to In Vino Gigantus-
Additional commissions for interior color art specific to the adventure
Extra written content commissioned from the author
Printed Player Maps
Downloadable Options designed for popular virtual table-top software (New creature/NPC tokens etc). 
Digital extras (player handouts etc) that are focused on quality table-top play

ABOVE: Example of Digital Token Extra for previous Tiny Print Run project 'The City that Dripped Blood' Project DeliveryPDF PerksWe will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the Frog God Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the Frog God Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.Softcover PerksSoftcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo. NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive we understand this and are not able to ship the In Vino Gigantus for less than US$25 to Canada or US$35 worldwide. To explain what we mean, please see the shipping calculator for UPS by clicking .Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQAbout the AuthorThis introductory-level adventure was written by ENnie and Origin Award winning author James M. Spahn, whose credits include the White Box Omnibus, the Three Castles Award nominated The Hero’s Journey Fantasy Role-playing , White Star: White Box Science Fiction Role-playing, and several products in the Star Wars and The One Ring role-playing game product lines. He has been a passionate freelance writer and independent creator within the role-playing game community for over a decade and brings over thirty years of gaming experience to this product. He served as a contributing author on several Frog God Games products, including Bard’s Gate, The Riot Act: A Bard’s Gate Adventure, and Predator’s Oath: A Northlands Saga Adventure. James’s diverse portfolio and passion for gaming in all its form means In Vino Gigantus is sure be a fast-funding hit.

story:
Quodd Heroes is an action-strategy adventure board game for one or more players ages 10 and up. 

Platform video game meets tabletop miniatures game in a completely original tabletop board game experience.  It is like nothing you've ever seen or played!  

Become an astounding cube-shaped character that moves by tumbling and has a different skill assigned to each face of its cube-shaped body. Then, mix in incredible ability upgrades, a fantastic array of power-ups, devices, pets and ancient powerful runes. Finally, choose one of the many different scenarios to setup your adventure and you're ready for action and mayhem in the beautiful, dangerous, and unpredictable world of Quoddria! 

Social Links:

Core Box Contents:

  • 5 Different Character Miniatures (2 of each character, 1 for play and one as a game aide / reference.
  • 5 cardboard player mats (1 for each character)
  • 25 "skill tiles" - 3mm thick (5 for each character)
  • 35 Upgrade tiles - 3mm thick (5 for each character)
  • 15 Acrylic crystal miniatures in 3 different colors.
  • 6 Large double-sided game boards (core box)
  • 100+ 3mm thick tokens for use on the game boards including, tunnels, trap doors, walls, teleporters, crystals, switches, springs etc.
  • 80+ Card Premium Ivory-Core exploration deck featuring more than 38 unique cards in five different types.
  • 1 custom engraved direction die
  • 1 custom engraved D6
  • 20+ Ivory Core World Event cards

Moving Platforms Expansion:

  • 1 large double sided game board
  • 12+ smaller moving platform boards
  • 12 platform direction tokens
  • New Scenarios

Plus All Unlocked Stretch Goals!

 

To purchase an add-on just add the value of the add-on to your pledge amount. 

 Man Vs. Meeple - Review

 Undead Viking - Review

 Rules Overview Video

   

 

 Designer Solo Play-through

 DiceCast - Four Player Play-through Video

 

 

 

This project will have EU, USA, Canada and Australia friendly shipping (no duties and taxes).  We will also be shipping Asian pledges directly from China to reduce shipping rates for backers in Asia.

If you have questions about shipping to your particular location send me a note and I'll do my best to answer your questions.

Shipping will be charged after the campaign in BackerKit.

Approximate Shipping Charges :

USA: $15 CAD
EU: $15 CAD
Canada : $15 CAD
Australia: $25 CAD
China: $15 CAD
Japan: $22 CAD
New Zealand: $30 CAD
Taiwan: $15 CAD
Hong Kong: $15 CAD
Norway: $15 CAD
Switzerland: $15 CAD
UK: $15 CAD
Liechtenstein: $15 CAD
Everywhere Else: $35 CAD

Currency Conversions 

 Remember that your pledge is in Canadian Dollars, and your card will be billed in Canadian Dollars when the campaign ends. Currency exchange rates change regularly. Look at your local currency exchange rate toward the end of the campaign for the most current price.

story:
Serpents was launched on Kickstarter on September 25th, 2018 and successfully funded on October 25th, 2018 for $5,895.

 

Before ordering, please read this important update from our KS campaign.

 

Due to our printing schedule we'll be able to sell about 300 decks that are in our excess stock right away, which means you'll get yours just as soon as our Kickstarter backers!

If you order a deck beyond that stock, fret not, you'll still get your deck! It might just take a little longer for us to get it to you.

Serpents puts a fresh spin on classic secret-identity games like Mafia and Werewolf. Play using our rules out of the box, or throw them out and use your own. Our team has taken measures to ensure this deck is flexible enough to play a range of unique hidden-identity games — known or as yet unwritten — and allows you to cater any existing version to your liking. Mix and match your favorite roles and start lying to your closest friends and family.

Each character’s abilities are printed on their card, so gone are the days of that guy blurting out, "What does the Jack do again?". Additionally, two reference cards are included to ensure your narrator never again forgets to wake up the nurse.    

Serpents supports 6-17 players.

 

One player will serve as The Fortune Teller. Remaining players will either be Innocents, striving collectively for survival using logic and deduction, or Serpents, fork-tongued deceivers, eliminating travelers from the game using pretense and lies. Only the Fortune Teller knows the true identity of each player. He alone will attend the players on their journey, acting as both moderator and story-teller.

The Innocents' team may include any of the seven provided special-ability cards, as well as a number of Rat cards, who do not have any ability in the simplest version of Serpents.

Each game begins with The First Night phase and cycles through subsequent Day and Night phases until one team is victorious. Will the Innocents weed out the Serpents and survive or will they turn their blades on each other?

Seven additional pre-made "blank" cards, with their own individual designs, are included with Serpents, ensuring any alternative roles can easily be worked into your game. 

Our intention with Serpents is to refine the tried and true hidden identity mechanics. However, we’ve added a few new roles to liven the meta.

We’ve added the role of the Owl, an unaligned rogue who wakes with the Serpents. This role is intended for more advanced players and can provide an extra challenge. 

We’ve also included an optional ability for the Rats, allowing them to attempt to identify one another during an extended night sequence. This encourages teamwork and gives the usually powerless Rats a little extra knowledge to work with when attempting to uncover the Serpents.

Rat and Serpent cards have also been individually numbered. This allows them to be uniquely identified during the game, opening up new possibilities for customized gameplay.

As stated before, these additions do not interfere with any classic rules, should you choose to include them.   

Every card is hand illustrated, front and back, in our distinctive style. Drawing inspiration from medieval and hieroglyphic imagery and influenced by Gothic and Victorian design, Serpents provides a completely unique deck of cards for all of your deceptive needs.  

The deck contains 29 tarot cards

  • 1 Fortune Teller
  • 7 Innocents cards with unique abilities
  • 7 Rats
  • 5 Serpents
  • 7 Blank customizable cards
  • 2 Reference cards for use by The Fortune Teller
  • Instruction Manual

story:
Hello all!

My name is Pawel (PJG), and I would like to tell you in a nutshell why I decided to do it all. After 10 years of collecting figurines I felt that something in my collection was missing, so I started filling this gap. This is how the idea of the dark and decay figurines came up - the Rotten Factory climate. Today, thanks to "KICKSTARTER", I decided to share with you my passion and unique artifacts, to give you the possibility to fill your collection with something that you have not had so far.

Today Rotten Factory is not just a passion that intertwines with my daily life. For a year and a half now, it is also a thriving company offering design and production of high quality figurines for gamers, collectors, and painters. Thanks to the campaign, I will be able to further develop, create more products and my models will enjoy not only me but also you ;)!

If you want to be up to the date with Rotten Factory news, take a look at:
FACEBOOK
TWITTER
INSTAGRAM

ROTTEN FACTORY WEBSTORE

The main goal of the project is to raise funds for the realization of new figures from the new Rotten Factory line. The models, that will arise thanks to your support and will go to your hands, are unique and created especially for this event. They were not previously available for sale, so it can be said that these are fresh, still fragrant with resin models. I will create for you many more of truly exceptional models which, with the development of grants, will appear in the offer. So remember if you give more you will get more. ;)

More photos here: GALLERY

You are interested in the project, but do not have the funds to support it? No problem! Money is not everything. The knowledge and skills, that I can develop thanks to you, are invaluable. All the time, I am looking for passionate and creative people to work together. If you have questions, suggestions or ideas you would like to share with me, please write to info@rottenfactory.eu.

The shipping cost will depend on the number of models purchased and will be calculated at the end of the campaign. You will be able to pay for shipping through Rotten Factory website.

Shipping cost:

Free shipping for everyone who will support the project for $88 or more.

For those who will support the project for less than $88:

Poland - 10 PLN
Europe - 5 EUR , 4,50 GBP
ROW - 6 USD

 

Paweł Jakub Górecki - sculptor, concept artist and owner of Rotten Factory
A collector of miniatures from Poland, who finally became a sculptor. Always push his skills to the maximum. Infected by "rotten" creativity, which he likes to share with people ;). 

Patrick Lorente - concept arts
An aspiring artist/architect (depends on how you wanna see it :D) living in Sweden. His main tools are ink, graphite, and oils. He also does some sculpting on the side.

Mathias Rizell - creator of Flail Dwarf
An amateur turned sculptor via the slippery slope of converting his own evil dwarves: It's a hobby hazard of that particular army! An eccentric Swede overly interested in all things history, aesthetics and natural science, he usually crams his sculpts with details, as you can see above!

 

 

Risks and challenges

I know how important is quality, which is backed by proper mold preparation and the use of top quality materials. It is also important to keep the deadlines and I am focused to deliver all shipments as soon as possible to their new owners.
Currently, I am the boss of myself and I care about everything from the idea through design, execution to sales. The only fear I have is that the new models delivery time may be slightly longer when the number of users increases. I would like to ask for understanding, and I undertake to ensure that the entire process of sculpting miniatures from stretch goals, casting and shipping will go smoothly. Of course, I will inform you about the progress of my work on a regular basis.

story:
Short Summary

We made a party card game, and we need to grow an audience. Having a booth at conventions is a HUGE part of that. However, we've spent all our money on developing the game! It's incredibly important that we raise enough money to get a booth and some basic trade show materials for 2020. With your help, we can make that happen!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $500 to set up our first booth at a convention. Half of that will go towards the booth space itself, and the other half will buy a branded table cover and a sign.

Every dollar raised past our initial goal will gear us up for a year of trekking from convention to convention to put Fib in as many hands possible, so that we can make the game the best that it can be before we raise money for inventory!

By contributing to this campaign, you are helping us launch this dream that we've worked SO hard on. Of course, you will get our free Print and Play, which you can download anytime, and you will be on the ground-floor of the most exciting new game of the next decade!

If we don't reach our entire goal, we will use the funds we did raise towards a booth at a later convention!

The Impact

Fib is unique, it's a highly social game that stays fresh every time you play. We've seen people's reactions--their laughter, enthusiasm, and interest is what's kept us going.

We know we're onto something here, and we need to get the game out to more people. By attending conventions, we can start spreading awareness and bringing more people along with us on this journey as we prepare to order inventory!

This is a game that's meant to be played again and again, for years and years. It should be on everyone's shelves who enjoys games of this genre.

I have been a part of a number of creative endeavors, and none have excited me as much as Fib. We will be working tirelessly to get this game out into the world, but we've exhausted our own ability to pay for that effort. What we will never run out of is TIME and ENERGY. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge right now is growing our audience. We can't raise enough funds for inventory if we don't have a large audience to help us, and we can't grow that large audience without attending conventions and becoming an integral part of the tabletop gaming community.

Luckily, we are ambitious and ready to travel to everywhere our audience congregates! The risk is that we won't have enough money to attend the most crucial events. That's what makes this campaign so important.

Our plan is to use the funds we raise from this campaign to reach as many people as possible. This includes getting trade show materials, booth space, a production-ready prototype, and traveling to the most crucial tabletop game conventions in the country.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign with your friends and family, through social media, carrier pigeon, or megaphone!

Also, visit our website and sign up for our newsletter to receive the free Print-and-Play so that you can make and play Fib for yourself today!

Hit those share buttons right here on our campaign page and help us get the word out!
story_txt:
Short Summary
We made a party card game, and we need to grow an audience. Having a booth at conventions is a HUGE part of that. However, we've spent all our money on developing the game! It's incredibly important that we raise enough money to get a booth and some basic trade show materials for 2020. With your help, we can make that happen!

What We Need & What You Get
We need $500 to set up our first booth at a convention. Half of that will go towards the booth space itself, and the other half will buy a branded table cover and a sign.
Every dollar raised past our initial goal will gear us up for a year of trekking from convention to convention to put Fib in as many hands possible, so that we can make the game the best that it can be before we raise money for inventory!
By contributing to this campaign, you are helping us launch this dream that we've worked SO hard on. Of course, you will get our free Print and Play, which you can download anytime, and you will be on the ground-floor of the most exciting new game of the next decade!

story:
While playing Heropath each hero will need to tactfully decide when to cooperate and when to be deceitful. As evil continues to rise throughout the game, the real competition is not against fellow heroes but rather the game itself.

Heropath includes solo mode as well as a switch of co-op mode, where you can play with your friends to defeat together the vicious dragon. Unlike the usual mode where you can play against the game, while competing against your friends for glory and gold.

Heropath is played with 1 to 4 players in the core game, up to 6 players with both expansions.

We designed the game for age 12+. 

The duration of the game is 60-120 minutes.

5 types of playing cards:

  1. Fortune cards: usually drawn by a hero upon defeat of an enemy in battle.

  2. Magic cards: helps the hero throughout the game in motion and  battles.

  3. Abilities cards: provide the hero special abilities in order to perform unique  actions.

  4. Market cards: purchasing animals, friends, equipment and more at the Marketplace.

  5. Arms cards: equipment and armament that may be purchased at the  Blacksmith.

Playing Cards Illustration:

 

Expansion I

 

Expansion II

 

 

 

 

 

We use flat rate shipping for this project. This means you will pay the same amount of shipping for only the core game as you will pay for the core game with expansions. In fact, you can order 5x the core game with both expansions and pay shipping only once. We will ship from within the EU and US so you don't have to pay any taxes. For Australia, it depends on the number of backers but we will also make sure you don't have to pay any taxes, and neither do Canadian backers. The shipping rates for 2018 are not in yet, so we have to keep a rather wide range for now. Also, for the UK it's assumed they are still part of the EU when we ship, otherwise shipping rates might change. You will pay for shipping in the Pledge Manager after the campaign when we know the precise shipping rates. So please note these are only shipping estimates. The weight of the game with both expansions is estimated to be more than 4 kg.

story:
About Interdimesional Workspace

It started with a dream, Our Founder Jacob Miller wanted to create a company to help those with ideas and visions without the means to start them. Originally intended as a custom parts manufacturer and source for independent inventors, finding the funding to start was anything but easy to come by. After almost a decade of building and learning, Jacob met the outsider artist (and sometimes vagabond) known as Paisley Straenj, who had nearly the same idea twenty years before. Together these two independent thinking, self-motivated creators compared their notes, put their heads together, and came up with the formula that became Interdimensional Work space LLC. A dream factory for the outsiders, help for those who lack the ways and means to make their ideas reality. Our goals are simple, create a network of artists and creators for outsiders without the means to accomplish their goals, create a platform of open community content, and provide funding resources focusing on individual projects. 

Interdimensional Workspace proudly presents our first project, Paisley Straenj's Wildcards!

Wildcards is the world's first full deck of jokers. So come along and help us celebrate the history and tradition of the world's most popular and collected card, the joker. 

  • We are looking for funding to help this fantastic independent outsider artist find his audience and produce this wonderful deck. 
  • Primary funding will secure Copywrite, trademarks, and other fees for Paisley to help him protect his work.
  • The funds we are asking for go directly to the artist to help with print costs, shipping, and handling and help support and further the work of this amazing outsider artist.

The Deck

The Wildcards starter deck includes 

  • The first 3 suits of red, black, and blue. Each suit contains 14 original illustrations inspired by both modern and classic joker designs.  
  • The Wildcards info card and Blank replacement joker, for a total of 44 cards.
  • Game booklet with instructions for the first 3 games for red, black, and blue.
  • Each card is Printed on 310 gsm fine linen paper.

Prints

Each museum-quality giclee art print measures 11x14 inches and printed on Arches 380 gsm / 140 LB archival paper with pigment inks.

  • After your order is placed, you will receive an email with a link                                                           to choose your favorite one of forty-two jokers. 
  • Each print is signed and numbered by the artist.                                                                                  The number of orders will determine the size of the print run.
  • All prints come with a certificate of authenticity.

Stickers

The Wildcards vinyl sticker set includes 10 2.5x3.5 inch high quality vinyl stickers.

  • all stickers are high-gloss UV-coated and water resistant.

  • each sticker displays a stand-alone version of ten of our favorite jokers included in the wildcards starter deck.

Casino Chips

Our playing chips set include 100 high quality 40mm Casino style chips made from composite clay and features the Wildcards logo.

The Games

As the joker is included in many games, Paisley has intended Wildcards to include many games. The first 3 games are based on classic cards games augmented for this deck.                                    The Wildcards booklet features a game for each suit.

  • Wildcards Blue is based on spades for three or four players.

  • Wildcards Red is a zany version of gin/rummy.

  • Wildcards Black is a full tilt poker game                                                                                                     in the classicstyle of draw poker and Texas hold'em. 

  • Everyone is also encouraged to make up your own game for Wildcards and share them with your us on our website.

Stretch Goals

We hope that everyone is excited about Wildcards as we are, and to show our gratitude, we have included some awesome stretch goal perks to give away to all of our supporters.

  • At 20,000$, all orders will include 3 1x2 inch vinyl stickers.
  • At 50,000$, we will add 3 casino quality playing chips (red, black, and blue).
  • And at 150,000$, everyone will receive 1 5x7 inch signed and numbered giclee art print     (of their choice) with a certificate of authenticity.

Just the Beginning for Wildcards

As incredible as we think this deck is, Paisley has promised more, much more. Going forward, we hope to launch the first expansion pack for Wildcard with another suit of 14 more original jokers, celebrating the world's most popular playing card.

  • Join our mailing list to receive updates, surveys, and the chance to get in on our giveaways.
  • Follow us on facebook, and share your love of the joker with us.
  • Please help share this project and support independent art.

Final Thoughts and Future Goals

Interdimensional Workspace is a privately owned LLC established with expressed goal of helping to enable independent and outsider artists to find funding, establish production, and find their audience no matter where they are located.  We would like to thank everyone who took the time out to check our very first campaign. We also hope you are as excited as we are to help this amazing independent artist find his audience. However while Paisley might be the first artist we hope to empower, we are looking for more. So, if you or know of an outsider artist who needs help with a missing element for success, we would love to hear from you and we definitely want to hear your ideas.

story:
Bill Webb's Decks of Dirty Tricks 

Bill Webb's Deck of Dirty Tricks has been used and enjoyed for years in convention and home campaigns. It was made for use during game sessions to encourage unexpected events and player interactivity. It has proved to be one of Frog God Games' most popular products and now new decks are available!Each card has a flavor test of a pop culture reference, meme, pun, or worse. Such as… What is this? An invisibility cloak for ants? Followed by a mechanical thing to happen in game. Such as… Target gains invisibility for 3 rounds.

Options are available for 1,2, or 3 decks (your choice).

The available decks are-

  1. The Classic Deck of Dirty Tricks
  2. The dungeon-themed - “Bill Webb’s Deck of Dirty Tricks, Volume II”
  3. A more Wilderness themed" Bill Webb’s Deck of Dirty Tricks, Volume III"

Plus…

The full deal- Get all three decks and a SIGNED copy of Bill Webb’s Book of Dirty Tricks

The Classic Deck of Dirty Tricks.

Made for use during game sessions to encourage unexpected events and player interactivity. The cards are all printed with suggestions for changes in the narration and their potential mechanical implications. It is system neutral but works best with any one of the many variations of the world's most popular roleplaying game.

The New Expansion Decks of Dirty Tricks

We are bringing 2 new decks for this Indiegogo project. We are also reprinting the classic (and sold out classic Deck of Dirty tricks . The expansion decks are planned for 48 cards with, often requested blank cards for creating your very own "dirty tricks" for your home or convention game.

The Tiny Print Run

Why Indiegogo?

Frog God Games is continuing the use of this IndieGoGo crowdfunding method for Deck of Dirty Tricks This method is almost the inverse of how we design our crowdfunding projects on Kickstarter. We call it the 'Tiny Print Run'.

Thus, Indiegogo projects by Frog God Games will-

·         Be short in duration

·         Be limited to a single title

·         Have options priced between $5-$50

·         Have simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit

 

Why the Tiny Print Run?

Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.

This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.

Why not use Kickstarter?

We will still be using Kickstarter, frequently, for our large-scale projects. These smaller projects are happening in response to the feedback we have heard from both fans and 'almost' fans alike. We hear the request for less expensive options for our projects and products all the time. A second frequent desire expressed to us, whether at conventions, on social media or in email, is for a larger selection of smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions and not necessitate a full two year campaign.

Additionally, Frog God Games has grown in both sales and brand awareness.  This opportunity will give us the additional resources to invest in the very best books in all of our formats. 

Project Reward 

With the wishes of the fans in mind, this and future Indiegogo projects will fund standalone projects that are both affordable and fun. This project, as well future Tiny Print Run projects, is narrowly focused. 

Project Delivery

PDF Perks

We will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the Frog God Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.

The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the Frog God Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.

Deck and Softcover Perks

Deck and softcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo. 

Overseas Shipping

NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive. We understand this. Likewise, some countries charge VAT tax or other fees to our customers on receipt. We cannot fraudulently lie about the value of materials we mail out. We are happy to ship you anything regardless of where you live, but we have to stay in business at the same time thus even our lightest books are affected. In the near future we expect to have a print on demand system in place for everyone overseas, It is not ideal, as the final book is not printed at the highest-quality when compared to the ones we fulfill in Indiegogo.

To explain what we mean, please see the shipping calculator for UPS by clicking here- 

https://wwwapps.ups.com/ctc/request?loc=en_US.

story:
NEW SPECIAL PERK ADDED, YOU CAN NOW ADD ANY OF THE EXISTING MK MODELS OR TEAMS TO YOUR PLEDGE AT A 20% DISCOUNT.


First stretch goal released:

The dice set (including shipping worldwide) is now available for:
6€ add-on if you already have a perk. (3 dice)
8€ as single dice set (3 dice)

Also we are making available now both Star Players Eldrid and Long Stike
One Star Player (including shipping worldwide) is now available for:
6€ add-on if you already have a perk. 
9€ as single miniature shipped worldwide 


About us

MK1881 Miniatures is the new miniature line from Maki Games, featuring high quality miniatures mainly suitable for fantasy football games and more. We offer innovative design and very high quality casts. MK1881 team is composed of many experienced artists all with several years of experience in their fields that range from design, to classic and 3D sculpting and painting.  We work only with high quality casting facilities and use only top quality materials for our creations. All miniatures are made with lead free metal.
http://www.mk1881.com
MK1881 work progress can be followed on our FB page: 
https://www.facebook.com/mk1881
Some example of our work can be seen on our pages. Tanatos and Honos where our first two teams.

Why crowd funding?

At MK1881 we have done extensive research and tests to deliver only very high quality miniatures. Designing, sculpting and printing these miniatures is quite expensive. We are looking for your contribution to speed up the printing and casting process and cover some of the costs for the design and production of special characters for this fantasy football team.

Our models:

The line elves:

Lineman 2 PROPOSED VERSION


Catchers:


Throwers:

Savage Elves:

Star Player:

Tree Golem:

Two of the Star Players painted:

Painted by Axia


EXALTED TEAM:

Player number 2 is being redone. Will post when finished.



Perks in detail:

All the Exalted Early Bird will get a special gift from a selection offered at the end of the campaign.

Stretch Goals:

- Limited Edition Ball (Free for all Supporter or above perks)  
- Limited Edition Coin (Free for all Supporter or above perks)
- Limited Edition Dice set (This may be on eof the gifts for the Exalted Early bird)
- Star Player Characters

ARES Backers special....

If you backed the ARES project at the end of the campaign you will be entitled to add any single human player from our range to your pledge fro free. (see details on the ARES campaign)  This includes any of the Star Players. This is an extra 8.50€ value added. Or a free set of dice from the Tanatos, Honos or Cabiri. You will be asked at the end of the campaign.


Size Comparison:

During the creation of the Tanatos team, and W.I.P pics several have questioned the size of the models. Below courtesy by RN estudio there is a picture of the actual models next to some existing well known models for comparison purposes. It was an overall opinion that the selected size is the best to match any current range.

Previously done models: 

Below you can see the final result of the first campaign. All models shown where painted by Axia, awaiting the box art by RNestudio.
TANATOS

HONOS

More detailed pictures can be found on Maki-Games.com

Risk and Challenges:

Not many, all the 3D models are done and visible, the printing facility was chosen and selected for his highest printing standard, test models where done to make sure the materials and size are adequate to obtain the highest standard product. We have already ordered and paid for the metal for this production. Many can testify that any models we have worked in the past have always been top quality casts, and we have produced hundreds of models for other companies in the past. At this stage the only challenge is to ship all the items according to the planned schedule and to unlock enough stretch goals to create the special characters for this team. This is our 4th team, the first 2 had a significant delay in shipping due to some issues we didn't plan. Last team the Ares will be shipped while this campaign is running.

Box Art Team:

 RN Estudio will be painting the box art of this team and the painted team will be for sale. If interested please contact me or Rafa at RN for more details. During the campaign we will show more painted models.


Prices:

The prices set in the campaign have a significant discount and shipping included. These prices will be no longer available from us in the future. Our policy is to keep prices stable and avoid crazy holidays or event discount in order to protect our present and future distributors / store sales. So this is your chance to save some cash on our products: don't miss it. 

Additional notes:

- All the models will be made using very high quality lead free metal that matches or exceeds the standards required by law in all the states that these miniatures will be sent. 
- Models will be provided un-assembled and unpainted.
- Models are not intended for kids 14yrs old or younger due to small parts, 
- Each model will come with a matching 25mm round plastic base.

About usMK1881 Miniatures is the new miniature line from Maki Games, featuring high quality miniatures mainly suitable for fantasy football games and more. We offer innovative design and very high quality casts. MK1881 team is composed of many experienced artists all with several years of experience in their fields that range from design, to classic and 3D sculpting and painting.  We work only with high quality casting facilities and use only top quality materials for our creations. All miniatures are made with lead free metal.http://www.mk1881.comMK1881 work progress can be followed on our FB page: https://www.facebook.com/mk1881Some example of our work can be seen on our pages. Tanatos and Honos where our first two teams.
Why crowd funding?At MK1881 we have done extensive research and tests to deliver only very high quality miniatures. Designing, sculpting and printing these miniatures is quite expensive. We are looking for your contribution to speed up the printing and casting process and cover some of the costs for the design and production of special characters for this fantasy football team.
