story:
Hey, y'all! It's Ryan & Brad, the dudes from Craft Fair Games.

Last year we self-published our first official release, FEROX, and we were overwhelmed by the positive reception and support we received from the indie gaming and horror fan communities. 

We maxxed-out our credit cards and emptied our coin jars to produce the first 250 copies of the game, and the only way we can afford the materials to hand-make more copies is by offering pre-orders until we collect enough to cover the cost. That's why we're reaching out to you--the communities, fans, and radical weirdos who make any of this possible--to help bring Ferox back from the dead and bring life to our new game, Trash Lords.

We're a fully-independent DIY publisher and every copy of every game we sell is handmade by the two of us in our kitchen for only enough profit to buy the beers we drink while we're doing it. We have no retail distribution, no overseas manufacturers, and no idea what the term "business acumen" means. This is truly a punk rock labor of love, and like any DIY project, we can't do it without the help and support of people like you.

 

TRASH LORDS

Trash Lords is a push-your-luck, take-that, hand management game for 3-5 players. Each player takes on the role of one of 12 transient characters who stalk the back alleys and gutters, rifling through dumpsters in search of valuable trash.

Whether you’re a crust punk, a hobo rail-rider, a trust fund poseur, or Woody Guthrie’s actual ghost, all players have the same ultimate goal: rootin’ around in the trash til you’ve got the booze, smokes, snax, and dope you need to summon the TRASH LORD and be anointed his one true glorious Trash Child.

Each dumpster is different, and some more dangerous. Digging deeper can yield more rewards, but it’s also askin’ for trouble. This town is lousy with cops, and the nefarious garbage critters known as Trashlings are waiting in the shadows to swipe your beautiful junk. Even your fellow street urchins might just get wasted and jump you if your stash is lookin’ a little too tempting. Players must carefully manage their turns and constantly be on the move (and on their guard) as they booze, scrap, panhandle, and race to be the first to summon the TRASH LORD (peace be upon him).

 

WHAT WE NEED

Like any decent DIY anti-company, we believe in 100% transparency when it comes to handling your money. We need to raise $2000 to fund the material costs required to cover 70 copies of Ferox and 50 copies of Trash Lords. We picked those quantities because they allow for bulk discounts that make the games affordable enough for us to produce and worth it for you to buy. Our profit is very minimal, and we can absolutely assure you that every cent of it will be spent on the beer and notebook paper we need to design more games. We literally don't know what else money is for.

 

PERKS

 

NEW PERKS!

SHIPPING

We started this campaign early to ensure we'd have everything we need to start assembling games (and other perks) by June 1st. As soon as the materials arrive at our doorstep, we'll get to work assembling copies. It's a time-intensive process, and as soon as we're set free from our full-time "day jobs" we'll be spending every second of our time filling order as quickly as we possibly can. We'll be shipping out everyone's perks in the order in which you backed the project, and we'll post regular updates for backers so you can monitor our progress. The packages will be shipped via USPS, and if you're ordering from the US we'll send you a tracking number.

Other Ways You Can Help

SPREAD THE WORD!

This is a fixed-funding campaign, which means we won't get the funds unless we reach our goal. Help us get the word out, and annoy your friends until they buy a copy of their own. Like any DIY project, this is a community effort. Without you, we're just a couple of dorks with a handful of dice and a dream. And without us, you're probably doing pretty great, but you won't have any copies of our games. 

XOXO,
Brad & Ryan
Co-Dudes of Craft Fair Games

story:
Welcome to Queeng Playing Cards

Update as of January 26, 2021: We have just launched our new 2nd edition of Queeng, the Diverse edition with multi-ethnic face cards! To learn more and back our mission, see our new campaign: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/queeng-playing-cards-2nd-edition/x/5904646?create_edit=true#/

Update as of November 2020: We have printed 5,000 more decks with a new, high quality printing company (Liberty Cards) in order to get you more Queeng cards before the holidays! Order ASAP to ensure delivery before Christmas.

Our Story  

Queeng Playing​ Cards is a family project that my father and I started on a family vacation 3 years ago. 

It all started with an innocent question when we were playing a card game together...

I asked

“Why is the King always worth more than the Queen?”

He didn’t really have a good answer. So he encouraged me to find a solution!

After some brainstorming, we decided to create an updated version of the classic deck of cards. 

Aside from making a wise statement about equality and how far we've come, my father realized it would be a GREAT opportunity to teach me about business challenges, product design, and marketing. By working with him, we got the chance to bond on an entirely different level.

I got to discover a whole other side of my dad, while getting some hands-on entrepreneurial experience. Or as my Dad put it, our project got me 'closer to the real world'—by learning about things like trial and error, time management, and patience.

Since my dad is the CEO of a media company, he has a pretty good sense of what a product launch involves. But he totally encouraged me to take the lead. I had the freedom and authority to call the shots—and make mistakes—on my own.

One decision  I made was that I didn't want to be front and center of our campaign. I'm pretty camera shy. So we got a great actress to play me and tell our story. 

Because the amazing thing is, we actually turned our idea into a unique product that WORKS!!

Queeng is an updated version of the classic deck of playing cards, but still works with ALL the original principles, so you can play ANY card game with it. 

With its attention to detail and gorgeous, hand-drawn illustrations, each deck as special as the encouraging message it's bringing the world ❤

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

What you see in the video is only a prototype - The cards will be:

A Set of Playing Cards: 52 Playing Cards + 2 Jokers

  • Top Casino-Quality Cards
  • Premium Printing
  • Shipping — Since the artwork is complete, we estimate shipping will begin as soon as April 2020. 
  • For our 'serious backers,' we're offering awesome limited-edition boxes and posters of our unique illustrations.

 

We want the deck of cards to bring fun and gaming to as many people as possible, of all ages and walks of life! With your help, we'll reach our goal and raise $10,000.

 

The Impact

Not only is this a cool new way to play all your card games, but you'll also be a part of celebrating real-world change, while supporting a kick-ass example of young entrepreneurship.

Once we reach our goal, you'll literally have helped adapt a game we've known and loved for HUNDREDS of years to our generation. Playing cards will finally be suited for our time, mindset and society!

 

So, how does it actually work?

We improved the cards, but adapted them to the old rules. Since the hierarchy is set according to the old cards, you can play all the games you want.

Monarch Cards = King Cards

We called it Monarch, as a Monarch can be male or female.

Duchess or Duke Cards = Queen Cards

We called it Duchess or Duke so we could have both a man and a woman.

Prince or Princess Cards = Jack Cards

Jacks are now Princes and Princesses.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The design of the cards has been finalized.
  • Prototypes have been printed and tested, as you see in the video.
  • Printing and Shipping have been secured by a reliable company, used successfully in other funding campaigns
  • We anticipate production will begin as soon as we've been funded.
  • We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product, on time. However, unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to work day and night in order to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent.

 

Thank you and welcome aboard!

Risks & Challenges

The design of the cards has been finalized.
Prototypes have been printed and tested, as you see in the video.
Printing and Shipping have been secured by a reliable company, used successfully in other funding campaigns
We anticipate production will begin as soon as we've been funded.
We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product, on time. However, unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to work day and night in order to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent.

 
Thank you and welcome aboard!

story:
As a Dungeon Master you never know where your party is going to get into trouble next. Gone are the days of drawing and redrawing the most basic of maps and landscapes. Open Initiative!

Many of the maps work cohesively with each other. Get two to make the maps even bigger and more customizable. 

 Add on alert! Add $5 to your pledge level to get a page of reusable vinyl stickers. 

Each Map costs money to make, I need your help to add many more maps to this book. My goal is to get enough funding to end up with 30+ Below is how I think we can do it!

Insta: DMSGUILD

Facebook: Yarro Studios Battle Maps

Twitter: Immersivebattlemaps

Want a little taste of the glory? Download and play on the Boar Booger inn now!

story:
Missed the campaign? Buy here: scenariocards.org

 
 


Free Box Packaging for every set of 3 packs.



Scenario Cards will be available at our discounted rates, until our website launches in July. 




Hate spending $1000 on a life-coach to find your purpose? So do we. That’s why we created Scenario Cards.



Each card comes with one ‘What if…’ scenario.



‘What if…’ scenarios are powerful mental models used by psychologists to help you let go of your worries, fears and insecurities about the opinion of others.





All scenarios were inspired by 12 topics, centered around you, your life and the world you live in. The topics are color-coded to make it easy to navigate between them.



Every card comes with one scenario, within one topic and one degree of intensity. Do you fancy mild, medium, spicy, or extremely spicy?



With these cards, you don’t have to meet with a life-coach to find your purpose. You can use the scenarios for mini-coaching sessions to discover what you really want to know about yourself and your friends.



 


To uncover your purpose one must follow three steps. Hence we designed three packs.

Pack 1: Your self - Look inward to get to know yourself better.
 

Pack 2: Your life - Reflect on your life up to this point and set intentions for the time to come


Pack 3: Your world - Look out into your world and plan the new adventures you want to take on.



With all three packs at hand you have a set of cards for every occasion, whether you are with your friends, family, your partner or your co-workers.

 






We have spent a lot of time designing our cards into something truly beautiful and which invites for deep reflection.



Pastel colors trigger you to get excited to set aside your fear of judgement and discover what is true for you, right now, in this moment. 



6 uniquely designed dreaming faces represent the curiosity we all should have to explore how the people around us see the world, no matter their gender or ethnicity.



When designs were ready, we made a selection of the 156 most powerful scenarios from a portfolio of over 4000 options together with a team of psychologists.



The result is a set of 156 beautifully designed scenario cards, which help you guide your self-reflection and trigger great conversations with people that you care about.






Scenario Cards are currently in production and will be shipped at the end of February. 

  • January 2021: Production
  • February 2021: Production & Start Fulfillment and Shipping
  • March 2021: All Products Fulfilled and Shipped.




Shipping costs will be charged separately, prior to shipping. ​

We will ship our product to every country in the world with Asendia from Singapore. You can find the estimated shipping costs in the table below. 

Note that your country's customs agency may determine you owe a duty or tax. It's the backer’s responsibility to pay these extra duties or taxes. They vary by country and are completely out of my control. This online tool can help you calculate potential additional costs.


 



Thank you Indiegogo!
Roel from Scenario Cards | hello@scenariocards.org

To uncover your purpose one must follow three steps. Hence we designed three packs.Pack 1: Your self - Look inward to get to know yourself better. 
Pack 2: Your life - Reflect on your life up to this point and set intentions for the time to come

Pack 3: Your world - Look out into your world and plan the new adventures you want to take on.With all three packs at hand you have a set of cards for every occasion, whether you are with your friends, family, your partner or your co-workers. We have spent a lot of time designing our cards into something truly beautiful and which invites for deep reflection.Pastel colors trigger you to get excited to set aside your fear of judgement and discover what is true for you, right now, in this moment. 6 uniquely designed dreaming faces represent the curiosity we all should have to explore how the people around us see the world, no matter their gender or ethnicity.When designs were ready, we made a selection of the 156 most powerful scenarios from a portfolio of over 4000 options together with a team of psychologists.The result is a set of 156 beautifully designed scenario cards, which help you guide your self-reflection and trigger great conversations with people that you care about.Scenario Cards are currently in production and will be shipped at the end of February. 
January 2021: Production
February 2021: Production & Start Fulfillment and Shipping
March 2021: All Products Fulfilled and Shipped.
Shipping costs will be charged separately, prior to shipping. ​We will ship our product to every country in the world with Asendia from Singapore. You can find the estimated shipping costs in the table below. Note that your country's customs agency may determine you owe a duty or tax. It's the backer’s responsibility to pay these extra duties or taxes. They vary by country and are completely out of my control. This online tool can help you calculate potential additional costs. Thank you Indiegogo!Roel from Scenario Cards | hello@scenariocards.org

story:
Our previous project on Kickstarter has already funded the Devil's Run Roleplaying Game core book: a lavish hardcover rulebook of approximately 320 pages that will empower both GMs and players alike with the ability to explore this post-apocalyptic setting in more detail than ever before. Pledging here will not only net you the relevant rewards for your chosen perk, but will also increase the overall funding goal to help unlock even more potential for both the setting and RPG! We are currently heading towards a 5e compatible variant of the core book.

The Devil's Run RPG core book will utilise the popular 2d20 ruleset - a lightweight system that seeks to seamlessly integrate story and action whilst keeping the game focussed on the players. The core book will not only greatly expand upon the factions that have already been introduced by the board games, but will also introduce several new ones. It will also delve further into the history of the setting, from the very Day of the Apocalypse to its current timeline, some twenty years later. Global affairs will also be explored, including a closer look at the new super powers that contend on the world stage.

Rather than act as two separate entities that share the same setting, part of our aim is to also provide as much cross-platform support as possible for the Devil's Run board game. We have introduced a new range of 20mm miniatures that can be used for either the RPG or board game. The RPG core book and any additional supplements funded will include sample board game stats for notable npcs, which means that play can easily flow between the two mediums - should you wish it to, of course.

Please note, however, that there is absolutely no need to pick up either the miniatures or the board game in order to enjoy the wild and explosive mayhem of the Devil's Run RPG! As a pen-and-paper game of post-apocalyptic storytelling, the RPG can be used to provide endless entertainment all on its own.

That's not all, however! As an added boost to the Devil's Run RPG, we will be providing dual support for both the 2d20 and Savage Worlds system. This means that NPCs will be provisioned with stats for both 2d20 and Savage Worlds, while full rules will be provided for faction-specific career packages and exciting new Edges that focus on vehicular carnage. Additionally, we will be exploring the provision of vehicles as Extras, which will allow for them to be developed and grow with the characters in a more dynamic form as the campaign develops.

Important Note: This game references the Savage Worlds game system, available from Pinnacle Entertainment Group at www.peginc.com. Savage Worlds and all associated logos and trademarks are copyrights of Pinnacle Entertainment Group. Used with permission. Pinnacle makes no representation or warranty as to the quality, viability, or suitability for purpose of this product.

In the world of the Devil's Run, a Cold War that had never thawed exploded into a nuclear exchange that forever altered the global stage and plunged the world into chaos. Russia and much of China disappeared in the wake of the first strike launched by the United States, but their retaliatory bombardments razed the East Coast and most of the central states. Spared widescale nuclear devastation, the population centres of the West Coast were instead subjected to the horrors of the Revenant Virus: a deadly and virulent chemical that creates rage-fuelled zombies out of the living.

Blind luck or the hand of the devil himself saved San Francisco from a fate worse than death on the Day of the Apocalypse. Although the city suffered its own wounds as a result of that tumultuous day, it rapidly became a haven for any survivors that could survive the journey to the so-called 'safe zone'. In the twenty years since, new factions that have risen from the ashes of the Old World have turned San Fran's streets into a hotly contested warzone as each vies for domination over the others.

To meet the initial humanitarian obligations that they set themselves, the other countries of the world continue to send aid packages north of the Mexican border that defines the Quarantine Zone. It is these air drops that most often send the factions into a frenzy of roaring engines and blazing guns as they seek to once again claim the prize of the Devil's Run.

If you're a fan of George Miller movies and shows such as the Walking Dead, then you're sure to love everything the Devil's Run RPG has to offer! Although the Revenants from those first days following the Day of the Apocalypse have long since turned to dust, the virus itself still poses a deadly risk, and that is something that we very much intend to explore with the introduction of factions such as the Los Nigromantes, amongst others.

You can read about Modiphius' popular 2d20 system by clicking anywhere here. Designed by Jay Little, the flexible system has provided the mechanical backdrop to many setting such as Star Trek Adventures, Conan Adventures in an Age Undreamed Of, Infinity the Roleplaying Game, Mutant Chronicles, and the forthcoming John Carter RPG.

Gain an overview of the Devil's Run board game and its Board Game Geek ratings by clicking anywhere here.

The perks here provide access to exactly the same pledge levels as those available during the Kickstarter campaign, including the unique standalone expansion to the board game specifically designed to support the RPG: Mile's Massacre. A short time after the crowdfunding finishes here, you will also be invited to a pledge manager that will provide access to a number of add-ons designed to support both the RPG and board game.

We'll charge shipping after the campaign closes using a pledge manager. Our close ties with Word Forge Games have allowed us to utilise their own tried and tested pledge manager, which means that there is minimal additional cost for us to calculate towards the funding goal in this regard (other pledge managers charge a percentage handling fee).

We are working with a well established fulfillment company to ensure that your products are delivered in a timely and cost-effective manner. It's possible, however, that these shipping prices may alter as better deals are achieved, so we will strive to keep you informed. Depending on what you order, the option of a single shipment or split shipments can also be offered. If you know someone that can share the costs, joint shipping is also a very good option we can offer to help alleviate the costs.

Shipping will commence in waves from the UK to the rest of the world, then use local hubs in the USA, Canada, and Australia to ensure costs remain as low as possible. If you would prefer to receive your items sooner, however, we are open to the possibility of arranging Airmail and collecting payment during the Pledge Manager, but please be aware that this will significantly increase your shipping costs.
