story:
We have now designed a special edition of "The Enigma Box" at a new, affordable price.

We will deliver in only 4 months!!! 

Enigma Box (vol. 1) could make a great Christmas gift for you or your loved ones! Languages: English, Spanish, French and German.

This challenging campaign is based on historical events and is full of enigmas and mysteries that will test your wits. We call on all adventurers, gamers, mystery-seekers, puzzle-solvers, and curious minds to immerse themselves in one of the biggest collection of enigmas ever. Using the most advanced technology you will travel to incredible locations around the world without ever leaving your front room.

We would like to present to you, Enigma Box "Arcanum", which brings back the experiences, games and enigmas from our previous campaign “The Enigma Box” but in a new format that is compact (Five scenarios) and affordable.

You can play on your own, with friends, or with anyone fit to face the challenge. It is designed and supported by world-class experts in the fields of technology, history and entertainment.

Corrections and Improvements

We have learned from experience and have made several improvements based on feedback from our backers:

  • Improved the texts, translations and explanations.
  • Corrected errors throughout the game and improved the riddles.

● Enjoy the ultimate gaming experience from the comfort of your home. Travel on an adventure across time and to far-off lands. This campaign uses the most advanced technology and delivers a collection of ancient riddles into the palm of your hand.

● Your goal is to decipher the mystery of the “Arcanum Arcanorum”, the Secret of Secrets, the unique item that will change the destiny of humankind.

● You will use the latest technology including virtual reality, augmented reality, 3D printing and more.

● This challenge will boost your mental dexterity and intuition, increase your world knowledge, encourage next-level thinking and enhance your problem-solving skills. Most importantly, you’ll have a great time!

● This is a game for people of all ages, genders and backgrounds. You do not need any prior skills or knowledge to fully enjoy the adventure.

 

Will history know your name?

The places, explorations and investigations in this game are based on real events.

Using our intuition, the latest technology, and a bit of luck, we uncovered hidden messages revealing the coordinates of a late 19th-century box buried in the French Pyrenees. What we found is part of an unprecedented discovery that allowed us to access knowledge, data and cryptograms belonging to a secret society.

With all-new research, enigmas and revelations, the team from “The Rhomb” has designed an international challenge and a new form of entertainment, revolutionizing gaming and creating a never-before-seen experience, giving you a chance to discover the “Arcanum Arcanorum,” the Secret of Secrets.

What is the PRESS saying?

We have appeared and been referenced internationally in the press and our projects and investigations have been shared millions of times on social media.

Some comments:

We invite you on an odyssey through a world full of plots and enigmas. This intense experience will take you to a number of exotic places without ever leaving your front room!

We do not wish to reveal all the secrets and mysteries of the box, as it hides many secret riddles and games that you will discover as you progress through the adventure. However, we want our players to be informed before joining this adventure.

 

Included:

The box contains all the elements of the Enigma Box "Arcanum" challenge that you will need to play. It also hides secrets and components that you must discover to solve other enigmas. It contains all the necessary tools to guide you as you progress through the adventure.

● Welcome pack (a card and letter from the Rhomb Society). The first thing you see will be the welcome letter, which provides access codes for the site and app, allowing you to unlock 3D scenes and virtual objects with your phone (iOS or Android).

● Booklet. The Arcanum book is a key element. Here you will find instructions on how to advance in the game, as well as hints, images, exclusive information, and everything else you will need to complete the adventure.

● More than 40 riddles and puzzles. The box contains over 40 riddles, including a Substitution Enigma, a Scylates tool, Chinese Shadows, and many more never-before-seen puzzles. You will need to discover and solve these either on your own or with your team.

● 15+ investigation tools and historical documents. You will find clues such as x-rays, passports, paintings and photos. Each of these elements forms part of one or more riddles. You must use your ingenuity to uncover how they fit together, when to use them, and how they will help you progress through the adventure.

● XXL Game Map with exclusive physical and virtual content. All great journeys and amazing tabletop games need a map. We have created a special map where you will find riddles and clues, and locate physical 2D figures you will use to build or depict diagrams. This is your base of operations, helping you move around the world as you try to unveil the Arcanum Arcanorum, the final secret hidden beneath the history, alchemy and astrology.

● Metaphysical and alchemical figures (2D). We have prepared a series of figures which will assist you with various challenges. Some are alchemical figures with symbols you must align, while others contain historical references, but they all serve a purpose that you must discover.

● Enigma cards. You will find different cards featuring challenges, characters and symbols that you must use when you find yourself stuck or want to learn more about the story.

● Five 360º places/scenes. You will also be able to unlock new areas and access new scenes by inserting the correct coordinates and keywords.

  •  Augmented Reality: With augmented reality, you will visualize virtual objects that will help you advance in the adventure. These elements are distributed throughout the game and can be found within the box and its components. Using it is simple: just scan a code and the "magic" of augmented reality will appear in front of your eyes.

The App

The box is an entry point into a journey to remote destinations where you will access confidential and exclusive information. To use these functions, you can download the app on your phone (iOS or Android) or access them via your computer.

For those seeking even greater prestige and fame or who wish to deepen their knowledge with exclusive information, we have designed the limited edition Enigma Box "Arcanum" Deluxe package. No more than 1033 units will be available!

The Enigma Box "Arcanum" Deluxe package contains the same elements as the original box plus several additions:

  •  Welcome card and membership card. 
  •  Advanced Riddles
                                                                                                   - Exclusive alchemy riddle
                                                                                                   - Labyrinth with advanced content
                                                                                                   - A 3 phase circular cryptogram

● Virtual reality (VR) glasses.  Each unlocked set of coordinates will allow you to access a specific place where you can investigate different scenarios. When using your (optional) VR glasses or computer, you will be transported there with 360º vision, allowing you to look all around for clues and riddles to move the adventure along.

IMPORTANT: Do I need to put on my virtual reality glasses? No, the glasses are optional , You can view the same content from your mobile phone (or computer) by moving into the same virtual environment.

● Metaphysical and alchemical figures (3D). A series of figures will assist you with the challenges. Some of them depict alchemical figures with symbols you must align, while others contain helpful historical references, but they all serve a purpose that you must discover.

● Historical documents. Unpublished images and photographs from the discovery of the box and its opening.

Exclusive Deluxe Content

“Jules Verne’s Secret." This scenario includes a treasure trove of exclusive content:

  •  Physical fragment of Jules Verne’s book dated back to 1879 with an accompanying riddle.
  • Cryptogram-based riddle created by Jules Verne.
  •  360° virtual environment of Jules Verne’s office. You will have the opportunity to investigate Jules Verne's office in a virtual environment where you will find secret compartments, documents, and more! 
  • Virtual object in augmented reality based on the novel From Earth to the Moon. 
  •  Scan file of Jules Verne’s tomb to investigate or print in 3D. 

We want to thank our backers for their support when we reach specific goals, so we will establish a system for unlocking new challenges, pieces, riddles, and 360º virtual spaces. This will enhance the experience and add a new dynamic to the game.

 

OTHER REWARDS

Historical Documents

You will receive a copy of the documents found in a box discovered in the French Pyrenees along with exclusive images, videos of the discovery, 360° photos taken during the investigation, and a file with a scan of Jules Verne’s tomb, which you can investigate closely or print in 3D.

 Jules Verne Mystery - Escape Room Online - 

Immerse yourself in an online adventure full of puzzles and riddles and reveal one of Jules Verne’s best-kept secrets. Virtual sets, surprising puzzles and historical revelations are waiting to be discovered.

Includes virtual reality scenarios, augmented reality objects and a virtual assistant for clues.

The objective is to find the “Arcanum Arcanorum,” the Secret of Secrets, hidden in a specific place in the world and kept there by powerful groups and secret societies.

To locate this object, you must use the Enigma Box (vol. 1), which contains the documents, maps, riddles and materials you will need to uncover the secret. You will need to apply your ingenuity and investigative skills to advance in this adventure, either on your own or with companions who may join you in your quest. You will also make use of the most advanced technology in the fields of virtual and augmented reality.

 How to play with our Board Game Map: 

 

 Check out some videos and reviews from our previous game “The Enigma Box."

 

 

We are offering you a radical game experience unlike any you’ve played before as you undertake this adventure from your own home. We have created an incredible story based on real events, with a gripping atmosphere, the most astonishing riddles, the most advanced technology, and the potential to go down in history.

Although you can play alone, your journey will be more enjoyable if you are accompanied by friends, as you can work together, help each other when you get stuck, share different perspectives and discover clues that you may have missed.

The clues and riddles contained in the box, along with the virtual worlds you can access using your computer or smartphone, will help you find coordinates and keywords to progress through the adventure. The provided booklet will guide you through each location in the world so you know exactly what to look for and which enigmas may be involved. However, not every detail is important. You will need to find the exact combinations of objects, riddles and information to solve the mystery.

Once you have all the numbers for a coordinate, you must enter them using the app or your computer. This will unlock a new spot in the world that you must investigate using virtual reality, counting on new content made available via augmented reality.

Your next objective is to find the place in the world that will unlock the next clue, using the 360º VR content and the riddles in the box. You must traverse the most mysterious places on the planet until you reach your final goal and discover just what the Arcanum Arcanorum really is.

The Enigma Box (vol. 1) instructions, booklet and welcome pack are written in English, German, Spanish and French and contain everything you’ll need to complete the adventure. The game relies mostly on visuals, rather than words, although some riddles and puzzles will have a few words in English only.

New technological trends have heralded great changes in the world around us and have opened up new possibilities for investigation techniques and video games. We embrace these developments to create a truly immersive adventure unlike any you’ve seen before.

We have fully incorporated VR technology and AR technology into the game. Enigma Box "Arcanum" uses an array of technology:

We only know how to develop one kind of game: THE BEST

It seems like an eternity to us but not so long ago (November 2017), we released The Enigma Box, an original and successful game that was a watershed in the market. The game combined the latest technology with research plots, mysteries and adventures, in a style similar to the pure concept of escape room.

Although the results of this first initiative were magnificent, we didn’t settle, because for us the only thing valuable is excellence. So we asked (a lot) and listened (much more) to our backers, fans and other people who tried The Enigma Box, who told us about their experiences, their proposals for improvement of the shape and background, and in short, any other matters that could help us continue to grow as a company and offer the best products possible. We had the opportunity to meet some of these individuals in person in Essen (at Spiel), and many others got in touch through various communication channels, but the conclusions were the same: great gaming satisfaction and hundreds of ideas to grow and improve. Thanks to the feedback, we have perfected our processes of design, production, logistics and even the gaming experience itself. We lack the words to thank our followers for everything they have shared with us.

Our games have been tested, not only by our backers, but also by multiple fans of Team Building activities and Escape Rooms where our unique gaming system was used. More than 700 companies have passed through our experiences, and we have helped more than 1,100 teams to communicate, have fun and grow together. Among others, these companies include Coca-Cola, Leroy, GE, DKV, DHL, Mars, Oracle, Microsoft, Telefonica and Ikea.

The whole team has worked intensely and uninterruptedly to create this great product, innovative and entertaining, offering people an opportunity to experience the new and undiscovered; awakening their intuitions and developing new skills such as reflection and dexterity; increasing their understanding of the world and improving their general knowledge; and helping them dream of new opportunities in an infinite world of possibilities.

We are a team of professional experts in graphic adventures, challenges and logical game design, with more than 20 years of experience and international recognition in products based on new technologies. This combination of people, multidisciplinary experience and training together with market knowledge places The Enigma Box vol.1 ® in an unbeatable position to become The Next Big Thing in entertainment systems. Exclusive on Kickstarter!

We have designed all the documents, pieces of art and riddles. We have also developed 3D and augmented reality technology for fully interactable virtual reality objects. We have closed a deal with different manufacturers and providers outlining the start of production with moulds and templates. We plan to make first deliveries to our customers in Oct 2020 (Estimated).

As you can see from the videos and images, we have a box: “Enigma Box” vol.1 ®, which is fully functional. We have designed all the documents, pieces of art and riddles. Production of the box is not a problem, in addition to the money accumulated from Kickstarter, we can count on access to various venture capital funds to allow us to create an even higher quality experience.

The box will be limited to this campaign and we plan to offer additional purchases in the next months at a 20% premium on the initial campaign offer. This guarantees that the adventure and the objects of the box remain exclusive for a long period of time. 

We only have to produce and create the number of units which this launch will gather. We plan to make first deliveries to our customer in Oct 2020.

 We would like to present to you our new adventure, Enigma Box (vol. 1), which brings back the experiences, games, and enigmas from our previous campaign “The Enigma Box” but in a new format that is compact and affordable.

Why have we made these changes? We wanted to share the Enigma Box gaming experience with as many people as possible, so we reduced the game’s price and duration (there are now only 5 complete scenarios) while maintaining the original version’s intensity, excitement, technological features and mysteries.

Corrections and Improvements

We have learned from experience and have made several improvements based on feedback from our backers: 

  • Improved the texts, translations and explanations.
  • Corrected errors throughout the game and improved the riddles
 
 

Until today, The Rhomb ® membership was carefully curated for specific functions and objectives. Our members come from different countries, cultures, and backgrounds, including universities, exclusive clubs, or investigation centers. We always rely on the latest technology and advances in historical research to discover events that were left unresolved and unexplained.

This project was launched with the support of teams from London and Madrid. We have been receiving help and guidance from expert historians, as well as explorers, high-caliber designers, engineers, technologists, and scientists. We have relied on international investment companies to back the project and guarantee its success.

At The Rhomb ®, we have a passion for a job well done. We take pride in our finished products and aspire to the highest standards of quality, having attended meticulously to the smallest details. Each piece is a carefully designed and crafted component of the box and is presented as a work of art. All parts of the Enigma Box come together to create a masterpiece, an object that should be displayed in a museum, which is precisely what we did with The Enigma Box ®.

We are experts in adventures, challenges, and designing logic games. Our team has years of experience in graphic arts and includes international leaders in designing new technology. We depend on respected historians who have unveiled new tests, documents, and amazing discoveries that have not yet been made public. This combination of people and resources makes Enigma Box (vol. 1) ® a unique experience available exclusively via Kickstarter. We believe this will be the next big thing in entertainment and our goal is to make this project one of the most amazing campaigns ever launched on this platform.

 Will you help us create this challenge?
Will you be a part of history? 

Risks and challenges

We have already carried out a Kickstarter campaign in the past that we delivered successfully, and that experience helped us understand better the whole process of product creation, manufacturing and shipping logistics. We were aware of all possible risks while creating a new product, so you can be sure that our project has been undertaken by professionals who did their best to keep it free from mistakes. We have extensive experience in launching games, Escape Rooms, puzzles and also in the management of new technologies. There is a risk that we will have to implement some modifications during manufacturing, and this might happen mainly due to the following reasons: ● Creativity: When using some original documents and historical elements from the public domain, it may occur that for copyright reasons we have to change some creativity. ● Sizes, formats and qualities: We already have found several suppliers of the materials, as seen in the prototypes. We have agreed on sizes and qualities, but there is a risk that during the mass production process some formats might need to be slightly modified due to the manufacturing process. We will do our best to keep everything under control and to make sure that the final product will not be significantly affected.

 

IMPORTANT NOTE: Our experience tells us that we will need around 3-4 months to finalize the production. We believe we will be able to deliver on time for Christmas 2020, but we can't commit 100% as we rely on more than seven different providers so some delays may occur. It will also depend on the pace of production as well as the freight companies. But we'll do everything we can to deliver on time.

IMPORTANT: Intellectual property and copyright In the research, design, development and production of Enigma Box, we have made use of different elements, images and historical documents. We have maintained maximum rigor, ensuring that all elements are in the public domain. We have acquired the rights to certain images and visuals, as well as ensured that the copyrights of the elements used have expired. Challenges The hardest part is done, however, as plans and materials are ready for mass production. Our products have a variety of materials and objects and should any not be available when production begins, be it due to lack of stock or discontinuation, it will be replaced with a similar item. By pledging on this Kickstarter you acknowledge that the final look and contents of the pledges may change and differ from what is presented at the start of the campaign.

We have estimated the delivery for Oct 2020 but please understand this is only an estimate. Due to the global logistics involved in shipping, some regions may receive their pledges sooner than others. We are prepared with our production as much as possible, however we will refund pledges if for some unforeseen reason the game cannot be delivered at all. We will be unable to refund the charges incurred by Kickstarter and Pledge Manager or other charges for your payment (PayPal, VISA, credit card...). This represents approximately 15% of the full payment. We will be unable to refund you the charges incurred by Kickstarter and Pledge Manager or other charges for your payment (PayPal, VISA, credit card...).

This represents approximately 15% of the full payment. This project is being funded in EUROS and any refunds will be also processed in EUROS. Terms and Conditions We’ve been consulting our manufacturer and shipping company about reducing the box's weight to keep the shipping costs down. In order to make sure that these costs are as low as possible we will be charging shipping after the campaign ends. Backers will gain access to our Pledge Manager by email roughly one-two months after this campaigns completion.

Unfortunately, due to customs regulations, we are not able to ship to Afghanistan, Ukraine or Kazakhstan. You agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information, and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret that we are unable to ship to PO Boxes. If you do not accept the proposed terms please do not pledge on this Kickstarter project and wait for the global general release
story_txt:
We have now designed a special edition of "The Enigma Box" at a new, affordable price.
We will deliver in only 4 months!!! 
Enigma Box (vol. 1) could make a great Christmas gift for you or your loved ones! Languages: English, Spanish, French and German.
This challenging campaign is based on historical events and is full of enigmas and mysteries that will test your wits. We call on all adventurers, gamers, mystery-seekers, puzzle-solvers, and curious minds to immerse themselves in one of the biggest collection of enigmas ever. Using the most advanced technology you will travel to incredible locations around the world without ever leaving your front room.

We would like to present to you, Enigma Box "Arcanum", which brings back the experiences, games and enigmas from our previous campaign “The Enigma Box” but in a new format that is compact (Five scenarios) and affordable.
You can play on your own, with friends, or with anyone fit to face the challenge. It is designed and supported by world-class experts in the fields of technology, history and entertainment.
Corrections and Improvements
We have learned from experience and have made several improvements based on feedback from our backers:

Improved the texts, translations and explanations.
Corrected errors throughout the game and improved the riddles.


● Enjoy the ultimate gaming experience from the comfort of your home. Travel on an adventure across time and to far-off lands. This campaign uses the most advanced technology and delivers a collection of ancient riddles into the palm of your hand.
● Your goal is to decipher the mystery of the “Arcanum Arcanorum”, the Secret of Secrets, the unique item that will change the destiny of humankind.

● You will use the latest technology including virtual reality, augmented reality, 3D printing and more.

● This challenge will boost your mental dexterity and intuition, increase your world knowledge, encourage next-level thinking and enhance your problem-solving skills. Most importantly, you’ll have a great time!
● This is a game for people of all ages, genders and backgrounds. You do not need any prior skills or knowledge to fully enjoy the adventure.
 
Will history know your name?

The places, explorations and investigations in this game are based on real events.
Using our intuition, the latest technology, and a bit of luck, we uncovered hidden messages revealing the coordinates of a late 19th-century box buried in the French Pyrenees. What we found is part of an unprecedented discovery that allowed us to access knowledge, data and cryptograms belonging to a secret society.

With all-new research, enigmas and revelations, the team from “The Rhomb” has designed an international challenge and a new form of entertainment, revolutionizing gaming and creating a never-before-seen experience, giving you a chance to discover the “Arcanum Arcanorum,” the Secret of Secrets.
What is the PRESS saying?
We have appeared and been referenced internationally in the press and our projects and investigations have been shared millions of times on social media.
Some comments:



We invite you on an odyssey through a world full of plots and enigmas. This intense experience will take you to a number of exotic places without ever leaving your front room!

We do not wish to reveal all the secrets and mysteries of the box, as it hides many secret riddles and games that you will discover as you progress through the adventure. However, we want our players to be informed before joining this adventure.
 Included:
The box contains all the elements of the Enigma Box "Arcanum" challenge that you will need to play. It also hides secrets and components that you must discover to solve other enigmas. It contains all the necessary tools to guide you as you progress through the adventure.
● Welcome pack (a card and letter from the Rhomb Society). The first thing you see will be the welcome letter, which provides access codes for the site and app, allowing you to unlock 3D scenes and virtual objects with your phone (iOS or Android).

● Booklet. The Arcanum book is a key element. Here you will find instructions on how to advance in the game, as well as hints, images, exclusive information, and everything else you will need to complete the adventure.

● More than 40 riddles and puzzles. The box contains over 40 riddles, including a Substitution Enigma, a Scylates tool, Chinese Shadows, and many more never-before-seen puzzles. You will need to discover and solve these either on your own or with your team.

● 15+ investigation tools and historical documents. You will find clues such as x-rays, passports, paintings and photos. Each of these elements forms part of one or more riddles. You must use your ingenuity to uncover how they fit together, when to use them, and how they will help you progress through the adventure.

● XXL Game Map with exclusive physical and virtual content. All great journeys and amazing tabletop games need a map. We have created a special map where you will find riddles and clues, and locate physical 2D figures you will use to build or depict diagrams. This is your base of operations, helping you move around the world as you try to unveil the Arcanum Arcanorum, the final secret hidden beneath the history, alchemy and astrology.

● Metaphysical and alchemical figures (2D). We have prepared a series of figures which will assist you with various challenges. Some are alchemical figures with symbols you must align, while others contain historical references, but they all serve a purpose that you must discover.

● Enigma cards. You will find different cards featuring challenges, characters and symbols that you must use when you find yourself stuck or want to learn more about the story.

● Five 360º places/scenes. You will also be able to unlock new areas and access new scenes by inserting the correct coordinates and keywords.

 Augmented Reality: With augmented reality, you will visualize virtual objects that will help you advance in the adventure. These elements are distributed throughout the game and can be found within the box and its components. Using it is simple: just scan a code and the "magic" of augmented reality will appear in front of your eyes.

The App
The box is an entry point into a journey to remote destinations where you will access confidential and exclusive information. To use these functions, you can download the app on your phone (iOS or Android) or access them via your computer.




For those seeking even greater prestige and fame or who wish to deepen their knowledge with exclusive information, we have designed the limited edition Enigma Box "Arcanum" Deluxe package. No more than 1033 units will be available!
The Enigma Box "Arcanum" Deluxe package contains the same elements as the original box plus several additions:



 Welcome card and membership card. 
 Advanced Riddles                                                                                               - Exclusive alchemy riddle                                                                                               - Labyrinth with advanced content                                                                                               - A 3 phase circular cryptogram

● Virtual reality (VR) glasses.  Each unlocked set of coordinates will allow you to access a specific place where you can investigate different scenarios. When using your (optional) VR glasses or computer, you will be transported there with 360º vision, allowing you to look all around for clues and riddles to move the adventure along.

IMPORTANT: Do I need to put on my virtual reality glasses? No, the glasses are optional , You can view the same content from your mobile phone (or computer) by moving into the same virtual environment.
● Metaphysical and alchemical figures (3D). A series of figures will assist you with the challenges. Some of them depict alchemical figures with symbols you must align, while others contain helpful historical references, but they all serve a purpose that you must discover.

● Historical documents. Unpublished images and photographs from the discovery of the box and its opening.

Exclusive Deluxe Content
“Jules Verne’s Secret." This scenario includes a treasure trove of exclusive content:

 Physical fragment of Jules Verne’s book dated back to 1879 with an accompanying riddle.
Cryptogram-based riddle created by Jules Verne.
 360° virtual environment of Jules Verne’s office. You will have the opportunity to investigate Jules Verne's office in a virtual environment where you will find secret compartments, documents, and more! 
Virtual object in augmented reality based on the novel From Earth to the Moon. 
 Scan file of Jules Verne’s tomb to investigate or print in 3D. 


We want to thank our backers for their support when we reach specific goals, so we will establish a system for unlocking new challenges, pieces, riddles, and 360º virtual spaces. This will enhance the experience and add a new dynamic to the game.

 OTHER REWARDS
Historical Documents
You will receive a copy of the documents found in a box discovered in the French Pyrenees along with exclusive images, videos of the discovery, 360° photos taken during the investigation, and a file with a scan of Jules Verne’s tomb, which you can investigate closely or print in 3D.

 Jules Verne Mystery - Escape Room Online - 
Immerse yourself in an online adventure full of puzzles and riddles and reveal one of Jules Verne’s best-kept secrets. Virtual sets, surprising puzzles and historical revelations are waiting to be discovered.
Includes virtual reality scenarios, augmented reality objects and a virtual assistant for clues.



The objective is to find the “Arcanum Arcanorum,” the Secret of Secrets, hidden in a specific place in the world and kept there by powerful groups and secret societies.



To locate this object, you must use the Enigma Box (vol. 1), which contains the documents, maps, riddles and materials you will need to uncover the secret. You will need to apply your ingenuity and investigative skills to advance in this adventure, either on your own or with companions who may join you in your quest. You will also make use of the most advanced technology in the fields of virtual and augmented reality.
 How to play with our Board Game Map: 
 


 Check out some videos and reviews from our previous game “The Enigma Box."



 

 

We are offering you a radical game experience unlike any you’ve played before as you undertake this adventure from your own home. We have created an incredible story based on real events, with a gripping atmosphere, the most astonishing riddles, the most advanced technology, and the potential to go down in history.

Although you can play alone, your journey will be more enjoyable if you are accompanied by friends, as you can work together, help each other when you get stuck, share different perspectives and discover clues that you may have missed.



The clues and riddles contained in the box, along with the virtual worlds you can access using your computer or smartphone, will help you find coordinates and keywords to progress through the adventure. The provided booklet will guide you through each location in the world so you know exactly what to look for and which enigmas may be involved. However, not every detail is important. You will need to find the exact combinations of objects, riddles and information to solve the mystery.
Once you have all the numbers for a coordinate, you must enter them using the app or your computer. This will unlock a new spot in the world that you must investigate using virtual reality, counting on new content made available via augmented reality.

Your next objective is to find the place in the world that will unlock the next clue, using the 360º VR content and the riddles in the box. You must traverse the most mysterious places on the planet until you reach your final goal and discover just what the Arcanum Arcanorum really is.
The Enigma Box (vol. 1) instructions, booklet and welcome pack are written in English, German, Spanish and French and contain everything you’ll need to complete the adventure. The game relies mostly on visuals, rather than words, although some riddles and puzzles will have a few words in English only.


New technological trends have heralded great changes in the world around us and have opened up new possibilities for investigation techniques and video games. We embrace these developments to create a truly immersive adventure unlike any you’ve seen before.
We have fully incorporated VR technology and AR technology into the game. Enigma Box "Arcanum" uses an array of technology:



We only know how to develop one kind of game: THE BEST
It seems like an eternity to us but not so long ago (November 2017), we released The Enigma Box, an original and successful game that was a watershed in the market. The game combined the latest technology with research plots, mysteries and adventures, in a style similar to the pure concept of escape room.

Although the results of this first initiative were magnificent, we didn’t settle, because for us the only thing valuable is excellence. So we asked (a lot) and listened (much more) to our backers, fans and other people who tried The Enigma Box, who told us about their experiences, their proposals for improvement of the shape and background, and in short, any other matters that could help us continue to grow as a company and offer the best products possible. We had the opportunity to meet some of these individuals in person in Essen (at Spiel), and many others got in touch through various communication channels, but the conclusions were the same: great gaming satisfaction and hundreds of ideas to grow and improve. Thanks to the feedback, we have perfected our processes of design, production, logistics and even the gaming experience itself. We lack the words to thank our followers for everything they have shared with us.

Our games have been tested, not only by our backers, but also by multiple fans of Team Building activities and Escape Rooms where our unique gaming system was used. More than 700 companies have passed through our experiences, and we have helped more than 1,100 teams to communicate, have fun and grow together. Among others, these companies include Coca-Cola, Leroy, GE, DKV, DHL, Mars, Oracle, Microsoft, Telefonica and Ikea.
The whole team has worked intensely and uninterruptedly to create this great product, innovative and entertaining, offering people an opportunity to experience the new and undiscovered; awakening their intuitions and developing new skills such as reflection and dexterity; increasing their understanding of the world and improving their general knowledge; and helping them dream of new opportunities in an infinite world of possibilities.
We are a team of professional experts in graphic adventures, challenges and logical game design, with more than 20 years of experience and international recognition in products based on new technologies. This combination of people, multidisciplinary experience and training together with market knowledge places The Enigma Box vol.1 ® in an unbeatable position to become The Next Big Thing in entertainment systems. Exclusive on Kickstarter!
We have designed all the documents, pieces of art and riddles. We have also developed 3D and augmented reality technology for fully interactable virtual reality objects. We have closed a deal with different manufacturers and providers outlining the start of production with moulds and templates. We plan to make first deliveries to our customers in Oct 2020 (Estimated).
As you can see from the videos and images, we have a box: “Enigma Box” vol.1 ®, which is fully functional. We have designed all the documents, pieces of art and riddles. Production of the box is not a problem, in addition to the money accumulated from Kickstarter, we can count on access to various venture capital funds to allow us to create an even higher quality experience.

The box will be limited to this campaign and we plan to offer additional purchases in the next months at a 20% premium on the initial campaign offer. This guarantees that the adventure and the objects of the box remain exclusive for a long period of time. 
We only have to produce and create the number of units which this launch will gather. We plan to make first deliveries to our customer in Oct 2020.

 We would like to present to you our new adventure, Enigma Box (vol. 1), which brings back the experiences, games, and enigmas from our previous campaign “The Enigma Box” but in a new format that is compact and affordable.
Why have we made these changes? We wanted to share the Enigma Box gaming experience with as many people as possible, so we reduced the game’s price and duration (there are now only 5 complete scenarios) while maintaining the original version’s intensity, excitement, technological features and mysteries.
Corrections and Improvements
We have learned from experience and have made several improvements based on feedback from our backers: 

Improved the texts, translations and explanations.
Corrected errors throughout the game and improved the riddles
  



Until today, The Rhomb ® membership was carefully curated for specific functions and objectives. Our members come from different countries, cultures, and backgrounds, including universities, exclusive clubs, or investigation centers. We always rely on the latest technology and advances in historical research to discover events that were left unresolved and unexplained.

This project was launched with the support of teams from London and Madrid. We have been receiving help and guidance from expert historians, as well as explorers, high-caliber designers, engineers, technologists, and scientists. We have relied on international investment companies to back the project and guarantee its success.
At The Rhomb ®, we have a passion for a job well done. We take pride in our finished products and aspire to the highest standards of quality, having attended meticulously to the smallest details. Each piece is a carefully designed and crafted component of the box and is presented as a work of art. All parts of the Enigma Box come together to create a masterpiece, an object that should be displayed in a museum, which is precisely what we did with The Enigma Box ®.
We are experts in adventures, challenges, and designing logic games. Our team has years of experience in graphic arts and includes international leaders in designing new technology. We depend on respected historians who have unveiled new tests, documents, and amazing discoveries that have not yet been made public. This combination of people and resources makes Enigma Box (vol. 1) ® a unique experience available exclusively via Kickstarter. We believe this will be the next big thing in entertainment and our goal is to make this project one of the most amazing campaigns ever launched on this platform.
 Will you help us create this challenge?Will you be a part of history? 
Risks and challenges
We have already carried out a Kickstarter campaign in the past that we delivered successfully, and that experience helped us understand better the whole process of product creation, manufacturing and shipping logistics. We were aware of all possible risks while creating a new product, so you can be sure that our project has been undertaken by professionals who did their best to keep it free from mistakes. We have extensive experience in launching games, Escape Rooms, puzzles and also in the management of new technologies. There is a risk that we will have to implement some modifications during manufacturing, and this might happen mainly due to the following reasons: ● Creativity: When using some original documents and historical elements from the public domain, it may occur that for copyright reasons we have to change some creativity. ● Sizes, formats and qualities: We already have found several suppliers of the materials, as seen in the prototypes. We have agreed on sizes and qualities, but there is a risk that during the mass production process some formats might need to be slightly modified due to the manufacturing process. We will do our best to keep everything under control and to make sure that the final product will not be significantly affected.
 
IMPORTANT NOTE: Our experience tells us that we will need around 3-4 months to finalize the production. We believe we will be able to deliver on time for Christmas 2020, but we can't commit 100% as we rely on more than seven different providers so some delays may occur. It will also depend on the pace of production as well as the freight companies. But we'll do everything we can to deliver on time.
IMPORTANT: Intellectual property and copyright In the research, design, development and production of Enigma Box, we have made use of different elements, images and historical documents. We have maintained maximum rigor, ensuring that all elements are in the public domain. We have acquired the rights to certain images and visuals, as well as ensured that the copyrights of the elements used have expired. Challenges The hardest part is done, however, as plans and materials are ready for mass production. Our products have a variety of materials and objects and should any not be available when production begins, be it due to lack of stock or discontinuation, it will be replaced with a similar item. By pledging on this Kickstarter you acknowledge that the final look and contents of the pledges may change and differ from what is presented at the start of the campaign.
We have estimated the delivery for Oct 2020 but please understand this is only an estimate. Due to the global logistics involved in shipping, some regions may receive their pledges sooner than others. We are prepared with our production as much as possible, however we will refund pledges if for some unforeseen reason the game cannot be delivered at all. We will be unable to refund the charges incurred by Kickstarter and Pledge Manager or other charges for your payment (PayPal, VISA, credit card...). This represents approximately 15% of the full payment. We will be unable to refund you the charges incurred by Kickstarter and Pledge Manager or other charges for your payment (PayPal, VISA, credit card...).
This represents approximately 15% of the full payment. This project is being funded in EUROS and any refunds will be also processed in EUROS. Terms and Conditions We’ve been consulting our manufacturer and shipping company about reducing the box's weight to keep the shipping costs down. In order to make sure that these costs are as low as possible we will be charging shipping after the campaign ends. Backers will gain access to our Pledge Manager by email roughly one-two months after this campaigns completion.
Unfortunately, due to customs regulations, we are not able to ship to Afghanistan, Ukraine or Kazakhstan. You agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information, and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret that we are unable to ship to PO Boxes. If you do not accept the proposed terms please do not pledge on this Kickstarter project and wait for the global general release

story:
The Prophecy of Nine Omens Trilogy contains three classic fantasy adventures for the fifth edition of the world’s largest roleplaying game.

You’ll get a book with the following adventures and compendium:
➛ No Honour Among Thieves
➛ Sea Monsters ahead, Captain!
➛ The Sunken Temple of Sirenholm
➛ The Brave Adventurer’s Guide with all unlocked stretch goals
➛ Bonus: You’ll get a special mention in the book!

We’ll also include free VTT tokens, gridless maps, and digital handouts so that the adventures can easily be played online.  

This project is fully funded thanks to our amazing backers and we’re now unlocking epic stretch goals! :)    

The Prophecy of Nine Omens Trilogy will be approximately 160 pages if all stretch goals are unlocked, and available in hardcover, softcover, and digital format.
The adventures are designed for characters of level 10 to 12, but includes scalable encounters to suit any level from 1 to 20.

The Brave Adventurer’s Guide will contain new monsters, magical items, spells, and more. It will also feature unlocked stretch goals and be available to all backers.

This book is created by Midnight Tower, the two nerds who brought you Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy, What happened to Evy Ashwood? and Before the Stroke of Midnight.

Join us on our epic journey!
All aboard!       

The Prophecy of Nine Omens has foretold that three legendary orbstones will cause death and destruction throughout Eastern Farraway.
The orbstones must be destroyed to avert the prophecy and stop the cataclysm.

You have to cunningly steal the orbs from a heavily protected vault and transport them across the sea to the secret location of the sunken city of Sirenholm. Only there, in the heart of the underwater Temple of Tanaaris, can the orbstones be obliterated.

Gather your companions. Bring your swords. Choose your spells wisely.
Are you ready to save Eastern Farraway?  

➛ Three classic adventures with exciting quests and magical treasures!
➛ Approximately 160 pages of content (if all stretch goals are unlocked)
➛ New monsters: Arcane Sentinel, Marauder, and Horrifying Jellyfish
➛ Plenty of illustrated and detailed NPCs with personal background descriptions, including traits, ideals, bonds, and flaws.
➛ Unique magical items such as The Emerald Crown, Njǫrd’s Bow, and Gift of Malgonath.
➛ More than 90 full-colour illustrations and original artworks, including professional commissions from Alaina Milare (Empyrean Investigations and Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy)
➛ Legend & Lore: The Prophecy of Nine Omens, the White Watchers, and the Temple of Tanaaris
➛ High-quality maps created by cartographers such as Dark Realm Maps and Lizard Ink Maps
➛ The Brave Adventurer’s Guide featuring all unlocked stretch goals and more
➛ VTT pack with tokens, gridless maps, and digital handouts for online gaming
     

The book will be filled with NPCs that the players can interact with. Several NPCs will be illustrated by Alaina Milare, the artist behind the NPC portraits in Before the Stroke of Midnight and other books by Midnight Tower.

This is our fifth campaign and thanks to our amazing backers all of our previous projects have been successful.

We’re really excited to share this new project with you, and we’ve been working hard day and night to create the book. The adventures have been playtested together with a gaming group, and we had a lot of fun during the sessions, so we can’t wait to share these adventures with you!

We now kindly ask for funding to cover production costs to make this book truly epic!
The production costs include commissioned maps ($1,100), beautiful illustrations ($330), covers ($250), print design and artwork ($500), and professional proofreading ($150).

The more funding we get, the better the adventures and the compendium will be, and the more art commissions we’ll be able to afford – which in turn will support other fantasy artists! :) 

The book will include several hand-drawn and watercolour maps by Toby Lancaster from Dark Realm Maps, for example the strange Temple of Tanaaris.

The book will contain plenty of unique magical items too, for example The Emerald Crown, Njǫrd’s Bow, and Gift of Malgonath.

We’ll also include free VTT pack with tokens, gridless maps, and digital handouts so that the adventures can easily be played online.
The digital pack includes +30 VTT tokens, 10 gridless maps, and over 15 handouts including NPC portraits, monsters and magical items. Great for online gaming!

An example of some of the VTT tokens that will be included in the digital virtual tabletop pack. In total over 30 tokens will be added to the adventures.

All maps come in four different versions: Gridless (perfect for online gaming), square grid, hexagon grid, and printer-friendly black and white versions. Some of the maps will also be available for the DM (with numbers, secret doors, and traps) and for Players without additional information.

We love local game shops and offer greatly discounted prices to retailers with a brick-and-mortar store. Midnight Tower’s roleplaying books are available at The Gaming Goat (US), The Shop on the Borderlands (UK), Science Fiction Bokhandeln (Sweden), Dillbergs (Sweden), DoDragaoGaming (US), 3 Trolls Games & Puzzles (US), The Jousting Yeti (US), and others.

We offer a heavily discounted price if you order five or more copies of the book.
You also get the option to order previously released titles by Midnight Tower. This pledge is for retailers with a brick-and-mortar shop. You must have a physical location where you sell books or roleplaying games.

Select this reward tier to participate in the campaign and we’ll contact you with more information. 

Previous books by Midnight Tower that have been successfully funded.

Instagram: www.instagram.com/midnighttowerrpg/
Twitter: twitter.com/Midnight_Tower
Facebook: www.facebook.com/midnighttoweroxford/
Website: www.midnight-tower.com
More roleplaying adventures by Midnight Tower are available here!

➛ Join us and get Octavia Dragonborn’s Compendium for free:
midnight-tower.com/join-the-tower/

➛ Help us spread the word about the campaign on social media! (Doing this guarantees a significant increase in natural 20 rolls the next time you play. True story!)

Tove is a highly introverted geek (level 7, lawful neutral). She writes the main part of the adventures and does a lot of art for Midnight Tower.
Erik is a bookish nerd (level 6, chaotic good). He does much of the graphic design and edits the adventures for Midnight Tower.

Tove and Erik live in Oxford (UK) together with their rebellious daughters and a small menagerie of pets, including two sarcastic cats, a tiny pseudodragon (leopard gecko), and a springer spaniel with a lazy eye.

For this project, Midnight Tower is collaborating with the talented illustrator Alaina Milare, the amazing cartographer Toby Lancaster from Dark Realm Maps, and eagle-eyed proofreader Pauline Nolet.

With your support, we can commission an amazing book cover like this. (Cover art by Alaina Milare for The Secrets of the Drow Trilogy.)

Here is what other people have said about Midnight Tower’s previous adventures:

‘This is super exciting!!! I can’t wait to dive into reading the adventure. Thanks for the great work you’ve done. Just a quick scroll through and the quality looks great!’
     — Joshua D Garcia (Superbacker)

‘Wow, I quickly skimmed the contents after downloading and I’m so happy with it! I can’t wait to find a group to run this for. For the price, it’s such a great value and you really went above and beyond.’
     — Karen Petrasko (backer)

'Rise of the Ice Dragons is a wonderful adventure that provides a lot of different parts that are entertaining for every kind of player and group. The story is easy to follow and to prepare for DM’s. It includes a bunch of interesting encounters, monsters and NPC’s and still is open enough to add your own things to it.
The maps are nicely drawn and are always an eye-catcher at the table.
And the best part is that the players actually get to see dragons in game!'
    — Hoard Of Tales, D&D5e Actualplay Livestream
          https://www.twitch.tv/hoardoftales (@hoard_of_tales)

‘The quality of the illustrations are no exception and blend perfectly with the style of this work. Some images may even make you want to reuse them for other campaigns, as well. I have been glad to discover that the aesthetics of Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy are simply gorgeous. The first thing you notice is a sturdy, hard cover protecting the volume, providing the usual and necessary basic information about the work itself. The pages inside are thick, with a pleasant feel; their color is similar to that of parchment, but without impeding legibility.’
     — Andy Lingua (No Dice Unrolled)
         Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy Review 

To ensure that backers pay the lowest price possible, additional costs for printing and shipping charged by DriveThruRPG are not included in hardcover and softcover pledge rewards.

Additional estimated cost for physical books:
Softcover book: $17
Hardcover book: $22

Estimated shipping cost examples:
US: $5 ⎜ UK: $6  ⎜ Germany: $8 ⎜ France: $9  ⎜ Australia: $12

There are no additional printing or shipping costs for digital rewards.

Explorer (Low Income)
Digital Copy - Pledge £5

You get the same reward and products as the £10 Adventurer Tier.
This is the option for anyone who doesn’t have that much money. (For example, if you’re a student, on benefits, retired, or just struggle economically.) This is also the option for NHS, hospital and care home staff, first responders, and veterans, as we would like to show our support to you.        

Adventurer
Digital Copy - Pledge £10

You get high-resolution PDF copies in full colour of all of the three adventures in The Prophecy of Nine Omens Trilogy and The Brave Adventurer’s Guide with all unlocked stretch goals.

Swashbuckler
Softcover Book and PDF - Pledge £20

You get digital copies of the adventures and the compendium with the option to buy a print-on-demand softcover book at the minimal cost of printing and shipping. (Estimated cost: $22 depending on country, see the FAQ for more information.)

The book is printed in full colour on premium paper with perfect binding. It includes the three adventures in The Prophecy of Nine Omens Trilogy and The Brave Adventurer’s Guide with all unlocked stretch goals.

Hero
Hardcover Book and PDF - Pledge £20

You get digital copies of the adventures and the compendium with the option to buy a print-on-demand hardcover book at the minimal cost of printing and shipping.
(Estimated cost: $27 depending on country, see the FAQ for more information.)

The book is printed in full colour on premium paper with case binding. It includes the three adventures in The Prophecy of Nine Omens Trilogy and The Brave Adventurer’s Guide with all unlocked stretch goals.  

Merchant
5 Hardcover Books - Pledge £100

This pledge is for retailers with a brick-and-mortar shop. You must have a physical location where you sell books or roleplaying games.

We offer a heavily discounted price if you order five or more copies of the book.
You also get the option to order previously released titles by Midnight Tower.

There are no additional printing costs for this pledge, but shipping is not included.

We’ll contact you about your shipping address after you have chosen this tier.

Risks and challenges

This is Midnight Tower’s fifth campaign, and all of our previous campaigns have been successful thanks to our amazing backers!!! The adventures have already been written and playtested. We’re collaborating with DriveThruRPG for the printed versions of the book. We’ve partnered with them before and are really happy with the results – the books look great!

We’ve learned to always add extra time to our schedule, and so far all of our projects have been fully delivered. Having said that, sometimes there have been a few delays due to unforeseen circumstances. (For example: An untimely broken wrist, the coronavirus pandemic, Brexit, a freakish snowstorm in Spain…we have seen and weathered it all.)

Thank you for considering backing Midnight Tower’s Epic Campaign! :)
story_txt: The Prophecy of Nine Omens Trilogy contains three classic fantasy adventures for the fifth edition of the world’s largest roleplaying game.You’ll get a book with the following adventures and compendium:➛ No Honour Among Thieves➛ Sea Monsters ahead, Captain!➛ The Sunken Temple of Sirenholm➛ The Brave Adventurer’s Guide with all unlocked stretch goals➛ Bonus: You’ll get a special mention in the book!We’ll also include free VTT tokens, gridless maps, and digital handouts so that the adventures can easily be played online.  This project is fully funded thanks to our amazing backers and we’re now unlocking epic stretch goals! :)    The Prophecy of Nine Omens Trilogy will be approximately 160 pages if all stretch goals are unlocked, and available in hardcover, softcover, and digital format.The adventures are designed for characters of level 10 to 12, but includes scalable encounters to suit any level from 1 to 20.The Brave Adventurer’s Guide will contain new monsters, magical items, spells, and more. It will also feature unlocked stretch goals and be available to all backers.This book is created by Midnight Tower, the two nerds who brought you Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy, What happened to Evy Ashwood? and Before the Stroke of Midnight.Join us on our epic journey!All aboard!       The Prophecy of Nine Omens has foretold that three legendary orbstones will cause death and destruction throughout Eastern Farraway.The orbstones must be destroyed to avert the prophecy and stop the cataclysm.You have to cunningly steal the orbs from a heavily protected vault and transport them across the sea to the secret location of the sunken city of Sirenholm. Only there, in the heart of the underwater Temple of Tanaaris, can the orbstones be obliterated.Gather your companions. Bring your swords. Choose your spells wisely.Are you ready to save Eastern Farraway?  ➛ Three classic adventures with exciting quests and magical treasures!➛ Approximately 160 pages of content (if all stretch goals are unlocked)➛ New monsters: Arcane Sentinel, Marauder, and Horrifying Jellyfish➛ Plenty of illustrated and detailed NPCs with personal background descriptions, including traits, ideals, bonds, and flaws.➛ Unique magical items such as The Emerald Crown, Njǫrd’s Bow, and Gift of Malgonath.➛ More than 90 full-colour illustrations and original artworks, including professional commissions from Alaina Milare (Empyrean Investigations and Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy)➛ Legend & Lore: The Prophecy of Nine Omens, the White Watchers, and the Temple of Tanaaris➛ High-quality maps created by cartographers such as Dark Realm Maps and Lizard Ink Maps➛ The Brave Adventurer’s Guide featuring all unlocked stretch goals and more➛ VTT pack with tokens, gridless maps, and digital handouts for online gaming     The book will be filled with NPCs that the players can interact with. Several NPCs will be illustrated by Alaina Milare, the artist behind the NPC portraits in Before the Stroke of Midnight and other books by Midnight Tower.This is our fifth campaign and thanks to our amazing backers all of our previous projects have been successful.We’re really excited to share this new project with you, and we’ve been working hard day and night to create the book. The adventures have been playtested together with a gaming group, and we had a lot of fun during the sessions, so we can’t wait to share these adventures with you!We now kindly ask for funding to cover production costs to make this book truly epic!The production costs include commissioned maps ($1,100), beautiful illustrations ($330), covers ($250), print design and artwork ($500), and professional proofreading ($150).The more funding we get, the better the adventures and the compendium will be, and the more art commissions we’ll be able to afford – which in turn will support other fantasy artists! :) The book will include several hand-drawn and watercolour maps by Toby Lancaster from Dark Realm Maps, for example the strange Temple of Tanaaris.The book will contain plenty of unique magical items too, for example The Emerald Crown, Njǫrd’s Bow, and Gift of Malgonath.We’ll also include free VTT pack with tokens, gridless maps, and digital handouts so that the adventures can easily be played online.The digital pack includes +30 VTT tokens, 10 gridless maps, and over 15 handouts including NPC portraits, monsters and magical items. Great for online gaming!An example of some of the VTT tokens that will be included in the digital virtual tabletop pack. In total over 30 tokens will be added to the adventures.All maps come in four different versions: Gridless (perfect for online gaming), square grid, hexagon grid, and printer-friendly black and white versions. Some of the maps will also be available for the DM (with numbers, secret doors, and traps) and for Players without additional information.We love local game shops and offer greatly discounted prices to retailers with a brick-and-mortar store. Midnight Tower’s roleplaying books are available at The Gaming Goat (US), The Shop on the Borderlands (UK), Science Fiction Bokhandeln (Sweden), Dillbergs (Sweden), DoDragaoGaming (US), 3 Trolls Games & Puzzles (US), The Jousting Yeti (US), and others.We offer a heavily discounted price if you order five or more copies of the book.You also get the option to order previously released titles by Midnight Tower. This pledge is for retailers with a brick-and-mortar shop. You must have a physical location where you sell books or roleplaying games.Select this reward tier to participate in the campaign and we’ll contact you with more information. Previous books by Midnight Tower that have been successfully funded.Instagram: www.instagram.com/midnighttowerrpg/Twitter: twitter.com/Midnight_TowerFacebook: www.facebook.com/midnighttoweroxford/Website: www.midnight-tower.comMore roleplaying adventures by Midnight Tower are available here!➛ Join us and get Octavia Dragonborn’s Compendium for free:midnight-tower.com/join-the-tower/➛ Help us spread the word about the campaign on social media! (Doing this guarantees a significant increase in natural 20 rolls the next time you play. True story!)Tove is a highly introverted geek (level 7, lawful neutral). She writes the main part of the adventures and does a lot of art for Midnight Tower.Erik is a bookish nerd (level 6, chaotic good). He does much of the graphic design and edits the adventures for Midnight Tower.Tove and Erik live in Oxford (UK) together with their rebellious daughters and a small menagerie of pets, including two sarcastic cats, a tiny pseudodragon (leopard gecko), and a springer spaniel with a lazy eye.For this project, Midnight Tower is collaborating with the talented illustrator Alaina Milare, the amazing cartographer Toby Lancaster from Dark Realm Maps, and eagle-eyed proofreader Pauline Nolet.With your support, we can commission an amazing book cover like this. (Cover art by Alaina Milare for The Secrets of the Drow Trilogy.)Here is what other people have said about Midnight Tower’s previous adventures:‘This is super exciting!!! I can’t wait to dive into reading the adventure. Thanks for the great work you’ve done. Just a quick scroll through and the quality looks great!’     — Joshua D Garcia (Superbacker)‘Wow, I quickly skimmed the contents after downloading and I’m so happy with it! I can’t wait to find a group to run this for. For the price, it’s such a great value and you really went above and beyond.’     — Karen Petrasko (backer)'Rise of the Ice Dragons is a wonderful adventure that provides a lot of different parts that are entertaining for every kind of player and group. The story is easy to follow and to prepare for DM’s. It includes a bunch of interesting encounters, monsters and NPC’s and still is open enough to add your own things to it.The maps are nicely drawn and are always an eye-catcher at the table.And the best part is that the players actually get to see dragons in game!'    — Hoard Of Tales, D&D5e Actualplay Livestream          https://www.twitch.tv/hoardoftales (@hoard_of_tales)‘The quality of the illustrations are no exception and blend perfectly with the style of this work. Some images may even make you want to reuse them for other campaigns, as well. I have been glad to discover that the aesthetics of Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy are simply gorgeous. The first thing you notice is a sturdy, hard cover protecting the volume, providing the usual and necessary basic information about the work itself. The pages inside are thick, with a pleasant feel; their color is similar to that of parchment, but without impeding legibility.’     — Andy Lingua (No Dice Unrolled)         Rise of the Ice Dragons Trilogy Review To ensure that backers pay the lowest price possible, additional costs for printing and shipping charged by DriveThruRPG are not included in hardcover and softcover pledge rewards.Additional estimated cost for physical books:Softcover book: $17Hardcover book: $22Estimated shipping cost examples:US: $5 ⎜ UK: $6  ⎜ Germany: $8 ⎜ France: $9  ⎜ Australia: $12There are no additional printing or shipping costs for digital rewards.Explorer (Low Income)Digital Copy - Pledge £5You get the same reward and products as the £10 Adventurer Tier.This is the option for anyone who doesn’t have that much money.
